name: Jessica
review_text: One guest with Celiac disease, one with a wheat and dairy allergy, one with a dairy allergy- and we all ate JUST fine! GF fryers, absolutely delicious food, and the vegan GF cheesecake was the absolute cherry on top. Major props to the chef for having such a flexible upscale menu.

name: Lisa
review_text: Loved the restaurant! Great experience! Highly recommended!

name: Ruth
review_text: Always our favorite place in Breck. All around amazing!  Don’t miss the great values of happy hour

name: Deanna
review_text: Great food drinks and the rolls are the bomb and I don’t normally eat bread

name: Walter
review_text: Aurum provides a consistently high level of service and food preparation. We have never left disappointed. Their Happy Hour offers a limited menu at prices so reasonable it is hard to believe you are in Breck.

name: Jeanette
review_text: This place is always so good ! We visited during happy hour and the prices are great ! The cauliflower is always a favorite ! :)

name: Fidan
review_text: The food was impeccable! Service even better! Worth every dollar!

name: Isabel
review_text: Muy bueno!! Excelente comida y servicio!!! Muy bonito el lugar

name: Pam
review_text: I took my daughter out for dinner to celebrate a recent award she received. The waitress asked us if we were celebrating a special occasion & we told her we were she congratulated my daughter & surprised us with 2 glasses of champagne! We thought that was very special!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: ￼overall 5⭐️ this is a regular stop in Breckenridge! ￼

name: Rex And Mary
review_text: One of our favorite restaurants in Breckenridge. Always great service and wonderful food!

name: Joshua
review_text: Not a good experience. This was my third time at Aurum and both times previous were a great experiences. However, this time it was different. For starters, we were seated in the back where a large party of people were also seated. Which is fine, but the noise level was at 8/10. Yelling over each other instead of speaking at a respectful level with the understanding that others are trying to enjoy their dinners as well. While this was going on, I enjoyed a really well made pasta dish. A sacchetti with acorn squash. Which was the highlight of the night. But then, a bachelorette party arrived. Bringing the noise to a 10/10 and utterly unbearable. As we already ordered, our ceasar salad arrived and we attempted to enjoy it. Unfortunately the salad was lacking any type of zest or garlic, the main ingredient in a ceasar. At this point the noise was so intense that another table had to be moved into the other room. Seeing our unhappy faces, our waiter took the initiative to set another table for us as well. So we moved and happily tried to enjoy the rest of our meal. We had the Trout and the Trumpet mushrooms with Soba noodles as our main. The comedy / tragedy of the situation was now that both meals were too heavily salted. To the point they were completely inedible. Now I love salt and tried to enjoy the meal as much as I could but this was extreme. On top of that. As we felt the cool breeze through the restaurant due to the door being left open. A nice feeling to be sure. Someone was again so discourteous as to smoke a cigar not 2 feet from the open door! I enjoy a cigarette every once in awhile but I know I didn’t order one with my dinner. To me, both issues of the noise and the cigar are issues that management should have rectified. To their credit, management did apologize and tried to make it right. But the damage was already done. Not sure I’ll ever return.

name: kasi
review_text: We've been dining at Aurum since it opened and have never been disappointed in anything we've ordered.

name: Carol
review_text: We went to dinner with friends and after seeing such great reviews, thought it would be really good.  The service was friendly but the server didn’t do a good job explaining the dishes.  We ordered the Parmesan fries which were very good.  One person ordered a crab cake which was more breading than crab.  Another ordered the trout which was mediocre.  Another ordered the half chicken which came with potato waffles which were tough.  The kale salads were good.  The wine selection was not great and the house wine, Hobo, was not to our liking.  Overall, the dishes looked lovely but they didn’t taste as good as they looked.  We won’t be coming back.

name: Serena
review_text: It was our first time in Breckenridge and their menu sounded good. We were so glad we picked Aurum! Our server was very helpful and gave us good service. My husband had the Rocky Mountain fire flower cocktail and it was really good. I enjoyed their wine menu which had wines I hadn’t had before. I got the Soave white wine and very much enjoyed it. Our food was amazing! I had the French onion burger and the hand cut fries were so good with it. You won’t be disappointed!

name: Kevin
review_text: We always love going to Aurum to indulge in their happy hour, easily one of if not the best in all of Breckenridge. Between the food and the service, making Aurum a stop during our Breck trips is a no-brainer.

name: Libby
review_text: Best burger in Breckenridge. Always look forward to dining at Autumn during our semi annual visit to Breck!

name: Melissa
review_text: We had a great dinner, the entrees were amazing! Our server was so wonderful it was a great time

name: Cathy
review_text:
Just a wonderful experience ! Our waiter was very knowledgeable regarding the menu.
The food was excellent ! The evening was very enjoyable, thank you for making our special day. Great!

name: Jennifer
review_text: Lovely experience, GREAT service, GREAT food. Lovely restaurant, just close quarters for me. If you're looking for energy, great.  If you want more private, not my first choice.

name: Kevin
review_text:
Incredible food - the crudo and the cauliflower are must tries. The duck evolved with each bite with its rich array of complementary flavors. The dessert we tried was a two-fruit cobbler and every mouthful was toasty, rich and delicious.

Would highly recommend to anyone with an appreciation for outstanding flavors!

name: Chloe
review_text: My experience at Aurum was outstanding. The best meal my friends and I had our entire trip in Breckenridge. We came here to celebrate my birthday. We ordered the local charcuterie board and polenta, and for entrees the trout, steak, and the chefs pasta special. Service was timely and the atmosphere was very warm and welcoming. Would highly recommend for an elevated dining experience.

name: Rachel
review_text: Delicious!! Great vibe. We will be back!! we had heard all the suggestions and so glad we decided to make a reservation to go

name: Rebecca
review_text: This was our first time at Aurum and the food was excellent! We really enjoyed the Parker House Rolls for our starter and the Milk and Cookies for dessert. Our server was very attentive and Aurum was very accommodating when we asked if we could move our reservation up to an earlier time for dinner. We can’t wait to return when we visit Breckenridge again!

name: Linda
review_text: We ordered the surf and turf. The steak was not good- too tough. The restaurant didn’t charge us for that meal. We also ordered the pasta, which was wonderful. The service was excellent and that made up for the poor quality of the steak.

name: Jim
review_text: Always a favorite in Breckenridge. Just awesome always.

name: Elaine or Derek
review_text: Aurum is definitely our favourite Breck restaurant. Amazing Happy Hour deals and consistently delicious food. Tania was very helpful and attentive. Looking forward to dining here again.

name: Debbie
review_text: Raule was excellent.  It was very noisy. The food was excellent.

name: Lori
review_text: Our group had a fabulous happy hour and dinner. The service was wonderful and the staff was very helpful. Each dish we got tasted better than the last. Eclectic choice of starters which we shared and thoroughly enjoyed. Overall, dinner was a fabulous experience.

name: Dan
review_text:
Curried Cauliflower was great and the wine selections were very good.  Soba noodles were good but my Duck Confit was dry and flavorless.  Not like the Duck Confit they used to have when they originally opened a few years ago.  Good thing Entree's were 50% off, but even at that price I was disappointed.  (I did not mention this to anyone.)

Chuck our server did a great job!

name: Tammy
review_text: We had an amazing time!!  Food, cocktails and service were top-notch!!  Great night out with friends/famiy!

name: Jennifer
review_text: This appeared to be a highly rated restaurant, so we took friends who were visiting us for the weekend (we live here part time) but we did not have a good experience. Our reservation was for 7:15 but we waited at least 30 minutes before the table was ready. The dining room was basic and loud. We ordered a very nice bottle of wine from the reserve wine list, but the server brought the wrong one and was about to serve it without mentioning it was a different bottle. Apparently they were out of the one we ordered so she went back to find a different one. The salad was served before she came back with the wine. Finally she served the wine (after struggling with the cork). Entrees were very pricey for what they were, mainly $50-$60 per person. The duck was good but the trout was over seasoned and salty. We ordered the “Fat Elvis” for dessert hoping to redeem the evening with a fun decadent treat, but we got a small, stale muffin, a tiny scoop of peanut butter mousse, and a lot of cold chopped bacon which could have been from the morning. Overall not worth the hype or the price! Better options in Breckenridge and Summit County.

name: Sheila
review_text: Great time with friends! Nice staff and food offerings

name: Andy
review_text: Had to wait an extended time despite having a reservation and arriving on time

name: Sherree
review_text: We received top-notch service! To celebrate our anniversary, they graciously offered us a glass of champagne to toast. My husband enjoyed a smoky old-fashioned, while I had a delicious espresso martini that Jonas made for us before dinner. It was the perfect start to a wonderful evening! The scallops were cooked to perfection, and the atmosphere was absolutely lovely.

name: FarenM
review_text: Love Aurum and we had a wonderful dinner! All of the food is amazing as usual!

name: Stephen
review_text: Great Happy Hour!  Food and drinks were great. It was pretty quiet as it is off season but still a great place to catch up with friends!

name: Brandon
review_text: Have been here before and it was great (about a year ago). However this time the food was very bland and uninspiring. Very over priced for what we got. We chose the 5 course sampler. There was a couple sitting next to us that also experienced the same as not being happy with the food and being overpriced for what you got. Won't be coming back!

name: Mary
review_text: This was my second visit to Aurum and it does not disappoint. The service and food were both great. I just wish I lived close enough to go more often.

name: Brenda
review_text: Well prepared food and attentive service in a relaxed atmosphere

name: Lynne
review_text: We ate here for the first time to celebrate our anniversary.  The cocktails, the appetizers & main course were wonderful.  We opted out of the chefs dinner to keep it smaller.  The trout & hanger steak were great.  Our server Megan was attentive & kind.  We’ll be back!

name: Teresa
review_text: Don’t miss happy hour! The burgers and lemon Parmesan fries are delicious and big enough to share!

name: Kate
review_text: I love the restaurant, but hate when I’m put in the side room because it’s so loud that you cannot hear each other across the table

name: cynthia
review_text: Enjoyable experience. Wait staff was outstanding. The food items were mostly excellent, the soup and caesar salad were average. Deserts were amazing. Pricey but as most nice restaurants are these days, not really affordable for us except for special occasions.

name: Camille
review_text: Great Happy Hour! The burger was incredible and the cocktails were delicious!

name: Jim
review_text: Outstanding! Everything is great. One of our favorites and must go for happy hour

name: Ruediger
review_text: We were at Aurum during Happy Hour. We had a couple of the IPA’s, the Caesar salad and the burgers. Good was very good. Service was friendly and attentive. Happy Hour is great value.

name: Clif
review_text: Our #1 Breck dining spot. Happy hour never disappoints!

name: Joan
review_text: We always dine @ Arum when visit Breckenridge. The drink selection is extensive. The cauliflower starter is excellent. We had the soba + mushrooms and hanger steak. Both were delicious and filling. Topped it off with coffee and fruit crisp which was very good. The staff were friendly and attentive.

name: Sean
review_text: Great food and service in quaint little restaurant.

name: Kim
review_text: As locals, this is our "go to" favorite.  The staff is top notch and the food excellent.  Do wish they'd turn the speakers down so we can have a conversation without a lot of "what did you say?" Also wish they had a special on both the happy hour menu and regular menu each day.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food and great atmosphere! Really loved the cauliflower and trout. One of the best catch of the day meals I have had. Will come back!

name: Mark
review_text: We celebrated our anniversary at Aurum and it was a fitting choice.  Bryan was an attentive server, offering menu guidance and meeting our needs without interrupting a memorable evening.  Steak were our chosen entrees, and the clear winner was the hanger steak, prepared to a perfect Pittsburgh.  (if you know, you know)  Surprise of the evening was the Farmers Market app, in this case Palisade peaches with chili verde, melon puree, fig jam, and Olathe sweet corn.  A creative and delicious way to begin a satisfying meal.

name: Stan
review_text: Go! Fabulous food!  Happy hour prices great. Delicious drinks. Great service. So happy someone told us about this restaurant.

name: Karyn
review_text: The food was good a few mishaps. My pork tenderloin was rare and my husband’s a little over. The ravioli Wes a bit too Al dente but the service was excellent. We had the tasting menu and would definitely do it again. Our both was nice and cozy. It was a great date night.

name: CarolynM
review_text: My partner decided to wait out holiday traffic and took the opportunity to try Aurum, which had been on our list since they opened in Steamboat. We didn't realize they have an amazing happy hour 4-6, so that was a happy surprise. We ordered from the happy hour menu, sharing a wedge salad, Korean chicken and the burger with fries. The wedge salad was the best bleu cheese dressing I've ever had and the burger and fries were both very good and filling. The Korean fried chicken pieces could've been a little crisper and spicier, but were delicious nonetheless--we ate every bite of all of the dishes. I also had a delicious shrub cocktail w/bourbon and a class of Sangiovese. We didn't have room for dessert, but did have a couple amari that were delicious. We've already picked what we want to try from the rest of the menu when we return.

name: Kristi
review_text: Food was great. The gochujang chicken was a little salty.  Burger was slightly overcooked but everything was tasty. Happy hour in the way to go on a budget. The waitress was very good.

name: Aaron
review_text: Celebrated our 26th wedding anniversary. We both ordered the chefs tasting menu. Food was fantastic. Wine was paired and mostly complimented the dishes. Our aerver, Talia, was nice and helpful but didn’t  have very much knowledge in terms of our wines. Perhaps a little coaching from your sommelier- good service and attentive. Requested a quiet table, and we probably were give the quietest table possible but it wasn’t very quiet. Wonderful experience and would definitely go to Aurum again. The food was the highlight for sure.

name: Jill
review_text: Aurum was really cute, has a great menu and the service was wonderful. We thouroughly enjoyed ourselves.

name: Steven
review_text: This is one of the best restaurants I’ve been to in Breckenridge. Everything we had was excellent, including the wine, recommended by our server.

name: Steve
review_text: Chuck was our server and was great in accommodating our requests and with our food selection. Definitely a good overall experience.

name: Connie
review_text: I had the chicken dish on the main menu for $54.  It was not that tasty and overpriced.  The happy hour burgers are the best value and were tasty.  Server was very friendly. Wine and drinks were great. Fried cauliflower was delicious.  No substitution of dressing on my husband's wedge because it was happy hour pricing even though he ordered a full priced entree.

name: Rick
review_text: Another great meal last night! Everything was great start to finish

name: Amy
review_text:
We were a party of five and arrived for a 7:45 reservation on a Saturday night. We were seated right away at a high top in the front of the restaurant. Our server, Bryan, was friendly, attentive, and explained the food in detail. We ordered many dishes to share, and we were impressed with the speed the plates came out of the kitchen and the efficiency of the staff to handle all of the food. 

We started with four different cocktails that were all delicious, but the Spicy Cucumber Margaritas were the table favorite. The Mountain Time was refreshing if you like gin, the Ginger Pear Martini was on the sweet side, and the Smokey Alpine Glow was fantastic if you like Mezcal tequila. It is pretty smokey if that is your thing (it is mine).

Since we were with our adult children who are adventurous eaters, we shared all of the dishes. We ordered 9 dishes and that was the perfect amount of food as there was nothing left over and everyone was pleasantly satiated. Here is what we thought:

Parker House Rolls - pretty typical and nothing outstanding
Crispy Curried Cauliflower - if you like a bit of curry, this dish is fantastic!
Korean BBQ Pork Ribs - A-maz-ing! Everyone loved the sauce and they were so tender.                                              
Miso Asparagus Bisque - very well balanced. We ordered two bowls and we all really wanted just a little bit more. Note: if you are taking pictures for a review, this dish is a not well photographed. The bowl is presented with asparagus and pistachio dust and then the servers pour in the soup and it becomes a bowl of greatness that looks bad in pics. 
Hamachi Crudo - a very well balanced, typical (in a great way) version of crudo. The Hamachi was fresh and perfectly sliced. We had two of these for the table.
Housemade  Rotating Pasta - It was good, but we didn't get the notes that Bryan said we would taste. It was very unique. This dish changes all the time, so what I say doesn't really matter here:) 
Farmers Market Special -

name: NodgieB
review_text: Our favorite happy hour in Breckenridge.  The food is always good.

name: kimberly
review_text:
The service was excellent. Our server Nolan was very attentive and helpful.
The Happy hour menu looks great and I wish we had come for Happy hour.
I had 5 small scallops for $52 with sliced square potatoes, fennel sliced up and a red sauce. I don't think it was worth it. I have had better elsewhere.
My friend had the trout and it was fabulous. I got Parker rolls and the chocolate chip cookies which were the highlight for me.
The troubling thing was we ordered fries with a sweet chili seasoning which came with ketchup and a mayonnaise dip. All three of us ate this and drank the water provided. That night the three of us felt ill. The only things we all ate that night was the fries with condiments and glasses of water.

name: Maurice
review_text: Greatest happy hour in Breck!  Fun, buzzy and yummy food and drinks.

name: Tom
review_text: Always the best choice for quality food and service!!

name: Jane
review_text: Perfect destination to celebrate my husband’s birthday. Delicious dishes accompanied by a complimentary glass of champagne and concluding with two mini cannolis. Hamachi with a cucumber vinaigrette, the pasta starter of the day, and the signature fresh water trout — all scrumptious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Recommended to us. Experience was great. We went for the Happy Hour - prices were unbelievable in a great way!  Got the curried cauliflower, Korean fried chicken, wedge salad, french onion burger and mushroom soba noodles. Megan our waitperson was great!

name: TommyG
review_text: Always exceptional! THE go to restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: Winters
review_text: Great service and fabulous meal.  We will def be back!

name: AmyG
review_text: The best Happy Hour in Breckenridge.  We went two nights in a row and ordered different things.  Our first night we had the burgers and fries and the cauliflower appetizer. I recommend skipping an appetizer or splitting the burgers. The second night we each had a salad - one the Market salad and one the Wedge. I had the Korean ribs and my husband had the Korean chicken. I prefer the chicken but both were delicious and not too much although I shared the ribs. The tasting menu is great too if you want a larger meal.

name: Walter
review_text: Aurum deserves its reputation as the best Happy Hour in town. The food is superb, the drinks are delicious, the service was attentive and unpretentious, and the value is excellent. One caveat: a diner who is used to Breckenridge prices will assume that the portions are small and order too much !

name: Mary
review_text: The food was outstanding! We loved everything we ordered! The drinks were great as well! The only criticism I have, we ordered more butter for the rolls, which our server was happy to do. However when I was still eating my salad, the server asked my husband if he was finished with his salad. Proper etiquette is servers should wait until everyone has finished their particular course before clearing any dishes. 1, it made me feel rushed and as if I didn’t matter. 2, HE TOOK ALL THE BUTTER AS WELL and I still had my roll I wanted to finish with my salad!  The entrees were very good! Next time I guess I’ll guard the extra butter with my life!😕

name: Ann Marie
review_text: Thought the food was excellent, but the pricing seemed extremely expensive, even considering the location in the mountains and the impact of recent inflation.

name: Courtney
review_text: My favorite restaurant!!!! I always make sure to get a reservation here when I’m in town. Every single thing is amazing, fresh and creative! Also the mountain thyme cocktail is delicious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Crispy Curry Califlower was a delicious appetizer to start out with.  Also, loved the Kale Salad too! Very fresh and well balanced flavors throughout the meal.

name: Patricia
review_text: Aurum has been consistently great over the past few years.  We make it a point  to dine at Aurum whenever we’re in Breck.

name: Adam
review_text: Great service, very attentive, knew the menu well. Went above and beyond to make our engagement dinner special!

name: Kimberly
review_text: We had the bar menu before a performance in town.  Delicious innovative food offerings, great drinks and lively before dinner crowd!

name: Ed
review_text: Great dinner and great service from Tom. We will definitely come again!

name: Johanna
review_text: My friend and I attended the Amevive wine dinner. The food was all very good with the exception of the short rib ravioli. Service was great. We really enjoyed the event!

name: Eric
review_text: Terrific and creative menu. Very nice blend of flavors in all the dishes we had.  Very nice wine list.   Excellent place overall and I also call attention to their numerous GF choices.

name: Roy
review_text: Food was phenomenal. Too noisy though. We seemed to be in the family dining room.

name: Steve
review_text: Nice ambience and a very interesting and varied menu.

name: Abigail
review_text: We went for their well known and popular happy hour (make a reservation!).   It was more than I expected.   Food was fantastic -- maybe the best burger I have had in years and fries were perfect -- crispy but creamy inside.  Service was attentive and good.   Ambience -- it's an old house and it's nicely coverted to commercial/restaurant space.   I am the last among our part time neighbors to go there -- everyone raves about it, justifiably.  This will be on our list of places to take guests and we will return on our own as well.  It is tremendous value for the $$.   An actual "steal" it is so good and so reasonably priced.

name: Bryan
review_text: Food was very uneven. farm carpaccio (squash) was very good. The hamachi was uninteresting. The scallops were average, not the right firmness and small. The Trumpet Mushroom Soba was especially disappointing. Should have been a great combination, but had too many noodles and surprisingly insipid mushrooms. The backroom was very hot. Our server was clearly high, but very nice.  Too pricey for an average experience.

name: FredandebbieW
review_text: We had a wonderful dinner at Aurum. The food was absolutely delicious and never fails to amaze me. We had the steak and the scallops and both dishes were awesome. Had the curried fried cauliflower for an appetizer and the wedge salad. Service was very prompt, friendly, and impressive. One of our very favorite restaurants in Breckenridge!

name: Tina
review_text: Food was outstanding.  Presentation inviting.  Unique blending of flavors pleasant to the pallet.  Would definitely return.

name: Leche
review_text: One of our favorite restaurants in Breckenridge. Highly recommended.

name: PrettieParrott
review_text: Fabulous experience and the food was delicious.  We'll definitely be coming back soon!

name: Janis
review_text: We had a lovely time. I will say, though that the french fries everybody ordered came out cold and they were so busy. We just didn’t have the heart to send it back.

name: Tosha
review_text:
I had friends from out of state visiting so I wanted to make a reservation for a nice dinner. We were celebrating one of m friends birthdays. The reservation asked if there was a special occasion so I shared the birthday in the reservation. 

We had changed from a party of 4 to a party of 5 the day before the reservation which they accommodated. 

Service, food and drinks were all very good. 

The one strange thing was that no one ordered dessert but they did bring a small birthday dessert for my friend. The strange part...when we got our bill they had charged us for the birthday dessert. Full transparency, they only charged $5. However being that no one ordered dessert and it was a VERY small birthday dessert I was pretty surprised by this. I have never been purposefuly charged before for something I didn't order.

name: JoseC
review_text: Very nice restaurant.  Lovely menu with interesting and unique flavors.

name: MERRITT
review_text: We have been coming to Aurum for years. The food is always great. They always have a fun selection of cocktails. The service is friendly.

name: GDad
review_text: Great happy hour.  Great food and service.  Love sitting at high top and sharing huge burger.

name: KimberlyP
review_text: Outstanding service and the most deliocous trout ever!  We had a wonderful time with friends before a play!

name: JT10022
review_text: Great meal, easy to reserve a table. Cocktails and wine were also very good.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent food and service. Dessert was over the top!

name: Sunny
review_text:
Great happy hour.
Excellent food & service.
The only negative: it's really tacky to charge a 3% fee to support the employees. We're already paying at least 20% for a tip. Employees' retirement and healthcare is the RESTAURANT'S issue, not the customers'!

name: cindyk
review_text: Great food and service - we’re coming back!

name: Michaela
review_text: We have dined here before, and it is a smallish venue which is usually wonderfully intimate for couples. Unfortunately, our date night coincided with a very large group occupying the entire  center of the back dining room which looked like a bachelorette or girlfriend event. We could not hear ourselves think at our little table for two jammed between the wall and this mega-party. We noticed others in our situation having the same problem. While we enjoy the food at Aurum, it felt like a wasted evening because we could not even talk to each other over the boisterous dinner party. The party looked like fun, if you were in it, but for the rest of us, we should have found somewhere else to go. I feel like the restaurant should let you know if they are seating you in a group like this so you can opt in or out. We would have gone elsewhere that evening - no hard feelings. But I do kind of have hard feelings since this was an important dinner out for us and a lost opportunity to enjoy some ambience. We were vacationing and we don't get to go here often, but this will be my lasting impression, sadly.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was creative, delicious and artfully prepared.  Nolan, our server, was outstanding!

name: ClifH
review_text: We eat at Aurum every time we are out n Breck… our favorite place because of the service, consistently delicious food and great, attentive service. We took friends this time and they loved it as well!

name: MaddieR
review_text: We had a wonderful experience at Aurum! The ambiance was incredible, the food was great, and the waiter brought my fiancé and I complimentary champagne to toast our engagement. We will definitely be returning!

name: Smstex
review_text:
I go often
Thefood wasnt as great as always, but still very good-   Great service-
The korean chicken was too spicy, for us, so we left 90%_
The 2 hamburgers were overcooked,  and that has never happened.
I think it is a great restaurant though

name: Powegian
review_text: We did happy hour (4-6 pm daily) on a weekday. We expected superb food and impeccable service and were not disappointed. What surprised us was good value. We assumed that the “half price appetizers” would be diminished portions, as is the case at many other restaurants; this was not the case. We took home half the food we had ordered, graciously packed up by our server. Aurum fully deserves its reputation as best happy hour in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We celebrated our anniversary last night and ordered the Chef’s Tasting Menu….it was excellent and the wine pairings were perfect!  Our server was also very attentive and paced our meal perfectly. Highly recommend!

name: RLBack
review_text: The food was fantastic as usual.  The service could not have been better.  This has become our go to restaurant when friends and family come to town and everyone has loved it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had a 530 reservation. We ordered a drink, chicken and salad all at the same time. Our chicken came first. When we were halfway done with our chicken our drinks, a glass of wine and a beer finally came. When we were finished with our chicken, the salad arrived. Overall, disappointed. ￼

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour experience.  Polenta was outstanding.  Great service; very hip atmosphere

name: TammyF
review_text: Food  was amazing delicious and creative yummy yummy

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food and excellent service.  Fabulous Happy Hour too.

name: likeeating
review_text: Loved our server, Raoul. Also the vegetarian courses were great!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Very attentive staff. The food was incredible. We had the taster’s menu with the wine pairings. Every course left us eagerly awaiting the next. A must when you are in Breckenridge

name: LibbyH
review_text: Aurum is one of our two favorite happy hours spots in Breckenridge. The burger is awesome - check out the cauliflower also!

name: SteveW
review_text: The food and service were great.  I had a steak, which was very good and cooked as requested.  My wife had duck.  We both are GF and the duck dish was not listed as Gluten Free, but they adjusted the set up so it was perfect. The only downside was that the noise level was too loud.  As Happy Hour wound down, the noise level decreased.  I was surprised that the happy hour patrons were in the main dining area as well as the bar and patio.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Outstanding appetizers, but the entrees we ordered were a bit sub-par for the price.

name: Mike
review_text: Wow!  Aurum really came through for us last night!  After a snafu the last time with drinks, the house comped our drinks as soon as we arrived!  What service!  What care for the customer!  We always love Aurum , but now they are forever in our hall of fame!

name: SherryK
review_text: Attentive staff, great happy hour, happy hour fabulous hamburger and great fried cauliflower. Extremely courteous when we asked them to lower the music.

name: MadiH
review_text: Duck and BBQ ribs were fabulous. Service was very slow took us 3 hours to eat… server took an hour or more to take our main orders. Trout wasn’t the best.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best dinner we have had on our vacation. The cauliflower appetizer was wonderful and the trout was amazing. The Fat Elvis dessert was very unique and had great flavors

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food and drinks in a beautiful space.

name: KristinH
review_text: We were very excited about this place but we came and we had to flag someone down to take our order after waiting 25 minutes without being helped. We ordered (staff was very nice still!) and the food was very subpar. I got the special pasta and it really only tasted like boiled noodles. The food also took one hour to come out.

name: DoctoRay
review_text: This was our second time at the restaurant, and we returned because of that outstanding first experience. This time, however, the outstanding service at this restaurant and the beautiful ambience saved this review for being terrible. First of all, we experienced terrible traffic, leaving Denver, and were running about an hour late. The staff was more than accommodating for this untimely arrival. The steak, however, was extremely chewy and all the dishes, including my salad, and both soups, were excessively salty.  After dinner, we were thirsty all night, and my date suffered from G.I. distress. I woke up this morning still pondering how different from the first experience, this was

name: Dawn
review_text: Our dining experience at Aurum was exceptional!  We started with a wonderful farmers market carpaccio with amazing flavor. The wedge salad was outstanding with home made blue cheese dressing. I enjoyed perfectly prepared seared scallops and my husband chose a wonderful Hanger Steak with Yukon potatoes, broccolini with a balsamic demi-glacé.  The Fat Elvis dessert was over-the-top delicious chocolate chip banana cake, peanut butter mouse, brûléed bananas topped with bacon and blackberry jam! It left your tastebuds dazzled and confused. Our exceptional waiter, Tom, a double black diamond waiter made the entire experience awesome!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best Happy Hour in Breckenridge! Amazing food and drinks!

name: Julie
review_text: Amazing food - delicious! Background music was a little too loud.

name: Pickyeater15
review_text: Had reservations at 5:30 but being hungry arrived early hoping to be seated earlier. Not a problem! Enjoyed shared salad and porter house rolls (with their amazing apple butter) both at happy hour prices. My duck with vegetables was perfectly cooked and my husband was happy with his steak. By far one of the best meals we’ve had in a long time. Sad to live so far away! Staff was all pleasant and appeared to work well as a team and the people watching provided great entertainment.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: ￼ it was a good experience, we were there for my husband’s birthday.￼ We have been 2 other times and we have not been disappointed. Tonight, however the hostess seemed very overwhelmed with so many people and it was aparent that seating was an issue.  It was very crowded and therefore  it was very noisy.  It’s very hard to visit because there are no quiet tables but all in all it was a good experience. ￼

name: Mike
review_text:
We had an awesome experience at Aurum last night.  The food is always terrific.  But last night, our evening was made so special by our server, Megan!  It was only her second day on the job but she really went out of our way to make our dinner fantastic with the best service I’ve ever had in town!
One note:  the bartender did not honor a promise the owner made to me when I wrote a review last winter on how sad I was that the happy hour did not have the Bees Knees on it any more.  I explained that he (the owner) promised the next time I came in they would make me that drink for the happy hour price and the bartender refused to honor it.  Very bad form!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Me and my had an amazing experience here… We loved our food, the weight staff was amazing, and the restaurant looked amazing… Thank you all for everything y’all did will be back

name: DanaC
review_text: Excellent food - the flavors and freshness were amazing! My glass was never empty and we could not have asked for better service. We sat in the back room and it was a little too noisy as a few larger parties filled in but the overall ambience was great!

name: Linlgarbs
review_text: We love Aurum's Happy Hour menu - great value and the food never disappoints. And the service is great

name: Vishnu
review_text: Had another splendid meal at Aurum.  Chose to take our kids there to have a pre-wedding celebration dinner.  The staff were attentive and kind.  The food was amazing.  I will keep going back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Our experience at Aurum was above and Beyond!! They helped us celebrate our anniversary with a card signed by the staff champagne and made us feel so incredibly special. I want to spend every birthday/anniversary here!! Thank you to everyone for making it so special we loved every minute! Also 10/10 recommended the milk and cookies desert!

name: GingerN
review_text: The food and wine were delicious and our server was terrific.

name: PbnJ
review_text: Great service and great food. We were not too crazy about The Fat Elvis dessert.

name: RLBack
review_text: Our daughter and son in law were in town.  We always like to take our guests to Aurum because we are confident that we will have a great dining experience.  And it was.  Thank you!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went for for appetizers on a Friday and it was so good we went back again this Friday!  Wonderful atmosphere, great food and awesome service... this is tops on our list for Breckenridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: 2nd time there, very nice outside dining if the weather is right! Great service from Tom. My Strip steak was just ok (lots of fat left on it and the dish could have been hotter). We dined during Mud Season, so got 50% off entrees, thus increasing our value. That said, last time we all got the Trout and it was awesome! Stick w that and save the steak for a steak restaurant, is my take-away!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great flavors! Fun spot for my bday party with my family.

name: TimmieB
review_text:
First time eating at Arum. Server was knowledgeable, bartender helpful and food was 
the best in Breck. We will definitely eat there again.

name: SharonS
review_text:
Best Happy Hour in Breck. Love bringing my friends. Food and service is always Great 
I will be back soon.

name: AmyK
review_text: Aurum is a special place in Breckenridge.  The food is terrific but the wait staff is what makes it!!! This time our waitress was Carmen, she was outstanding!  We dine at Aurum every time we are in Breckenridge, it never disappoints!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: My wife and I had special meals prepared in such a creative and totally delicious manner. The drinks were tasty, and the service was attentive and quite friendly. I was so happy I chose to eat at Arun for the first time, 6/6/24.

name: Steve
review_text: Superb food coupled with great wine and fabulous service made our evening great. The mud season special made the meal reasonably priced to boot. Loved it!  We'll be back!

name: SueK
review_text: The service was great and the trout delicious! We especially appreciated the half price entrees!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Well executed, Interesting food and cocktails, attentive and personable service.
Welcoming atmosphere. Highly recommended.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It was extremely noisy.  The pasta special was dry and salty.  Excellent service though!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: My wife and I went to celebrate our Anniversary with our <1 year old. We were treated like family and they made us feel comfortable, which taking a baby to a higher end restaurant can be stressful. The food was great, the server was awesome and our overall experience was perfect. Will go back again.

name: DavidV
review_text: Very loud; service slow; awareness not present… very big difference when compared with our experience at your sister restaurant… the Carlin. Not a friendly environment.

name: MariI
review_text: This is one of our go to places on every brevkenridge visit. Usually we go for happy hour, but did a full dinner this time and both were teriffic!  The service was perfect. The only downside is the noise level. We will be back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great upscale spot! Especially with the mud season discount.

name: JulianaS
review_text: Amazing dinner. Best trout dish we have ever had! Ended up going back on our short trip for happy hour and enjoyed the cheese board and some cocktails which were all perfectly balanced. I would have to say this is a place you shouldn’t miss while in town. Very impressed

name: CharlesL
review_text: Great food and service! Great food and service! Great food and service!

name: JordanP
review_text: We had an amazing meal and service! Recommend for birthday celebrations!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Flank steak was full of gristle 
Short rib was fatty and lacking flavor. Prices were way too high for the quality of meal.

name: WendyR
review_text: Great food and service!! We are gluten free and the options were endless. We celebrated our anniversary there.

name: karenp
review_text: Great service.  Really beautiful restaurant.  The food was amazing.  Every item we had was top notch  We will definitely return

name: ClifH
review_text: As always, we were not disappointed. The difference in Aurum and other Breckenridge restaurants is their staff. Always friendly, courteous, go above and beyond to make the experience amazing. Happy Hour menu can’t be beat for quality and value. Don’t miss going to our favorite Breck place!!

name: Ashley
review_text:
It was a wonderful experience. It felt like everyone in the room was celebrating. Beautiful, unique and delicious food and drinks!!

Great choice for birthdays and celebrations!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Bad service, missed one of the meals. Way over priced and room is meh

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food and drink with good happy hour deals and incredible service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Everything was fantastic but for essentially be asked to leave after 1 hour and 30 minutes because they had another RSVP.  We were a table of 3 and ordering food, desert and drinks.   Poor form.

name: BOKC
review_text: Great place.  Excellent,  creative food,  friendly and efficient service.  We had the trout and starters to share.  When you enter, there's a bar and some tables but we dined at the back.

name: Oakparker
review_text: The music was WAY TOO LOUD. I was seated next to my daughter and we had to repeat ourselves many times to be heard.

name: ReynaS
review_text: Great food, service and ambiance!! Everything was wonderful. Food was very flavorful, good prices and good times!

name: SharonS
review_text:
Excellent service. Stefani was GREAT.
Food delicious. My favorite place for Happy Hour

name: DerekOmalley
review_text: AMAZING! Amazing as always. Definitely our favourite Happy Hour go-to place. Super loyal to the restaurant to the point where we even stopped by Tavern Underground (great Martini by Brian and always nice to catch up with Grayson who has so much love for the restaurants) after to have a nightcap after our huge dinner at Aurum. Love all your restaurants and everyone attached to the restaurants. Thank you Stefani for a wonderful evening.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent experience dining at Aurum. Our hostess was ultra polite, the server was very knowledgeable and efficient, and the food was excellent.

name: wfd810
review_text: Excellent happy hour, very reasonable prices, nice portions of appetizers, recommend Korean chicken, curried cauliflower, and Bibb wedge. Nice drink selection, beer menu could be expanded.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excelente comida, lugar muy agradable y buen servicio

name: MimiT
review_text: Great service and Creative drinks. Super helpful in last minute reservation adjustment.

name: SusanM
review_text: Will is the best!!   Enjoyable dinner. Will dine again

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We recently dined at Arum and had a great experience. The staff were kind, helpful and attentive. We ate and drank off the happy hour menu- great price, options, and large portions. Highly recommend Arum for any occasion!

name: MikeW
review_text:
Came for happy hour with a party of 5.  Had every item on the happy hour menu.  Everything was great and except the burgers - we ordered them MR but they were medium at best.  Great flavor just over-cooked

The Korean chicken and cauliflower were the outstanding!

name: AmyK
review_text: Our food was wonderful, our server was OUTSTANDING!!!

name: Murph
review_text: I know it’s the end of the ski season. I’m just as tired as everyone else. But we were rushed out of there as quick as possible. The waitress was trying to remove food before we were done. I asked for a special dessert for my wife’s birthday and we got two little cookies. They were on the house but I would have rather paid for a nice dessert. We went to another restaurant for a nice birthday dessert. Over all not worth the money won’t be returning or recommending

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Had a lovely birthday dinner here. The food, service and ambiance was great.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fabulous food and service. recommend the tasting menu, especially anything with fish.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Was recommended by a friend. We were not disappointed

name: dthatcher
review_text: Awesome experience- food and cocktails were delicious

name: AGorbold
review_text: Wonderful happy hour, great food and ambiance.  This is REALLY worth a visit if you are in Breck, we were so impressed.

name: POBLANO
review_text:
es un buen lugar para degustar buen vino y una excelente comida
un buen lugar para comer en breck

name: Poppy
review_text: Food just ok. Price for quality was not good. We would not go here again. Empty wine and cocktail glasses sat for most of the dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Neither of us liked our entrées and only took like 2-3 bites. We sat in front of our plates for like 10mins before the server came over and asked if we were done and wanted a box. We said no, and she immediately cleared the table but didn't bother asking if anything was wrong, then dropped the check. We also got charged an additional $30 to add duck confit to the entree?? Portions were enormous, but the food was god awful. Nothing was seasoned and everything was cold and wet. We both left hungry and disappointed.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Trout entree was amazing. Nate was a great server. They even send over something complementary for our anniversary. Very thoughtful.

name: wsmitty
review_text: Our server Will was very friendly and knowledgeable!! He greeted us quickly even apologizing for the wait (which was only a min or two).  He checked on us regularly without pestering us. The food was fabulously and wine was great!! We definitely recommend!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: As always with a visit to Aurum, the visit was great. Recommendation’s to normal options were phenomenal. Definitely a must visit!

name: PaulaT
review_text: An excellent place to eat. Food was exceptional and portion size very good, not too overfacing like some places. Staff were friendly and attentive without being too intrusive. If we were staying longer we would visit again.

name: macsmak
review_text: It never disappoints to keep coming back, always something by new and delicious! Service and drinks are superb as well.

name: GregoryW
review_text: Autumn never fails to deliver a great dining experience. One of the best restaurants in Breckenridge

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
We really enjoyed our dinner meal.
One of the nest of our whole trip.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Not great for the money… overrated a bit. Nice ambiance though

name: Noname
review_text: The seasonal tasting menu was an outstanding series of flavors and taste. Just enough sauce not drowning the food as some kitchens do. Extremely attentive service and especially for a touristic ski town in season, very good value for money. Wine list has some good obscure ones as a key added bonus. All in all, great evening.

name: Mike
review_text: We have always loved Aurum’s happy hour. Sadly this time, they changed the drink menu for HH to a much more mundane set of choices.  The Korean chicken and the curry cauliflower was still wonderful as always but the fries lacked salt and were not our favorite.  Prices are up also.

name: 2rcs
review_text: Great happy hour! Loved our food.  Kid friendly meals too.

name: TML7
review_text: Wonderful dinner in Breckenridge!!!  Upscale restaurant with an amazing rainbow trout entrée. Would highly recommend for a special dinner:-) ￼

name: JulieB
review_text: Great experience.  The food was wonderful and the sommelier recommended a great bottle to go with our dinner.   We will go back when in Breckenridge.

name: JoeH
review_text: Incredible happy hour. The crispy cauliflower was amazing- such unique spice blend

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went here to celebrate my sister’s birthday while in town, and everything was amazing! We were thrilled to have clear vegan options for my mom, and our servers, Kristen and Will, were knowledgeable, kind, and attentive. In the end, the cherry on top was the birthday card from the staff for my sister. She is in the service industry in Dallas and it reminded her of the message in “Unreasonable Hospitality,” and that simple card made her night! Thanks for such a wonderful experience!

name: Joanna
review_text: This was  the best food, ambience, and service I've had had in a Breckenridge restaurant. I was travelling alone during my birthday and really enjoyed the beautiful décor and fantastic food. Delicious meal with unique cuisine. The personalized service was excellent. Sometimes when dining alone, it's easy to be ignored, but the server noted my birthday and offered some really specialized bonuses. I will definitely be back!

name: Defender96
review_text: We were only able to get in due to a problem fitting up the kitchen and boy were we lucky! Phenomenal food and service throughout! A bit pricey but it’s Breckenridge so “no ragrets”!

name: BryanK
review_text: Terrific meal with excellent service and a very nice ambience.  We will return.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Very excellent service and incredibly accomodative. Food and ambience were what I would expect of a high end restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious! Recommend their happy hour. Good price, good food and great drinks.

name: Jules
review_text: We had the tasting menu with wine pairings and it was excellent.

name: DoloresH
review_text: Wonderful service and the food was phenomenal-especially the accompanying vegetables. Lots of food too.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food is great but every time we go the servers are horrible.  Forgotten/incorrect orders, slow service, rudeness, and just plain out of it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour! We got one of everything and some cocktails. Perfect for three people!

name: LizJ
review_text: Best meal here in Breckenridge by far! The portions of happy hour starters are a meal in itself.

name: BrandisDandies
review_text: Enjoyed 24th anniversary dinner. Made it special with a signed card and glass of Prosecco!

name: pattyF
review_text: We really love eating at Aurum.  It is creative and smart. The atmosphere is great.  Fun and funky. The cocktail/mocktail selection is so clever.

name: Alice
review_text: We enjoyed our dinner as usual. We would have like to have had some more choices.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Staff was amazing and attentive. Appetizers , drinks and duck & trout were wonderful! The steak was chewy, would not recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Overall, it was a good experience. I wanted the $100 tasting menu but you cant be the only one to get it at the table each guest has to order the same thing. I had the trout which was okay.. my friend did have the steak meal which was VERY good so maybe I just ordered the wrong thing. Smaller than I expected, so the noise level was kind of high. Id go again only for happy hour.

name: islandgal
review_text: Raul was a fabulous waiter and made wonderful recommendations of the chicken and the trout! The cauliflower was delicious. Great cocktail menu and desserts. A great vibe in the main dining room. Excellent experience!

name: JoannaL
review_text: Aurum exceeded expectations. We did the tasting menu with wine pairing. The menu was creative, detail focused, and delicious (with the exception of one of the final courses, the game hen, it was just a little too salty). But other than that - wow. The staff was attentive and excited about the food and making sure we had a great experience. Which we did. Well done. Want to go back for happy hour!

name: Foodie
review_text: Both the service and the food were absolutely exceptional.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Incredibly friendly, knowledgeable, and accommodating staff. Every staff person had a smile, and were happy to help us.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely delicious! We made it in during happy hour and tried a few cocktails. All were superb. The service was excellent. Overall, I would highly recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Every dish every bite was delicious! The balance of every dish, the balance of ingredients in every sauce was perfect. In fact, it was so good we went the next day for happy hour.  We had the Short Ribs, Duck Breast, Trout, Cauliflower, wedge salad and Caesar salad plus the big ending…warm chocolate chip cookies with 3 sauces. Treat yourself!

name: JoieDeVie
review_text:
The converted house is thoughtfully done, all the staff were so nice, our waiter was excellent & the food was really delicious - actually more yummy than the descriptions!!

Absolutely recommend this restaurant!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was delicious and was served with speed, requested it be so because we had a baby with us. The waitstaff was extremely responsive.

name: CarolineV
review_text: Absolutely amazing!! The trout was soooo good. Top 5 meal ever.

name: kentk
review_text:
We didn't go for happy hour but arrived inside of hours and was absolutely amazed by the offerings at incredible prices and quality of food.
We will definitely be back soon....

name: KimK
review_text: Excellent dinner for a special occasion - food presentation was off the charts

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food. Kristin, our server, was awesome and the staff made my birthday dinner just perfect. Thank you! We will come back again.

name: GraceD
review_text: Aurum is my favorite restaurant in Summit County. The food is excellent, the service is outstanding & the staff is always friendly, knowledgeable & very competent

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent service, food, and drinks! We had the happy hour menu available so ordered from there as well as the regular menu.

name: ScottN
review_text: Food is always great at Aurum. Happy hour not quite as good as it used to be. The happy hour drinks prices have increased and not as good of a selection of drinks on happy hour.

name: MARJANEHH
review_text: I had read a lot about this restaurant.  I thought I am going to an upscale nice restaurant.  The decor very simple and it is mostly a family restaurant, The menu is kind of strange and not enough varieties, service was ok a bit slow and at times a bit neglectful.  For the price of their food, the ambiance is not at par.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food and service. Don’t miss the curried cauliflower!

name: kirkP
review_text: Stephanie was exceptional with service and attentiveness throughout the evening. Shareables were on point as during our previous visits. Surf and turf was good, but the lobster caused it to be not great. A tad overcooked and probably the smallest lobster tail I’ve ever had. Totally understand the challenge in a mountain town, but it was the size of a single prawn

name: StefanL
review_text: Service was slow. Proportions were good size. Lacked on flavor though and some items needed cooking longer.

name: Matt
review_text: Food was delicious and atmosphere is tranquil. Would definitely go back again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Raul was personable, attentive and efficient. The food was great as usual.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Our server was so accommodating and personable. Always bring my out of town guests here and  they love it.

name: KevinL
review_text: The food and beverage is excellent.   Service was helpful and friendly.   Managers work to support their staff to give faster service.

name: Spatt
review_text: El lugar es agradable pero la comida no tenía sabor y era muy pretenciosa.

name: FergusFoodie
review_text:
First time my wife and I have dined at Aurum.  It will now be a destination any time we are in Breckenridge.  Great staff, nice decor, appropriate noise level and the food was absolutely fantastic.  I wish I had taken photos because the presentation alone was worthy.  

We passed on the tasting menu choosing instead, a la carte.  Started with the crispy cauliflower.  I'm not a cauliflower fan but, much like Brussel sprouts, when prepared in great flavors, truly enjoyable.  The portion size was large and it could have had a bit more flavor/spice (and slightly smaller pieces) allowing for more flavor per bite, which is my preference.  If you love cauliflower however, this one's for you.

Main courses were really good.  Wife loved her 10oz Marinated Coulotte Steak.  Tender, flavorful and prepared perfectly served with pureed potatoes.  I chose the Grilled Achiote Chicken and it was absolutely fantastic.  Great presentation, huge portion, excellently seasoned with just a little heat and incredibly juicy!  One of the best preparations of a 1/2 chicken I've ever had.  The chili cheddar polenta was a perfect, slightly crispy accompaniment.  

Finally, having seen them on the table next to us, we gave in and ordered the chocolate chip cookies for dessert.  4 cookies, freshly baked, lightly salted... along with a generous scoop of chocolate chip cookie dough was the perfect finale.  

I highly recommend Aurum and will be back soon!

name: BarryM
review_text:
the good points were the service which was attentive and pleasant, the duck was cooked just right and tasty as was the the trout. obviously 3 very important requirements of any restaurant.
In contrast the wine (a sauvignon blanc) grew on us but did not achieve our expectations. an expensive wine list with some excellent labels that did not suit the menu.
not seeing an appetiser menu we asked and were told that the snacks and shared plate sections of the menu were the appetisers. the only offering to our liking, as an appetiser, was the curry carrot miso bisque which was ok.
the accompaniments to the Duck and Trout main courses provided little in terms of support, in particular the fondant potatoes and delicata squash respectively stood alone and only purpose appeared to be to fill half the plate, regrettably without adding any taste.
Unfortunately, the dessert menu was uninspiring to us so we did not sample any of the dishes.
Most diners around us appeared to be drinking cocktails and ordering 2 or 3 meals each from the snacks and shared plates menu, so perhaps our traditional approach to fine dining was the problem.
certainly the reviews appear to suggest that it is us that are out of step, but certainly Aurum is not a restaurant that suited us.

name: GregoryW
review_text: Truly one of the best restaurants in Breckenridge.  Everything we ordered was excellent. Make sure you save room for dessert

name: AndrewR
review_text: Food was great. Excellent service.  We had trout a buger, braised short ribs and duck. All were good. I especially recommend the cauliflower app.  Very tasty.  Only comment was it was a bit bright in the rest.

name: eastcoastpatron
review_text: My wife and daughter love Aurum from its exquisite decor, friendly staff and the chef prepares a delectable menu that satisfies all pallets

name: Tack
review_text:
This place is very modern, chic and well located in Breckenridge.  The food is an eclectic mix of Asian and American. There are a variety of starters, but only five main courses, plus two steaks.  Prices are elevated. The wine list is mostly obscure names and very high prices, overall.  

While the place is attractive and the food well prepared, it remains in the view of this diner to be overpriced for the entirety of what is received.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: El mejor restaurante de todo Breckenridge. Regresaría una y otra vez. Que delicia

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This place was absolutely fantastic. The service was stellar and the food beyond amazing. Great experience!!

name: Kira
review_text: My husband and I dined here for my birthday and it was nothing short of amazing. Our server was amazing and the food was impeccable as well.

name: MargaretF
review_text:
The food was superb. The service was attentive. 
I enjoyed the vegan pumpkin pie brûlée.

name: TheBasicB
review_text: Outstanding. Beautiful, delicious meal accompanied by outstanding, attentive service.

name: dennisk
review_text: The Aurum happy hour is the BEST in Breckenridge - great salads, curry cauliflower, and an awesome tasting hamburger.  Definitely would recommend to all...

name: MRoll
review_text:
We went for happy hour, which is of incredible value. The food and drinks are amazing. Overall, we had a great time. We are going to come back to try their tasting menu.

The server charged us the wrong amount... twice and ended up double charging us; we had to call to fix the charge.

name: John
review_text:
Nice experience at the bar,
Good food, good selection

name: LizR
review_text: Fantastic place on a quieter side of Breckenridge!  Great service!  Best charcuterie platter in a long long time-!  NY strip steak gets a 10/10!  Very expensive wine markups, so we enjoyed the craft cocktails.  Wlll be back!

name: KarenL
review_text: There for Happy hour and beyond. Happy hour very reasonable and portions generous esp love the crispy cauliflower and our entree the barrumandi was deliscious and inventive. Our anniversary date .. thank you for the complimentary bubbly and card! We will be back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Entree was excessively salty. Chicken was overcooked. We waited a long time for our entree and noticed other people who were seated after us were being served their food before us. Overall under whelming experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Went to celebrate with friends for her birthday. Got there right when they opened. Beautiful interior and delicious Happy Hour! Our server Christine was amazing! Overall, a lovely time!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great service. Our server was the best, the food is good and sofisticated but we felt it was overpriced for the food you get.

name: deewass
review_text: An absolutely outstanding meal. The food was simply exceptional.  And what we didn't order and saw come to tables made us want to order again. The portions are really large.  We split 2 entrees, which was great because we were able to try both dishes.

name: KellyM
review_text: Food was absolutely amazing! Beet salad to French onion soup … lovely space that has been nicely redone to accommodate a cozy amount of diners … portions were larger than expected but really delicious ! Highly recommend

name: Funfoodie7
review_text: Our first and last experience. Limited menu. Server was inky ok. Can’t quite understand the hype. There are so many other good restaurants in Breck, we will go there.

name: AlaneM
review_text: We went for Happy Hour at 4:45 pm after a day on the slopes. We were seated on time. We had a reservations and that was helpful.  We had multiple items from the happy hour food menu. Favorites were the mushroom polenta, Korean chicken and French onion soup burger and fries. All full size appetizers and burger at a nice price. Definitely recommend.

name: AaronR
review_text: Excellent apps, bar menu, and above all service.  Very much enjoyed happy hour at this gem of Breckenridge.  Every year we ski here, we dine at Aurum.  Highly recommend!!

name: JohnB
review_text: Great place. Sometimes the entrees are to complicated and the sides are overpowering. The main entree item should be the star, not the accompanying items.

name: dineordie
review_text: Aurum is our favorite! We go at least once on every visit to Breckenridge.

name: DavidC
review_text: Best Happy Hour in Breckenridge!  Everything was great.  Make reservations since the bar fills up quickly.

name: KimH
review_text: Best dinner we had in Breck! All fresh farm to table delicious food! The Korean BBQ wings were fantastic and the short rib is a must have. Would love to come back and highly recommend to anyone staying in town!

name: MichaelW
review_text: One of my favorite restaurants in Breck.  As a local, there aren’t too many places I’m willing to spend my money at…Aurum is one of them.  Excellent food.

name: susang
review_text: Service staff was not at all attentive.  Had to track down wait staff for drinks and pepper.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: amazing happy hour deals. huge portions of food. loved it

name: JPugh
review_text: Amazing happy hour, good value. Great service. Lots of kids and noisy tourists, oh well

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best restaurant in Breckenridge. Service and food is always great

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great value happy hour.  Great food and excellent service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aside from the food, it was an amazing experience.

name: DebiN
review_text: This is a must eat for our family!  From the moment you walk in the door- the vibe is friendly and service amazing even when they are packed.   Trust the Chef here!  Specials are amazing!  Share the small plates and even the entrees, but save room for an Expresso Martini and table desserts!

name: KaitlynO
review_text: This is one of my go-to happy hours in Breck. Their food is consistently good - the Korean fried chicken and french onion burger are standouts - the service is quick and friendly, the vibes are great, and the cocktail menu is creative. They have a great happy hour from 4-6 with really good deals on both food and drinks, which is what keeps us coming back!

name: NorthvilleSusan
review_text: We ordered trout and duck and both were tasty.  A bit pricey, but we were in Breckenridge.

name: Matt
review_text: Good food with a Colorado twist that is put together in a culinary fashion that mirrors the architectural decor which is fresh and modern, yet Breckenridge rustic.

name: PatrickH
review_text: One of the best restaurant experiences we've had in Colorado. Cauliflower, crudo, pork belly, and trout were all phenomenal. The service was outstanding. Fully recommend it for anyone visiting Breckenridge.

name: AlexM
review_text: Great service and a very unique menu. We enjoyed all of our items. While the restaurant is pricey, it's standard for Breck. Would definitely recommend to others.

name: IsabelleS
review_text: We love going to Aurum with our kids for happy hour. The food is great and the Happy Hour menu is really excellent and affordable. We especially love the Bib salad. We think it has changed a little bit from the first time we went (smaller size) but still excellent. The service staff is just outstanding, very friendly, quick to respond to needs and very knowledgeable. We will be back!

name: NolanC
review_text: Great experience,  Chef Jim and his team have a very approachable, yet very elevated menu. The service team was also very knowledgeable and didn't steer us wrong with recommendations. Happy hour was a great bang for the buck too. The ambiance is quaint, but modern. Good contemporary music to fit the feel. Cocktail and wine lists are excellent as well. 10/10 would reccomend.

name: TylerR
review_text: This was probably the best place i’ve ever eaten. Have to get the duck, the bread with honey butter, and the cookies!!!!

name: disappointed
review_text: Appetizer dishes, pasta of the day with scallops :) and happy hour lite bites were outstanding, chicken main course was a bit large and ordinary. Overall it was a very enjoyable dinner at a busy time and thoughtful accommodation of our large group with excellent service. More casual than Aurum in Steamboat, it was a great choice for our group.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is our favorite restaurant in Breck. Cocktails are perfect, food is amazing. It is always a treat!

name: TaraA
review_text: My daughter and I had Christmas dinner there. The charcuterie board and trout were absolutely outstanding!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Christmas steak on the bone for two was not worth a $180. Elect flavor. It was very mediocre. The rest of our experience was very good.

name: Dining
review_text: Excellent dinner from the appetizers to the dessert! And the service was perfect. Love to the cauliflower appetizer, and the Caesar salad. Had the rainbow trout, which was also very good just slightly on the over salted side,  subjective, but otherwise excellent.

name: marymac
review_text: Great food, staff and an always place to visit when in town!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
This was one of the best dinners our family has had in a long time. The food was fresh, the trout was outstanding, and the Korean fried chicken was delicious. The service was extremely attentive
and provided us everything we needed Kudos to this little gem of a restaurant that we can’t wait to visit again!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Great food
Not too loud
Would go again
Nice evening

name: JenniferY
review_text: Seated by window which was freezing cold and had no light by which to read the menu.

name: Anonymous
review_text: We love Aurum. Great food, drinks, kids menu, and service.

name: FoodieService
review_text: Everything is wonderful and certainly one of the gems for Breckenridge. Both of their establishments are First Class. My only critique is that the appetizers are more tasty and unique than the entrees.  Still good but the “snacks” and “shared plates” are better. The steak was fine but nothing special.

name: BrookeW
review_text: We had a solid meal at Aurum, though it is pricey.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We come to Breck every year and sometimes twice.  Aurum is a must for us and their Happy Hour is a fantastic deal.  Fantastic food, service, and atmosphere.  Our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing dinner, my favorite place is Breckenridge and it’s not even CLOSED

name: AlexM
review_text: Food was great! Fried cauliflower apps and pork belly were delicious. All entrees were perfect. Cocktails were also great! Menu rotates periodically as well so always something fresh. Highly recommend.

name: juliez
review_text: Best happy hour in town. All of the staff go out of their way to make it a great dining experience. We go often enough that we’re getting to know the team and they are all awesome.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aurum never disappoints. Great happy hour, delicious food and attentive, kind staff.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Went during happy hour and it was an amazing deal. All the food and drinks we had were so good and the service was great. So glad we were able to grab a last minute reservation!

name: JayK
review_text: We live near Breckenridge and go there often. First time at Aurum. The food and service were impeccable. We will be back!

name: BenjaminS
review_text: We showed up at 4:30pm to catch happy hour and dinner for our Anniversary. They were able to seat us early and had champagne ready to toast. Service was great, food was incredible, and staff was very attentive… but not overly so. Very impressed, will be back.

name: EmmaS
review_text: Fantastic place! Great unique cocktails, made even better by a great happy hour deal, and amazing food. We ended up ordering more and look forward to coming back again 😊 Staff was also super friendly and accommodating. Incredibly respectful and beautiful cozy ambiance

name: JLS2016
review_text: James makes a great cocktail! The entire team is super friendly and customer focused. Sam stood out and was a delight!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Blown away by the food and the service. Ambiance was wonderful. Get the rolls and the burrata!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: A must try is “Cookies and Milk” dessert, best ever chocolate chip cookies with whipping cream and sauce. Food is perfectly cooked and delicious. Raoul, our server, is amazing.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Sam and Chrissy are great! Food is great. Excellent burger.

name: PamD
review_text: Wow, fantastic meal!  The chef really knows how to attend to balancing flavors and textures for a foodie's dream dinner!   We had a couple of designer cocktails which were equally crafted.  For dessert:  "Grandma's Wassail" with Bourbon!  We're locals, so we'll now elevate this place to "Best in Summit"!!

name: PbnJ
review_text: It was a great evening with great food, service, and specially with a compliment dessert.

name: JohnBoy
review_text: Menu was slightly weak with not as many choices as some. Thought that price was a bit high for the items (at full price)  but because of the 2 for 1 off season entrees seemed like an excellent value. Food offered well prepared.

name: Jean
review_text: Food is good and service is always good but the noise level is really not comfortable.  We came early to avoid the noise but that did not work so I am thinking we will not be returning unless we can get a side booth.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Scallops were divine, the vegetables and duck were superb. But the steak was impossible to cut or chew.

name: Joanne
review_text: I found Aurum on a website as a recommended dining spot in Breck and it was a delight. When we walked in the decor was super rustic, the staff was very attentive. When ordering my husband got the prix fixe menu and they were accommodating in allowing me to do the same but with some alterations to courses as I do not eat raw meat for the beef tartar section. Great wining parings with all the courses and timing of the meal. The food was beautifully seasoned and would definitely come back again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food, great service and cool ambiance. They also do a fantastic job accomodating food sensitivities.

name: Mimima24
review_text: Aurum does not have a large menu, but their items are worth going there. The service is great as are the cocktails.  They are close to town, so easily accessible.

name: KImR
review_text: The menu at Aurum is always interesting and well crafted.  They do superb cocktails and the service gets better every time we visit.

name: GabriellaT
review_text: Great ! Made our experience awesome even had a birthday sign

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: So amazing!!! The only thing that annoyed me is we had a reservation at 7, restaraunt was fairly empty and they didn’t have our table set and ready so we had to wait. Happened for another large reservation that came in - they didn’t have the table set for them . Food was so great though I’ll definitely be back

name: SharonM
review_text:
Wonderful experience. Glad dining room wasn’t full otherwise it would have been too loud. Food was delicious & my only complaint was that it was a bit cold. I like my food HOT if it’s supposed to be warm.
Service was great. It’s one of my favorite spots in Breckenridge.

name: SueS
review_text: We love Happy Hour here.  It was also 1/2 price entrees.  Food here is always delicious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
The service was wonderful, they were helpful &  attentive - the menu was diverse - and the food was incredible.

We had our family Thanksgiving dinner here - the special feature entree was great, and the rest of the fall menu equally as good.  PS - order the chocolate cookies for desert.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Wonderful way to enjoy Thanksgiving dinner !
Server - Stephanie was great!!!

name: Sara
review_text: Excellent from start to finish.  As always, the staff was attentive, but not overly so, the food was outstanding, the atmosphere was festive.  We LOVE Aurum and can't wait to visit again!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful food, service and ambiance. Highly recommended.

name: EverettS
review_text: We had a wonderful dinner and Raul was a fantastic server. Knowledgeable, friendly and great suggestions

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: I brought my son to celebrate his graduation and the employees treated us so kindly and were eager to celebrate with us. The food was absolutely wonderful and not a bite left. Thank you Chef.

name: RuthS
review_text: We are true foodies and this is one of the top experiences we have had in a long time. The food is innovative and fresh. The service is over the top without being too attentive. We would drive from Denver to Breckinridge just for dinner. Don’t miss this place. Best Happy Hour in Breckenridge. Can’t wait to return

name: MaraMiles
review_text: We used to love Aurum.  We have been there several times.  Not so much on this last visit. We were celebrating my husband’s birthday and usually they will give you a complimentary glass of champagne or bithday dessert when you are celebrating a special occasion.  We did not get the champagne, which is okay and then they charged us for the birthday dessert.  None of those are the ones that cause my lowered rating though.  The reason why we were not happy this time is mostly because of our server.  He took forever to get back to us and we ended up serving the wine ourselves as he never even tried.  Service was slow. Regarding the food, we both ordered the NY Strip and my husband received a steak mostly fat.  He was able to eat just some of it.  It was really disappointing.
