I have to say that all our previous experiences were awesome.  This time was not.  I will give them another try but if this continues most probably we won’t go back or recommend.  Anyone can have a bad day.

name: LindaM
review_text: Excellent service and ambience.  The carrot soup and pasta of the day were delicious as was the cesar salad.  The big disappointment was the mushroom soba.  While the broth and mushrooms, fried and stewed, were wonderful, the soba noodles were mushy.  Had they been al dente, the dish would have been one I’d order again.  The homemade ice creams, chocolate and salted caramel were outstanding with deep flavor.  We also got the chocolate chip cookies as a birthday dessert:  warm and accompanied by a cream and milky sauce, neither of which were necessary to enjoy the cookies.

name: DaveS
review_text: As always a great experience at Aurum. Food is spectacular and happy hour makes it a great deal!!!

name: ChrisR
review_text: Our meals were less than good.  My trout was good, but the rest of my dish was covered with green veggies that were completely overwhelming the plate and my senses.  Marginal at best.  Others that had the scallops said they were just OK, slightly over cooked and not that fresh.  As a local there some really good restaurants in Summit County, so i hope that mgt and the chef improve the food quality and presentation!

name: RobertA
review_text: Our Lobster Bisque tasted great. The entrees were excellent,  scallops and trout. And our server, Kristen was excellent as well. Our hostess Brittany also checked in several times to make sure everything went well. If you get a chance to go on 50% off entree nights, Do IT!

name: Breck
review_text: Elegant, creative dishes in generous servings. Servers go above and beyond.

name: Chris
review_text: Fantastic food and service!  Highly recommend..  Definitely try happy hour.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Not much for gluten free & dairy free options but the menu was labeled well.
The food was a bit underwhelming for the price point.
Husband got the duck - which itself was delicious but the gnocchi it was served with was undercooked and floury.
His Negroni was not made right - flavor and color was off.
The Arctic char tartare was extremely fishy.
The Zucchini capellini was disappointing - the zucchini was lukewarm and I expected a bit more from the dish than zucchini noodles, apple slices and beet sauce for the price.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic experience, good and service were wonderful. Will definitely be back!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Don’t waste your time on the 50% off entree special through Dec 6. Menu was limited.
My husband had the strip that he said was average at best. I had the $2 worth of zucchini noodles they passed off as an entree. I normally love this place l, but not tonight.

name: Jenn
review_text: Great service and food!  Love the midweek specials on the entrees also.

name: Carolyn
review_text: Excellent food and service. Wonderful Happy Hour variety! My favorite restaurant in Breckenridge!

name: EricM
review_text: First time at the Breck location. Really great food, awesome drinks, tasty desserts and stellar service!

name: KristenG
review_text: I went to Aurum happy hour for my birthday and it was the perfect experience.  The atmosphere was beautiful, staff was friendly & attentive, and the food was amazing. On top of the that, the happy hour prices were very reasonable.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The entrees were very good. The chocolate chip cookie dessert was a bit over cooked. The service was excellent.

name: RDZW
review_text: Fall wine dinner was terrific, from passed appetizers to dessert.  Wine pairings were spot on with unique selections.  Looking forward to next year’s.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food and top notch service! Would highly recommend

name: ClifH
review_text: Never disappoints… great food and service! Don’t miss Happy hour !

name: DakotaK
review_text: My partner and I came to the Aurum for our 4 year anniversary and we were incredibly impressed. The service was amazing, they took really good care of us. The food was phenomenal, especially the Korean fried chicken and duck entrée. The pacing of the food was also really good. If you're in Breck, I would highly recommend going here!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We booked this place thinking it might be a little fancy for our taste w/ a kiddo under 2 but we were BLOWN away with how delicious it was. Best fries I’ve ever ate in my life! And the lobster bisque was to die for. My husband had the French onion burger and wouldn’t stop talking about it. But the real star was the wedge salad. Holy freakin moly. We are big wedge salad fans and get them at basically every where we go and this place absolute takes the cake! Hands down best wedge salad I’ve ever had the pleasure of letting my taste buds indulge on. Literally 🔥

name: BenK
review_text: Fabulous food, terrific service and wonderful ambience. A brilliant restaurant we enjoyed tremendously. The scallops were to die for!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had had a late lunch so we’re not super hungry. Charcuterie board was good, didn’t care for Caesar salad. Dessert was good. Our server was wonderful.

name: laurac
review_text: Great food and service! We made a meal on snacks and small plates, excellent cauliflower dish and the Smokey polenta is a must!

name: Allison
review_text:
Amazing food and ambiance! We had the happy hour cauliflower and fries which were both delicious. We will
definitely return!

name: Amanda
review_text:
An amazing eatery in the heart of Breck! Chef is super enthusiastic about his dishes and it is proven within the shared plates. We enjoyed the lobster bisque, smoked pork belly, and “from the farmer’s market” salad. Can’t go wrong with the Parker House Rolls either!

Aurum Breckenridge is such a beautiful building with a sophisticated atmosphere, perfect for any occasion. 
Highly recommend prioritizing a reservation here when visiting Breck. We will be back next time!

name: Susan
review_text: Aurum is amazing!!  You should definitely try it when you are in Breckinridge.

name: JoyT
review_text: Rowan greeted us quickly with a glass of champagne for our anniversary. He explained all the menu and explained everything well.  Our entree’s were delicious and generously portioned.

name: Zelda
review_text: We always try to visit Aurum when we're in Breckenridge and we are never disappointed. Great food and great service every time.

name: ClarkM
review_text: Enjoyed a happy hour meal on a Monday night. Very enjoyable meal

name: JohnnyQ
review_text: Best happy hour in Breckenridge.  Great options for vegetarians. Cool decor and great cocktails

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The service was excellent. The food, specifically the soup was cold when it came out. Not the restaurants fault but the table of four next to us was extremely loud with several tables noticing.

name: Teege
review_text: Second time eating here and the food was delicious.  This time the service was slow from the time our order for our entrees were placed until the time we received our food.  We caught the end of happy hour so it was very busy when we arrived.  We were able to order happy hour priced drinks along with a few appetizers.  The curry cauliflower was especially good!  I would definitely eat there again as the food does not disappoint.   I would say if you are looking for a restaurant where you can easily talk to others or have a more intimate dining experience, I would go somewhere else.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful as always!!! We make our reservations weeks  before we arrive so we don’t miss dining at our Breckenridge favorite!!!

name: ColoCamper
review_text:
Happy hour is great value. Everything we tried was delicious, except for the Char tartare. The tartare was basically just salt. Fortunately, the server without hesitation, removed it from the bill.

The Korean chicken was probably the best we tried, but only slightly better than everything else.

We ate outside, which was delightful, except for the little bugs.

It’s definitely on our go to list now.

name: DanM
review_text: Food and ambiance were excellent. Service was friendly and we would go back if in Breckenridge again. Recommend the tasting menu.

name: CarolineR
review_text: SO wonderful! The staff made our anniversary so special! The food was amazing! Would definitely come here again!

name: ChanceR
review_text: Food, drinks, and service were impeccable as always. They made a special night much more special with their attention to detail and high quality service. Dessert and cocktails were definitely a highlight for us.

name: LouC
review_text:
Great food and service , enjoyable environment.
Highly recommend

name: Sandi
review_text: We were there for happy hour and loved it.  Great food and our server, Sam, was absolutely delightful.  Next time we are in Breckenridge, we will definitely go back to Autumn!

name: LoRelS
review_text: Amazing food, staff, and service! Would highly recommend if visiting the Breck area!!

name: AdamS
review_text: great food, great service, great place! will definitely come here again!

name: AmyK
review_text: We love this restaurant, the Caesar Salad wasn't as good as it usually is. otherwise everything was outstanding!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
This was our second visit to Aurum during our stay in Breckenridge. We were assigned a very nice table, our server was excellent. The food (several appetizers and the pasta special) were excellent. We also enjoyed the IPA’s and the Spanish red wine. 
We really like Aurum (whether it is in Breckenridge or Steamboat). We will return during our next stay.

name: Mini
review_text: Great happy hour with large portions of apps. Excellent bibb wedge salad. Go to order off HH menu for food and drinks is worth it.

name: SheriL
review_text: Terrible experience.  Will not return.  The service was deplorable.  There were only 2 tables occupied in the room we were shown and the hostess wanted to seat us right next to one of the occupied tables.  We asked to be moved - she made excuses but finally found another table.  We didn't see the waiter for some time and when he did stop by it was only to say he would be back.  5-10 minutes later he returned and told us the specials without having first taken our drink orders.  When he finished his spiel we ordered a bottle of wine, a beer and a basket of bread.  The beer came later, followed by the wine even later.  The bread did not come until our entrees though we asked repeatedly.  The salads arrived eventually - they were satisfacgtory.  I ordered the duck which must have been infused with salt as it was very salty throughout (and I love salt).  The trout was dry and when the bread arrived it was dry as well.  We didn't eat it.  Overall an extremely disappointing experience.  We would not recommend it.

name: Scooke
review_text: Outstanding meal and presentation. Our server make the celebration of our 47th anniversary exceptional!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
We were at Aurum during happy hour and had a reservation. We were seated at the community table which was not too bad. The bar stools there are a total disaster though.
Food was fine : cauliflower appetizer was a nice size portion and very tasty. Burger was good, fries were okay. Korean chicken was not good, almost no chicken, just breading.
The IPA was very good.

name: Brad
review_text: great place.  we are regular customers.  -------- ------

name: Teege
review_text: The food was fantastic.  My husband had the duck and I had the trout.  The preparation was inspiring and was thoroughly enjoyable.  We also had the pasta special sharable and was very evident that it was homemade pasta.  The wait staff was very professional.  Only negative was tables were close together and the room was a bit noisy.  This was even with a less than full dining room.

name: Mike
review_text: As usual, Aurum was excellent. The happy hour was a great deal and delicious. Drinks as well.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Awesome. Has become a favorite for sure. We will certainly be back again and again

name: SteveC
review_text: Music level too high and bad acoustics in back room makes for very loud environment.  Chicken is great.  Salads are wonderful.

name: MeganD
review_text: One of the best happy hours I have been to in a long time.  The curried cauliflower was amazing and the lemon parmesan fries were so tasty.  Nice portion sizes and great service.  I will definitely be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We came here for our anniversary and had an excellent experience and meal! The staff was very friendly and had a signed note from the whole staff saying happy anniversary and gave us a complimentary champagne toast when we got sat and a complimentary dessert at the end of our meal, it was so sweet! And our food was all delicious, we highly recommend this place

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fabulous, all of it!  Kristin and Stephanie are wonderful servers.  The food is fantastic.  Thank you!

name: cher
review_text:
The staff could not have been nicer. Very friendly and accommodating from the hostess, bar tender, general manager, and waitress. Very comfortable outdoor porch setting with heaters, blankets and nice lighting. The appitizer was terrific!  Burrata, tapenade, ... delicious!!
Wedge salad very good!  Trout dinner was good with pretty presentation, but we didn't like the type of squash served tasted bitter and mushy center. Perhaps just out tastebuds.

name: DianeK
review_text: This was our first visit to Aurum.  Portions were large.  The cauliflower snack was good, but had too much spice for me.   The burrata appetizer was good with interesting flavors.  The scallops and sauce were way too spicy for me.  Service was underwhelming (had to get the server's attention several times, no check back about food quality, no urgency for requests, etc.)   The restaurant was way too noisy for my husband and me.

name: HollyG
review_text: Aurum is a lovely spot. Sadly, we had the tasting menu this time ($100 each + $50 each for wine pairing). Although each dish was tasty, the courses did not suit one another. It did not seem designed nor did it eat as a curated menu. Each dish was full size, creamy, and heavy. They did not compliment one another in tastes, textures, or flavors.

name: JenniferE
review_text: Wonderful happy hour. The staff was amazing and helpful.

name: martham
review_text: Our waitress was fantastic! We went with all of her recommendations and everything was SOOO good!!! We will make Aurum a must every time we go to our condo in Dillon!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great place, food was amazing. Drink were great but took awhile to come out. Noise level was very high, hard to have a conversation. Overall great experience

name: GaryE
review_text: Conscientious, attentive, good food choices. Made the reservation online and it asked for special occasions, celebrations, birthday etc. One choice was date night. They had champagne waiting for us when we got there. Overall would recommend this establishment from this experience.

name: Marilyn
review_text: Great happy hour and was also able to order from the menu

name: DH47
review_text: Delicious food and wonderful waitress - Birdie;fried tomatoes and chocolate chip cookies amazing!

name: TC46
review_text: We love Aurum and will be back. It’s a. Favorite for us

name: DiyaV
review_text: Amazing food

name: GIna
review_text: Need umbrellas or cover over front patio. It started to rain and no tables were available. Luckily room at community table was open

name: Schmutzy
review_text: Duck was superb as always. Burrata app was tasty but kinda weird. Mains took an unreasonable time to arrive.

name: chicagocooks
review_text: We went for my birthday to Aurum.  Loved the salads (we tried both on the menu and one special with fresh tomatoes and nectarines) and lobster bisque. The entrees were interesting and used fresh ingredients, but each had something a bit off -- unexpected spiciness, underdone duck breast, or too much salt.  The best thing was the milk and cookies dessert they brought out with a candle. Service was excellent. J

name: SteveB
review_text:
I really wanted to like this place, having walked past it several times and admired the venue, but the food got a big "meh" from me. I ordered my picanha steak - a "culotte" -  medium since picanha frequently needs to be medium to be tender. What I got was rare, and one of the, chewiest pieces of beef I've ever been served at a restaurant at this level. Would have made an Argentinian cry. The kitchen should know better.

My wife was underwhelmed by her duck breast as well. Rating it "so-so".

Server was reasonably attentive, and the kitchen did a nice job on the vegetables and presentation, but the proteins need some work. Maybe we got the kitchen on an off night, but as of now, I can't recommend this place. Still, we may try again and see if they can improve.

name: HomerK
review_text: Aurum remains our favorite restaurant in Breck.  The food absolutely never disappoints, service is outstanding, and the restaurant is always shiny clean.

name: LydiaJ
review_text: Went for an anniversary dinner. Food was great, modern decor, service was great. Staff signed a card and gave free champagne.

name: SeanH
review_text: We really enjoyed dinner at Aurum. Service was very good and the food was delicious. I feel it’s a bit expensive for what you get but I would definitely go again. I would like to see more vegetarian options.

name: AKirschne
review_text: We loved our time at Aurum. The food was amazing -- we got the duck and the steak. On top of that, the service was exceptional. They had a signed card for us since we were celebrating our anniversary and even brought us a gf strawberry shortcake on the house to help us celebrate and because I am allergic to gluten. They are definitely worth a visit in Breck!

name: COforever
review_text: Riley was delightful and gave excellent food recommrnfatuins - food and presentation were lively.

name: Stefano
review_text: I was expecting to have a nice dinner and the ny strip was terrible.   Also I wanted a bottle of wine and they had run out   Overall experience was ok but the food was not what I expected.

name: KirtleyC
review_text: Went here for my birthday dinner, which they acknowledged when we were seated. While the table next to us received cookies and ice cream to celebrate a birthday, I got nothing but a large bill. The food prep time for the entrees was also exceptionally long. Happy hour is great but would not come again for dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious and wonderful. A great meal and experience will be returning for sure

name: TamarS
review_text: Beautiful atmosphere, fantastic and creative food and excellent service made for a perfect meal. Highly recommend

name: ThomasP
review_text: We just got engaged and the entire staff shared in our excitement! They greeted us with complimentary scallops and glass of champagne. The entire experience was really great!

name: ClaytonS
review_text:
Awesome evening.  Food was wonderful and portion sizes were perfect for sharing. 
 Jamie did a great job and we will be back!

name: kjindenver
review_text: This was our first time at Autumn.  We ordered the Caesar, house made salted rolls, and shared the duck. The entire meal was exceptional, but the duck was above and beyond with duck 2 ways- a breast and leg confit- gnocchi, and pea purée. Best meal we’ve had in a long time. We actually kept talking about how good it was…the next day! We’ll be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The best duck I have ever had. Great charcuterie board, the moscato blue cheese was insanely delicious. Great overall experience will be back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: I know that all my reviews are positive, but I find my restaurants on the Open Table website, and closely read the reviews.  This restaurant was no different.  Phenomenal meal, great service, great ambience.  Lobster bisque was fantastic, wanted to lick the bowl.  Marinated Coulotte steak perfect, and the cookies and ice cream dessert awesome!  I’m running out of adjectives.  This is a don’t miss location in Breck.

name: MichelleO
review_text: What a great experience. Fine dining at the highest level! The food was impeccable. Service at the highest level. When in Breck this is a must-go!

name: KurtisB
review_text:
We had happy hour food / beverage items.  The burger was good as usual.  The french fries were over cooked and crispy.  They did not get order correct on hamburger but did provide a free dessert for the mix up. 

In addition to dinner, we purchased a gift card.  They automatically added a $3.27 kitchen charge.  I'm sure that they will also charge a 3% kitchen charge when the gift card is used, therefore, paying the kitchen charge twice.  I'm not sure why they are throwing these charges on when the food / beverage prices are already too expensive. We won't be going back any time soon.

name: WDegs
review_text: Always love the food and service at Aurum! The happy hour menu is a great deal. Highly recommend and will definitely be back!

name: TimD
review_text: Fantastic happy hour - service was excellent and the food was incredible. Particularly the cauliflower

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food - the house made pasta was something straight out of Italy. Great vibe inside and the service was also spot on.

name: Donald17
review_text:
Delightful
Gorgeous dining room
Imaginative cuisine
Perfect

name: Lance
review_text: By far the best restaurant in town! Would not go anywhere else. Great happy hour options.

name: Eric
review_text: We go to Breck every summer and this is a great spot for dinner or just a drink.  Very cool bar, great staff, and amazing food.  Try the duck.

name: DonG
review_text: This was our third visit this year. Food was very good -burger was a hit all around. Service was sub-par, particularly considering the upscale price. Server forgot water, silverware, brought the wrong drinks, etc.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Corian chicken was outstanding as usual. Caesar salad was a huge disappointment. Dressing could not have been more bland. ￼

name: CHall
review_text: We come to Breck every summer and never miss an opportunity to visit Aurum.  We first visited their location in Steamboat and were excited to hear they wete opening one in Breck!  Always great food and service!

name: Jeannie
review_text: Food was suberb!

name: BrittneyH
review_text: We enjoyed everything we tried and the restaurant was such a nice finish out. We will definitely be back.

name: DelaneyH
review_text: Our incredible dining experience at Aurum cannot be overstated! The service was fantastic, the food was to die for, and the ambiance was sublime. We will definitely be returning when we find ourselves the area again!

name: stlfoodie
review_text: Continues to be the best in Breck. Love the recent updates to the menu for summer. Only drawback on this visit was service was not up to par but I’m hopeful that is not a recurring thing.

name: Andrea
review_text: Returned for another great dining experience. Usually go for the happy hour only, but decided to add a NY strip onto the meal. The steak dish was slightly salty/tough, but maybe that was a one off. Would return again (as it’s our typical stop when we come to Breck), but would not get it again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Very cute restaurant.  Farm to table food was good, but very expensive, as you’d expect.  Noise level is very high in the dining room.  One annoyance, they add a 10% kitchen appreciation fee to the tab.  I’m 100% in favor of paying/tipping service staff generously, however, at the price point the restaurant has an obligation to treat their employees well.
Asking patrons to tip 30% so they’re well taken care of, on top of a high price point seems like they’re just shifting their responsibility to be a good employer.

name: James
review_text:
To be fair - there is no place on Earth that is perfect. The staff at Aurum Food & Wine were really good and friendly. So no concern there. 

The food was incredibly overpriced and was not good. I ordered a steak that was supposedly very lean and to be served "medium". What I received was full of tendons, fat, and incredibly undercooked. I tried my best to choke it down as I was with some clients but ended up passing on most of it. In retrospect, I should have just sent it back.

The server did address this and agreed with me that it was rare and he did speak to the chef. One of my clients did also try it and I won't share his precise words - but he did agree with me that it was below par. 

Our server did comp the deserts which were fine - but overall, for the price tag and expectations - the experience left much to be desired. The drinks were good and the wine pairing suggestion was solid. My clients had a better experience and at the end of the day, that was the most important part of the evening. However, my experience wasn't great.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Nate was our amazing server and made sure we had everything we needed. Thanks Nate! Food was 5 stars!

name: Olathe1
review_text: Very poor evening!  Dined there over the years and always were happy, not this time!  Starting with our cocktails, half the size of anywhere else and $17 & $18!  Our salads were good, but waiter never came to see if we wanted pepper (none on the table).  We ordered their burger which we told the waiter we were going to split and he asked if we wanted them to cut and put on separate plates, which we thought was nice!  He didn’t mention that there was a $7 charge for that - we didn’t ask him to do it, he offered!  Fried were just so so!  Won’t go back!!!

name: Rls2005
review_text: Our waitress was very knowledgeable and careful with a food allergy. The food was outstanding!

name: glenninternational
review_text: Insane flavors.  Adorable location.  Fun people watching

name: ScottU
review_text:
Service was outstanding; everyone there was friendly and helpful. Our server (Catherine?) was excellent, first class.
Food and drinks, as always, were awesome. The scallop plate was a perfect mix of shellfish, fruit, sauce and cake.
Noise level was, we thought, high. Music was a couple of notches too loud, it should have been barely noticeable instead of slightly overpowering; we had to raise our voices for conversation. 
Customer next to us was using his phone on business during most of our meal. Not on the restaurant, but annoying (and rude, both to us and his dinner partner).

name: Allie22
review_text: Some of the dishes were truly memorable.  I would go back for the cauliflower alone.  How do they do it?  The drinks were all on the very sweet side, which may suit some people.  Cost seemed high - $14 for a kids cheeseburger is a bit over the top, but I am glad they at least consider the children.  Lovely interior.  Mountain modern.

name: EricW
review_text: We were seated promptly for our reservation and greeted quickly by our server. However, it seems that there was some discrepancy about our server and when we told the first server we wanted to think about the wine and menu choices they left and after 10 minutes we were greeted by a different server where she took our wine order. Very soon after we placed our wine order the first server came to our table, and we explained we had already placed our wine order and he seemed surprised. Nevertheless, the second server opened the wine bottle but except for the initial pour we had to serve ourselves. We chose our food order based upon the first server's description but when the food arriver warm not hot it was not as described. My wife's piece of meat was very gristly and mostly inedible. It was not the experience we expected.

name: JulieB
review_text: It was a great experience, and we had a very nice dinner. The staff was wonderful.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It’s very rare to like everything you order at a new restaurant you googled online. But Aurum surpassed our expectations and more. We can not wait to visit again on our next stop in Denver.

name: Hoodie
review_text: We sat outside on a beautiful July evening. It was beautiful and the food was excellent.

name: AmberH
review_text: Every single thing we tried was delicious! Did a few small plates and the scallop main and felt like each thing on its own was a treat. Recommend the pork belly and the burrata! And the Rocky Mountain Ranch Water cocktail. Service was great, and they brought the most amazing chocolate chip cookies with sweet cream out for my birthday. We were not disappointed with this restaurant for our special occasion. Highly recommend!

name: DennisJ
review_text: My wife and I went to Aurum for our Anniversary. They had a table reserved with a card signed by the staff wishing us a Happy anniversary, and served us two glasses of Prosecco . The service was great and the food was out of the this world. The flavor combinations were well put together.  They served us their a complementary dessert, version of Milk and Cookies was the perfect ending to a great meal.

name: ScottyM73
review_text:
Fantastic curried cauliflower and fresh pasta of the day. Very good duck breast (a bit done but still quite nice) and Fat Elvis desert.

Service was truly outstanding, and background music feels like it was chosen just for me.

Only reason I’m 4 not 5 overall is the “market price” daily pasta, while good, was overpriced and not worth it. I should have asked. I’m not price sensitive but dislike feeling ripped off.

name: LindaB
review_text: Another great Happy Hour at Aurum!  Love the cauliflower dish, French onion burger and the chocolate cookie are awesome.

name: marymac
review_text: Our go-to restaurant with friends and family, Never a bad meal or time. Love AU!

name: TimB
review_text:
Excellent service by waitress,  Birdie! We ate outside with friends and enjoyed the food with our friends! Some friends were troubled with dogs around while we ate. I received a nice birthday treat for my birthday celebration.  Thank you!
We would definitely return in our future visits!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went for happy hour! Best in town.  The food was delicious and service was also. We have found another favorite in Breckenridge.

name: TomK
review_text: One of our favorite restaurants in Breckenridge.   We've been going there ever since they opened their doors.  The food is awesome, and the service is always outstanding.  We love their wine selection way too much.

name: NancyP
review_text: Wonderful food, great service and a beautiful setting. The only suggestion I would have would be a little more air movement, as it was a bit warm in the restaraunt.

name: JTfromSA
review_text: We arrived early for  7p reservation; sat at the bar for drinks and had the excellent curried cauliflower snack. I’m a fan of manhattans and the smoked orange manhattan was a nice twist. The staff were friendly, helpful and attentive. The tomato and peach salad was delicious as were bythe Parker house rolls. I had the trout which was delicious and served with grilled squash and cilantro risotto. It really was servings for 2; I couldn’t finish it and I was stuffed. My partner had a beef special that was served w/ grilled veggies and mashed potatoes- also delicious. He was stuffed as well. No room for dessert so we had coffee and it was fine. Fabulous menu and staff. We would dine here again on our next visit.

name: CoDeb
review_text: Aurum is our "go to" place for a great meal.  I have never been disappointed in the food or wine list.  Always a great experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was incredible, just like when we went to the Steamboat location

name: ALSKJP
review_text: Excellent all around! We sat outside. It can get warm inside.

name: TC46
review_text: We’ve been there before and have returned several times. It’s a fun place for happy hour

name: JulieM
review_text: Always enjoy our visit here! We make reservations for happy hour since they're usually full.

name: Linlomax
review_text: Good value happy hour menu and drinks. Quite attractive venue.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great little spot in Breck. Fresh food, good atmosphere and a nice overall experience.

name: RickM
review_text:
Very nice restaurant with good food and cocktails.  Server was very good.
Steak was good but not great, a little chewy.  I would still recommend as its one of the better restaurants in Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Never disappoints! Outstanding service and incredible food.

name: STGCoSprings
review_text: First time at Aurum.  Food, cocktails and service were outstanding.  Great happy hour.  We will be back

name: JohnN
review_text:
Server was excellent and provided great recommendations.
Had several specials including a super fresh tomato and apricot salad, and a delicious fettuccine in a Sherry cream sauce with small yummy bits of short rib.
Also enjoyed the smoky polenta.  It was incredible as were the Parker roll with honey butter.  Highly recommend all of it!  And check out the happy hour for some discounts on all of the amazing food.  Fantastic spot in Breck!

name: KeytotheWorldTessa
review_text:
A.M.A.Z.I.N.G!!!

As a Travel Agent I suggest this restaurant 1000%!  We are frequent visitors of Breckenridge and I have to say this is my fav place to eat in town.  From the ambiance, to the service, to the drinks, and of course the food.  I can't wait to go back!!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Loved it!  Jaime was great!  Beautiful Resturant!

name: Mike
review_text: Always a great evening at Aurum. The food is always yummy and in good portions with good prices for happy hour!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent meal. Best we had in Breckenridge. Service fell off as dinner went on, or it would have been 5 star. We had the tasting men. House made pasta was incredible and portions were quite large. Don’t miss the Parker House Rolls.

name: MaureenK
review_text: The steak melted in our mouths, the vegetables were amazing and the staff was very knowledgeable about gluten free. Absolutely would make the drive from Denver to eat there again!

name: KristaW
review_text: Outstanding dining experience at Aurum!  We came here to celebrate our 30th anniversary and our server (Jamie) was knowledgable and took care of us.  Plate and wine pairings were absolutely perfect.  Bravo for a wonderful evening!

name: Steven
review_text: Having a quieter restaurant with local ingredients, several gluten free options, and mocktails was a welcome surprise.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Service was very slow, and three of the glasses served to our table of 6 had to be sent back because they were dirty (stuff stuck to the rim of one and heavy lipstick on the other two). The short rib special was almost inedible. Very tough and chewy. One of the group’s was good (4 of us ordered it), which made me think they were running out and tried to ‘hurry up’ another batch (hard to do with braised ribs). Offered nothing - not even an apology - for the food that we sent back.
Was very disappointed because we’d previously had an amazing meal there and brought back a group of 6 after we’d raved about it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Always love their happy hour food and drinks!  You will be back!!

name: Cara
review_text: Christine was a great server! Very friendly, knowledgeable and perfectly coursed out our food family style like requested. As always, Aurum did not dissappoint!

name: RuthA
review_text: The food itself was amazing. I didn't feel like the service and ambience were of the same caliber and the prices were pretty high, even for Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food! Loved the menu selections and drinks

name: MichaelH
review_text: We sat at a high-top but it was still a lovely experience.  Our server was  great especially when she and the kitchen helped with a food allergy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: So amazing!!! Everything was wonderful!

name: Duane
review_text: Really great meal at Aurum. We did the spring pri fixe which was three courses. Added the crispy curry cauliflower to start.  Everything was really good except my wife’s entree.  The manager was wonderful and provided a comp against the bill.  The timing was a bit off with us waiting a really long time between courses.  Overall it was a nice evening and really good meal. We will return.

name: TiffanyS
review_text: The best happy hour around! Great prices portions, drinks and of course the food is so good!! Parker house rolls, French onion burger, salads, and fries and more… just so delicious!! We go to Breckenridge often and this is always on our go to list! Make a reservation!

name: sueo
review_text: Unpleasant experience to say the least.  We were a group with 3 tables. Several of us got the prix fix menu and the staging was unacceptable and awkward.  They would serve one person, then 20 minutes until the next person.  The wine pours that were to accompany were not poured along with the course.  After expressing our concern, the manager then brought two complimentary appetizers to our table.  We then waited another 20+ minutes for the next course for half the table while others watched the rest of the table eat.  I would skip this restaurant until they can figure out the flow of the kitchen and how to appropriately serve their customers.

name: Rogerski
review_text: The menu was pretty limited with choice and for a high-end restaurant would only consider the food only ok nothing special!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Awesome Aurum 
Best Gourmet   Burgers and Fries anywhere
Love this place

name: MelissaK
review_text: Our server was awesome! They also gave us complimentary champagne for our anniversary.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food & service top notch! The plating was beautiful.

name: c46688
review_text: The service was outstanding!  They have changed their menu a bit since pre-COVID and it is less shared plates.  But we loved the dishes that we had!

name: AubreyT
review_text: Great happy hour value with high quality food and cocktails.  The curry cauliflower was amazing.  There was a delicious arugula and burrata salad special.  The service was great.  Definitely one of my best dining experiences in Breckenridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Still as good as ever.  We have enjoyed going to Aurum since it first opened, and it has retained its quality in both food and service.  Prices have gone up somewhat, but in line with other restaurants of similar caliber. We were glad to visit in the off-season as it is always hard to get a reservation.

name: KristiL
review_text: We love Aurum. It’s our go to place in Breck. Their happy hour is amazing.  Regular menu is pricey but worth it for the gourmet flavors. Always have a good experience here.

name: Jess
review_text: Aurum is our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge - we never miss a time to stop in. This stop was for my husbands birthday and they made it feel so special! The pasta special with duck was incredible and the burger should never be missed!

name: NancyM
review_text: As always excellent service and delicious food & cocktails. Great variety of offerings and ideal to split between people. Have never been disappointed when dining there.

name: ShannonG
review_text: Outstanding service and the food is incredible. The deals at happy hour are incredible. The prefixe was also incredible (beet carpaccio was to die for) We go to Aurum every chance we get and are so excited for the new restaurants to open soon!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The server had great knowledge and was very attentive. The bartender made wonderful cocktails. We were approached by the manager on duty who was very kind. The food had a fabulous presentation and tasted incredible. Will be back soon.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Ed was a great server and we loved our date night dinner, as always!
Great offer with the new restaurant card too!
Thank you!

name: Wally
review_text: They weren’t busy so no noise issues. All around exceptional.

name: SummitCounty
review_text: The food was delicious- the service could go to the next level with a description from the waiter when the plates were presented.

name: JohnC
review_text: They included a 3% kitchen appreciation surcharge. This should be included in the cost of each item to reflect the true cost of items on the menu.

name: Shirl
review_text: Great food! The wine was a little pricey. Wait staff was excellent!

name: ChrisC
review_text: Other than waiting 10mins for a server and 20 more for a drink the food and ambience were stellar.

name: Dwight
review_text: Nice restaurant. Worth the stay.  Happy Hour is good also.

name: Dheovlotn
review_text:
We went for happy hour and really enjoyed the cauliflower and burger. The waiter could tell we were on the fence about an order of fries and burger and told us to just get the burger sine it has the same amount of fries.

Very kind and helpful staff. Definitely recommend for a date night, friend get-together, family outing, or company meetup, great for all occasions.

name: AmyM
review_text: Burger used to be better but still a great restaurant.

name: CristinaG
review_text: Food was delicious and service was excellent. Yum!

name: Curt
review_text: Amazing meal, service, and ambiance! The unique twists in ingredients, flavor, and presentation make this stand out! Excited for additional restaurants opening soon...

name: PatW
review_text:
Great high end restaurant.  We had the trout (excellent!!), and the duck, which was good, but the gnochi/pea side dish was an amazing taste treat and visually stunning.
Highly recommended, pricey but I don't mind paying extra for "art".

name: Kacy
review_text: Enjoyed the Happy Hour menu but also tried the octopus carpaccio which was outstanding.

name: Jean
review_text: Loved the hamburger snack! Waiter was wonderful.  Plan on coming again!

name: marymac
review_text: Always a great place, food, service but table next to us of 4 women very loud and rude to surrounding tables.

name: AlyV
review_text: Celebrated birthday here and staff Lorina was awesome! Food was great. Tried the shared plate of pastrami salmon and smoked pork belly (flavorful and so soft)  loved the rocky mountain trout as well and their lemon meringue! Parker house roll nor their butter did not taste any special tho. Overall would still try again, would like to see what’s in store for a golden ticket.

name: PattiN
review_text: Always enjoy eating here. The ambience is great and the food is consistently delicious and the staff is always attentive.

name: erict
review_text: We have never written a bad review of a restaurant. We have also not had 4 dishes so poorly executed. Didn’t finish any of them. No idea how Google rating is 4.7 with over 500 reviews. Salmon tartare was really lox and very little of it. Butternut squash fritters were solid dough and you had to work hard to find the squash flavor especially with the overpowering tomatoe pure. The baguette was served with a steak knife. They knew how hard it was. It was also stone cold and the cheese stuff inside did nothing to exhannce the dish. Even the salad with it was impossible to finish as the bitterness of the ridiccio overpowered everything else. So we decided to share the French onion burger to be safe and even that was bad. Buns were burnt. It had crazy flavor that overpowered the burger yet there was nothing on the bun or burger to scrape off and try to make it edible. The wine and server were both great but would never go back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One of our favorite restaurants when we visit Breck. The food is always delicious and we love that they have steak and trout on the kids menu! Very cool restaurant.

name: CarolR
review_text: Always a favorite when we are in Breckinridge. The appetizers are generous and delicious! Craft cocktails are a must!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Brittney was a fantastic server—all her recommendations were spot on. The food (octopus, beef, and duck fettuccine) were all delicious and gave us a feeling of nostalgia/being at home.

name: norwich1977
review_text: Excellent food!  A great place for a romantic dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Literally the absolute best! Venue, service, food, drinks! To die for

name: JenniferF
review_text: Absolutely delightful. The food is top-notch, and their happy hour deals are the BEST in Breckenridge! Our server was attentive and kind. Great experience.

name: Joneany
review_text:
I usually go to Aurum each time I come to Breck but this time they were off. The Parker rolls were semi stale and a bit hard on top. The cauliflower was still amazing and then it went way off. The Caesar salad had no taste and my daughter and I didnt eat it. We both got the trout and what a disappointment.  Pretty inedible and tasted fishy meaning the trout needed to be thrown out a couple of days prior.
We ate about three bites each. Server never asked if we liked it when he could clearly see food was untouched.
It will be some time before I go back for a high priced experience of bad food no matter how spectacular the ambiance.

name: PriscillaM
review_text: Over priced for lack of flavorful food. For example the beef tartare barely had beef and had more mushrooms for substance. The duck was served without crispy skin and was barely warm. We ordered 2 apps, 2 entrees and 2 glasses of wine for about $250. Our waitress was amazing and the staff was nice, but quality of food was not worth the price.

name: MaraMiles
review_text: We discover this Aurum on our last trip to Breckenridge.  I was a little upset because it was great but we were leaving the next day and we were not going to be able to go back again until we return to the area. We are back and this is the first restaurant we visited.  Then and now the food is excellent, delicious!  Service is amazing.  One of our favorite restaurants in Breckenridge.  Definitely will recommend to family and friends.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Very good overall, my trout was only warm, wished it was a little hotter. Great service!

name: wfd810
review_text: Happy Hour is a superb value. Curried cauliflower, Korean fried chicken, and the hamburger outstanding. Limited draft beer selection, and by the glass wine pours seemed small.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Management was first indifferent and then rude to our requests. Food was ok, but not worth the price. Service, although friendly was very insufficient, especially considering the prices they charge. Wont come back. Much better options in Breck.

name: StarLazyR
review_text: Great food! Love the cocktail menu. Will definitely be back again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Outstanding food and value!  Brian is a very good waiter.  We did enjoy the wine recommended by the sommelier

name: Diner1
review_text: Entrees were under seasoned and illogical (strange flavor combos that sounded interesting but didn’t work) and vegetarian entree was insultingly paltry and bland for over $30.  Cocktails were the only well executed items.

name: RRFoodie
review_text:
We loved this restaurant. We had a combo of Happy Hour and regular menu items. The HH prices are great. The crispy cauliflower, Korean chicken, beef tartare were outstanding. The Caesar salad was solid but nothing special. And the octopus carpaccio was good but the octopus was overwhelmed by the garnishes. 
The service was outstanding and all in all a great value.

name: Dinnerout
review_text:
Stephanie, from Macedonia, was an amazing service. She paced the meal, reminded us of the happy hour and was pleasant to talk to.

The food was excellent and unique. Best happy hour! Will be back

name: JohnS
review_text: DO NOT ORDER THE COULLOTTE STEAK. Flavorless shoe leather. Very well presented. Good sides. But the quality of the main was a joke. Ate maybe 1/2 and I really wanted a steak

name: Charlie
review_text: Food was excellent! If you are. Foodie and you like creative chefs, you will love this place. Great service too.

name: RyanP
review_text: Still as good as always.  One of the best dinner choices in Breck year after year.

name: mlb976
review_text: Wonderful dinner with my boyfriend and our parents. Delicious food, great drinks, and wonderful conversation

name: SteveCCIM3009
review_text: This is from folks in the restaurant trade: Our waiter seemed disinterested and rushed. We asked if the Caesar salad would pair well with the Baked  Baguette dish (really a salad) and the Zucchini Cappelini. The Caesar was good, but not grea.  The Zucchini dish was very good and not overcooked.  The Baked Baguette didn't pair well with the Caesar and was only fair.  Our waiter likely could have put some thought into it and made better suggestions. We've found several amazing restaurants in Breckenridge, but this one either had a bad night or is trading on the captive out of town folks. Too many other great, or very good, choices in the area to go back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent happy hour with unique cocktails and food.

name: Mamamao
review_text:
Great service, wonderful food
Lively atmosphere
Very professional staff

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The ambiance was charming and modern and the food was delicious. On top of  that the service was top notch and our waiter had great recommendations. Would highly recommend.

name: PaigeA
review_text: We enjoyed happy hour at Aurum and it was a very nice experience in the adorable (although increasingly crowded) ski town of Breckenridge. Dinner is pretty expensive but happy hour was quite reasonable.

name: Annette2732
review_text: We had great service and great food.  We always enjoy celebrating special occasions at Aurum!

name: Agagag
review_text: Food was delicious. Server forgot many things, but made things right. Very loud restaurant and hard to make conversation with our table. Great happy hour menu!  I would come back again for the food.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was good and happy hour was good.  Not a great selection of kid options (no kid chicken options).  It also was a bit loud.  Overall though we enjoyed dinner.

name: flysooz
review_text: We booked a "high top" in the bar area for 3 people for happy hour (4pm). I walked in 3 days before the reservation to confirm and saw we were allocated a high top table in the bar area. The day of our reservation, however, there was a different group already seated at the table I was shown was going to be for us, and we were put in a booth (not desirable for us) in the back of the restaurant. The back area has more of a restaurant/cafe vibe than happy hour, bar vibe. It is quieter in the back if you have anyone "hard of hearing" but for our group, the ambience wasn't what we'd booked. The did enjoy the food and found the happy hour food specials to be a good value ($5-$16.) But a HH chardonnay was $19...not a great value. To be fair, Aurum does have some $9-12 dollar wines, $9 cocktails, and $5-7 beers.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Very nice meal and service. Would recommend and would go again. Thank You. M

name: MarkC
review_text: Food was fabulous. Stephanie proved fantastic service. The GM Greyson stop by the table and made a wine recommendation that was wonderful. Aurum is one of regular stops and will continue to be.

name: AmandaS
review_text: We had the chef’s tasting menu and it was fantastic! My only suggestion would be to slow it down! We have dined here numerous times and it has always been wonderful.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Family in town for spring break. Once again, everyone loved their meal at Aurum and we had fantastic service. By far my favorite restaurant in Breck!

name: SteveW
review_text: We had great NY strip steak and duck! Nice atmosphere

name: Tysons57
review_text: Friendly service, excellent, wide range of dishes, interesting wine list.

name: Andrea
review_text: This is a great neighborhood gem.  The food, staff, and experience is a definite Brekenridgde go to restaurant 👍

name: Sara
review_text: Aurum is our favorite restaurant -- hands down!  Our evening was made special by the warm greeting of the receptionist, the quick attention of our outstanding server, Stefanie, the pacing and staging of our appetizers and sharable plates, excellent wine and outstanding food!  We can't wait to visit again!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The restaurant is nice it self, but The tastes were completely off. And we got the 5 meal experience package. Cost us almost $600 fro 5 meal that we barely ate. The salad was bitter. The dessert was just a chocolate mousse with no cake or anything at the bottom of it. The main course was fish or duck. Not well seasoned even with the sauce they gave. It was a very blend taste. And I requested a birthday cake for my bf, they brought it with no energy, and just put it on the table and said here just a special desert for the birthday person and left. for a $600 experience, it wasn’t worth at all. I rate it 3 out of 10.

name: NashEater
review_text: Lindsey was great and provided great recommendations!  Duck was prepared well, apps were interesting and flavorful!

name: Bravohappy
review_text: This is always one of favorite places to dine in Breck. Excellent service and food was prepared perfectly! We always enjoy the happy hour menu. Per usual, spot on! We love Aurum!

name: WinterParkDiner
review_text: We have been to Aurum in Breckenridge and Steamboat Springs and both were amazing.   Great, innovative food and ambience.

name: cleveFood24
review_text: Delicious food, good small plates. Service was top-notch.

name: MicheleS
review_text: It was fantastic! The food, the service, the ambiance…all excellent. Highly recommend.

name: Jlynn
review_text: A wonderful dining experience!

name: GEMom
review_text: Cozy atmosphere, fantastic food, attentive and friendly service.  Mussels appetizer so flavorful.  Duck and bass entrees were excellent.  Don’t miss the flourless chocolate torte.

name: Delicious
review_text: The staff was exceptional. From the hostess, wait staff and bartender everyone was so accommodating. The food was excellent!

name: TeresaR
review_text: Menu is limited. $56 NY Strip was tuff and tasteless the chicken on the menu was fabulous as well as the chocolate torte. Super loud, great service, nice people but menu overall is meh

name: Captdev
review_text: Love the restaurant, consistent service by well trained staff.  Cuisine, including Après ski specials was outstanding, freshly made with care.  Drink were great.   Really enjoyable Restaurant looking to return to.

name: Lisa
review_text: We were staying next door so we wandered over. Amazing service. Great wine, really good food. Happy hour is nice, dinner fare is also great. Kudos to our waiter Brian who was always on top of it.

name: David
review_text: The dishes and wine on the tasting menu were decent but unremarkable.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
The homemade pasta was good but the sauce tasted like it was out of a can.

The duck and vegetables were served cold and undercooked. We asked if it was suppose to be served cold snd they said it should be hot. They took it back to the kitchen to heat it up. It was warm but not hot when they served it again. I told the waitress and she said it least it is better and walked off.

We will never go there again.

name: SusanP
review_text: This was a fun and lively place. The food was very good with nice presentation. The price tag was steep but didn’t feel bad as the food was delicious. Of course, the wine was great! I will definitely be back.

name: AlanF
review_text: Great first visit. Top notch service and artistically crafted dishes. Five stars!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food and wine tasting experience was phenomenal! Highly recommend

name: sswbaltimore
review_text: Outstanding food! Generous portions. Modern contemporary decor with a warm cozy feeling. Cute little bar up front. Really great kids menu. Favorite restaurant in Breck now.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Server was spectacular, she knew so much and tailored her suggestions for us perfectly. All of the food was exquisite - shared ‘snack’ items onion soup, Korean chicken, chèvre baguette, and special pasta which that day was delicate triangle shape stuffed with fois grois and ricotta. From the bar we started with Smoked orange old fashioneds followed by the notorious f-i-g. Top notch for sure, love our annual trip to aurum!!

name: GregM
review_text: The winter menu this year is outstanding. We had a great dinner and will be back next time we’re in Breckinridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Thoroughly enjoyed the five course tasting menu. Every course was beyond delicious and the perfect portion sizes. The service was fantastic as well. Can’t wait to come back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food.   From my 10 year old twins to my 18 year old and my wife this was perfect.  The food and service was perfect.  High quality.

name: DelDavis
review_text: The Happy Hour is an excellent way to experience Aurum’s cocktails and food. We got one of all the appetizers for 4 people to share and left paying just around $50pp. The service, food, and drinks were fantastic, and we will come back for the chefs tasting menu! Definitely make a reservation though!

name: MariaS
review_text: The restaurant is beautiful. The food was outstanding and so were the drinks. Kids menu portions were generous. Service was super friendly, even though he abandon us for a bit at the end of the meal. We loved this restaurant and will definitely return the next time we are in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing!!!!!

name: bakedbeans212
review_text:
Definitely a strange experience.  We were seated right on time which was great and the bar and front room atmosphere is warm and comforting.  Our waiter was attentive and the food and drink all came out promptly.  The crispy cauliflower was A+, the squash fritters were OK, a little bland. The house special pasta was excellent as was the baguette with goat cheese.  Here is where it turns, the waiters are hard upselling major items like " waygu steak for $115 would be great to share" or " you can add a leg to your duck breast for an additional $40".  The $8 bread and butter was not a pleasant surprise.  When the check arrived there was an additional charge tagged as " kitchen appreciation"   I asked the waiter and he said " its to ensure our kitchen staff dont quit".   I paid the check, left a 20% tip for the waiter but it struck me as odd that instead of the owner paying his kitchen staff a decent wage, he passes that responsibility on to his customers.
In the end it all seemed a bit shady and we left feeling like we just bought a used car.  Wont be returning.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best restaurant in Breck! Always consistently great service and amazing, fresh, and innovative dishes.

name: Kmied
review_text:
Bad surprise, this place is obviously overrated. We ordered a wine on the menu for which the manager or somelier discouraged us, claiming it s a weird product...thus why having it on the menu?
The food is just awful, presentation, taste, we came out astonished by what we ate...The onion soup is weird, a tiny piece of bread in the middle of a broth served in a large plate and cold...The chicken Mex style is awful, the beef carpaccio looks like dog pate...a bad experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Truly fantastic. Hearthstone and this place are in their own league in Breckenridge. The food was amazing.

name: sloomis
review_text: The food and drinks were excellent as was the service. However, the ambience in the dining room didn't match the quality of the food.

name: RebeccaD
review_text: It has amazing ambiance, elevated menu and fantastic drinks!  Service was absolutely amazing!

name: Gray
review_text: food was outstanding and service was great. Only downside was this is the type of place that attracts an entitled customer base.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful food and wonderful service! Would highly recommend a visit here

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fabulous dining experience! Enjoyed the shared plate selection, highly recommend  Crispy Curried Cauliflower and Winter Sangria!

name: CameronM
review_text: The winter tasting menu was amazing! The duck confit pasta with tomatillo sauce needs to be on the menu full time!!

name: SusanFair
review_text: Nice experience, only went for a cocktail and snack during happy hour, but it was best dining in Breck! We ordered salads, a wedge and Caesar, both excellent and did not look like a half portion either for half the price. Mine was delicious butter lettuce cut on the quarter, with lovely blue chz and various other adornments, partner Caesar proclaimed very good. We ordered more and partner did end up ordering the handmade pasta du jour, a light creamy sauce over chz ravioli delish! Would venture to this place for more next time! It was towards end of visit and didn't get back there but by far best food/drink experience

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful meal!

name: GareckW
review_text: Maybe it was just something the night we were there. 30 minutes after sat, still no drinks order or menus. Seemed to be an absence of staff available as we were one of a number of tables who were constantly looking around for someone to provide menus, drinks or food. Managed to order second round drinks to accompany mains but they arrived as we were finishing our meals. Great food and ambience but just didn’t seem to happening.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Everything is amazing. If there we’re reservations available I would go night after night.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely delicious menu

name: DavidG
review_text: Great service and food

name: Dfsmon
review_text: Happy hour crushed it!

name: Tara
review_text: It took the waitress about 20 minutes to take our drink order. I wanted to order the tasting menu but since the “entire table” didn’t order it then I was not able to. However nowhere on the tasting menu does it have this information or were we informed when we were looking at the menu. Salad and dinners came out at the same time. The chef’s pasta was good but a smaller portion. Pork belly was not good. Desert was great.

name: AaronR
review_text: Wonderful winter tasting menu with wine pairing. 5 courses and every one of the better than the last.  Excellent meal and staff!

name: Sicilianfoodie
review_text: Awesome Happy Hour! Great drinks , food and service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was low quality and small portions.

name: Scott
review_text: Happy hour best bang for your buck in Breckenridge

name: Charlie
review_text: Service was excellent however burgers were NOT cooked as requested.  Too much trouble for us to send them back.

name: Lola
review_text: Excellent!!!

name: BrookeB
review_text: We did the 5 course experience and it was fantastic!! Great time and worth the value.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Our waiter was excellent.  Most of our food was great.  However, the culotte steak was chewy and it was medium rare as recommended.  The sangria and other beverages were wonderful.

name: Julie
review_text: Great food, great happy hour deals and great vibe. Everything was fresh and delicious!

name: TrudiM
review_text: Autumn was wonderful as always. We had  reservations  and were seated immediately Don’t pass up the cauliflower or.Korean chicken!

name: IvanM
review_text: Great food and ambience, reservations recommended as the place gets full after 5pm

name: jasonh
review_text: Great service, very accommodating and helpful.  Nice variety of food and everything was great on it's own.

name: RobertaF
review_text: Excellent food and service as always.  Love this place!

name: KarenP
review_text: We love coming here every time  we are in town.  Brittany gave us outstanding service and it was fun to chat with Grayson about the new place that is coming soon.  Until our next time!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Phenomenal restaurant.  Ate multiple spots in Breck and avail and this was top notch.

name: Beth
review_text: Great Happy hour. Crispy curried Cauliflower, French onion burger, fries and Caesar salad were are all fantastic. The Wassail was very tasted and warmed me up.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Ski vacation

name: MargaretF
review_text: We were shown to our table upon arrival. The waiter was excellent. We had octopus carpaccio to start with, which was delicious. A good wine list and cocktails.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Service was great but the food was not up to par, no one was pleased with there food. Would not recommend

name: ClaudiaS
review_text: What an incredible experience! Loved the Rocky Mountain drink and the Korean crispy chicken!

name: KelseyM
review_text: This restaurant has the best happy hour in Breckenridge. It was so good that we initially booked a reservation for Sunday and while finishing up our food we made a new reservation for that Thursday. We will definitely be returning if we’re ever back in Breck again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Awesome happy hour !!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The service was amazing. The food was good, but the portions are very small. I was okay but my husband was pretty hungry. For 49 he ordered the duck and only got two three inch long one inch thick pieces.

name: mexicano
review_text: la verdad esperaba más  de la comida, y el postre me ha decepcionado, las presentaciones muy regulares

name: SharonC
review_text: Steak and bass were prepared perfectly. Waitress was one of the best I have had in a while

name: GeoffG
review_text: Love the Happy Hour.  Great drinks and lots of wonderful food choices.  Make reservations to insure you get a table...it gets busy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had the best meal on our last night in town!! Food and service were both great, and it made for a perfect date night!

name: EmilyS
review_text: Amazing service and great food! We will be coming back

name: JorD
review_text: Duck was way to salty and vegetables were under cooked.

name: Cara
review_text: Our server Chris was very friendly and knowledgable and the Somm helped us pick out a bottle of Champagne for the celebration. They have quite the food selection from happy hour to tasting menu with wine pairings and even lots of vegetarian friendly choices. This was my second visit and I will be back again. Highly recommend this cozy, chic restaurant in downtown Breck!

name: RachelB
review_text: My family had the most wonderful dinner.  The food was so delicious and the restaurant was cozy but elevated without being pretentious.  I’m so grateful we had this experience.

name: AmeliaC
review_text: Fun, unique food in a cool mountain atmosphere! We enjoyed it!

name: Rachel
review_text: Great food ! Loved the drinks

name: NoahC
review_text: Came with 4 adult children and my wife with a broken leg. Staff couldn’t have been more attentive and drinks and food was outstanding as always. We come here every time we visit Breck. Thank you for another lovely experience.

name: EduardoH
review_text: Excelent food take care of details, and make a wonderfull convination.

name: CoVo
review_text: Food was delicious. Service wasn’t that great. Very attentive, but our meals came out at different times. 1 adult appetizer was served with 1 adult entree. Then 2 kids meals with 1 adult entree. Then 1 adult appetizer. And finally the last 2 adult entrees. Very odd!

name: ChristineF
review_text: Food and service workers as outstanding!! We loved it

name: Jmvl
review_text: The staff was amazing! I have to say that. The food was great but the portions were much smaller than anticipated. Overall, I would definitely recommend trying them if in Breckinridge. 7/10

name: KatherineT
review_text: We did the NYE tasting menu and it took us over an hour to get our first course. We were a party of 8 and the courses didn’t all come out together and some of the food was cold when we got it. I’ve been to this restaurant a few times and have always had a good experience. Not sure if it was an off night. Also the service was not as good as I had hoped and our waiter was not very friendly.

name: KellyF
review_text: Exceptional food and staff once again! Can’t wait to go back!!

name: SaraG
review_text: New year’s 4 course dinner was delicious and the staff was perky and festive.  The wine pairing was good and the portions were on point.  This restaurant is one of my favorite to make sure to visit to a few times each season.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This was the most wonder experience. Not only was the staff welcoming and amazing, the food was perfectly prepared and presented. We will definitely be visiting again soon.

name: Anne
review_text:
Husband’s birthday. Second time we celebrated here
Amazing food

name: Anonymous
review_text: Great experience - the food was wonderful and our server was great. We will be back!

name: TriciaF
review_text: Great food and drink with progressive farm to table menu.  Excellent service!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food wasn’t any better than decent. We still hadn’t received our drinks by the time we finished the starters, which arrived disappointingly lukewarm. We saw our server only a few times throughout the night. We tried to politely get help from other servers to remove dirty dishes or bring out items that were ordered but never arrived. I would gladly pay $300 for two adults and two children, if the quality warrants it, but on this particular night, it did not.

name: crystalm
review_text: Our party of 4 enjoyed the tasting menu and it was 100% worth it! The flavor profiles partnered with the wines were perfect. We had a lovely experience and would highly recommend.

name: MonikaB
review_text: Aurum is our absolute favorite fine dining restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: KaylaHK
review_text:
I was most excited about the beef tartar and the $160 wagyu, but both were sadly underwhelming.

Drinks were incredible!

name: TravisP
review_text: Amazing food

name: SofiaH
review_text: Amazing food and service! A beautiful dining experience overall.

name: Mamamao
review_text: Lovely staff, lovely Christy Eve family dinner!

name: AnastasiaN
review_text: All amazing. Our server was top notch. Loved flourless choc cake.

name: 1fork
review_text: Hard to capture all the awesomeness of this experience. We decided to step out and try the Chefs 5 course special and we started with a most amazing “Swiss onion soup”. The uniqueness of that bowl alone should have been enough to give us a clue as to what came in the 5 course diner. No spoilers here but our tastebuds will never be the same. Our server James and an occasional appearance by the General Manager Grayson made us feel like we were the only ones in the restaurant. Amazing job to all! Highly recommended on a fronts.

name: LydiaH
review_text: WOW. This place was AMAZING. Our server was amazing and really took the time to craft some great recommendations for us. My husband has food restrictions and the kitchen made modifications so easily for his meal. Their drinks were phenomenal and the atmosphere was so elevated. It felt like a michelin star restaurant. SO worth it!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One of the best restaurants we have been to

name: Donna
review_text:
Always love my time here.  Staff make us always so welcome and always make time for us
Glad we got to visit with some of the best tonight with Grayson, Amy, Birdie and Sydney.  Thanks again.

name: DanielC
review_text: The food is always amazing but what makes this place the best is the friendly people who work there.

name: John
review_text: Good place. Food, service, location. Highly recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Nothing was special all the food was ok, and it was all luke warm. The cocktails were good.

name: Brettito
review_text: Good food. Great staff

name: Twartx
review_text: One of the top restaurants in Breckenridge! Great happy hour.

name: Mamamao
review_text: Fantastic service, very cool setting , great cocktails. Staff are well trained  love this place

name: BrookeH
review_text: The food was incredible, our server was so great! I would highly recommend happy hour, this was such a great way to start our trip!

name: ellyvest
review_text: We were staying right above the restaurant!! Every review from air b&b said it’s a must try. We had such a relaxed & special time. The goat cheese fritters are to DIE for.

name: ErinE
review_text: Thoughtful menu with delicious food and drink and wonderful service.  It was the perfect start to our Breckenridge getaway!

name: PatriciaG
review_text: First time at Aurum. We over heard a bartender at the Marriott in Breckinridge suggest going there. Absolutely wonderful experience: from the cocktails, wine, apps and entrees. The vibe was classy but not too stuffy. Our server was knowledgeable and friendly. Will for sure come back to this restaurant!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Amazing place for birthday dinner after all day spent skiing.
Smells so nice. Wonderful staff. Great ambience. Can’t wait to come back some day!

name: Jetsen
review_text: Service was excellent as were cocktails and wine. We will return for the food and the personal touch from the GM and chef around an allergy we had in our party. Was very happy to see 1/2 bottle wine options. I wish they had a more developed non alcoholic cocktail program since everything else is so good. We often start the night with a high end NA cocktail if the list is sophisticated enough and then go to wine bottles for dinner. We prefer the entire experience but less alcohol after the entire meal.

name: MarcieM
review_text: Great service & delicious food!

name: MTBT
review_text: Fabulous Thanksgiving ( turkey, mash potatoes,stuffing) night meal. My son had the trout excellent. Had a spice pumpkin mousse for dessert would order again.

name: Bill
review_text: Impeccable. The uniquely combined flavors destroy expectations. Expect excellence. Then be surprised.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great quality food and service

name: BrookeW
review_text: We had a lovely meal at Aurum— delicious food, attentive service and overall great vibe.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Staff was great. Not very much room between tables and too many kids.…more of  an adult restaurant.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent service and food!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Love the happy hour food/drink specials. The food is always exceptional quality. Usually get the burger and seasoned fries and a delish Paloma drink.
Last night tried the bib salad also super !
Service very friendship and caring. Always bring people here for happy hr. Never have tried dinner as it’s a bit pricey for me.

name: Aaron
review_text: Great food! Great service.  Octupus appetizer was awesome.  The steaks were excellent.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: AMAZING EVERYTHING: food, staff, WINE, service.  You’re crazy if you don’t go here while in town for dinner.

name: StevenT
review_text: Consistently great food and experience

name: DaveG
review_text: The music was too loud.  It was a little on the cool side in the restaurant.   The food was great as was the service. Happy hour prices were very good.

name: Knight
review_text: Delicious food, great atmosphere! One of our favorites in Breck!

name: Dinnerout
review_text: Wonderful service and great food. Get there for happy hour

name: Payton
review_text: Kevin was a wonderful server. The whole staff was super sweet and helped to make my anniversary very special.

name: PeterP
review_text: Excellent food , great service and nice atmosphere

name: SaraW
review_text: The happy hour bites are outstanding and we received great attention from our server James and Ileana the hostess. We will definetely come back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fabulous cocktails, inventive yet

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
When I made the reservation through Open Table, I’d put in there that it was a birthday dinner, mine. 

We had HH reservations. Aurum is known for its happy hour which we enjoyed with the rolls and Caesar, both great. We ordered the strip steak and the duck confit. 

The manager brought our meals. The steak looked rare (my son ordered medium rare) and my confit looked strange. My son refused to return the steak. As for my meal, the sauce that went with it was quite spicy, so I didn’t get the suspicion that this confit might have come from the night before until I’d already eaten half of the duck. The red flag was that our meals came so soon after we’d ordered. I later found out that there was a wedding party of 30, so I wondered if they just threw our meal slapdash.

We ordered their chocolate chip cookie dessert, which was amazing. Absolutely no sign Aurum read my reservation that it was a birthday dinner.

Would we return? I don’t know.

name: Bruce
review_text: Best place in Breckinridge. Great service and amazing food.

name: ShannonD
review_text: We had a party of four and enjoyed the happy hour plates and cocktails and then ordered an item to share off the menu.  The food is flavorful and thoughtful.  We would recommend more people enjoy the food and cocktails at Aurum!

name: AmyG
review_text: Fantastic food and service! We're in Breckenridge a lot, and Aurum is now our new favorite restaurant. Will definitely be back!

name: Jeannie
review_text: Best place in town!

name: Jeannie
review_text: Great food.  Bread was the best we have ever had!

name: SharonM
review_text: Delish but loud!

name: MichaelMoody
review_text: Best meal in Colorado yet! Loved their sister restaurants in Steamboat too.

name: Rochelle
review_text: Amazing food and service!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Eat here !!!

name: Foodie
review_text: Food terrific. Service outstanding. Lovely setting. Wonderful ambience. Love this restaurant!!!

name: kiwijane
review_text: Aurum is our happy place for happy hour. Food is very well priced and  very generous portions.

name: Spcaltreat
review_text: Superb food and the wine was excellent. Going back ASAP!

name: MaryV
review_text: Great service! Loved the crispy curried cauliflower and local vegetable plate. Rocky Mountain Trout was velvety.  Quieter jn the back room. The Campfire cocktail was smooth.

name: StacieS
review_text: The appetizer and smoked Old Fashion started the meal out well and we were hopeful. Entrees were very large portions but the salt level was unlike anything I have experienced. I like salt but this was next level. My husband ordered the brined pork roulade but the cut was so tough  it was inedible. While server was considerate and removed his meal from the bill  any further service from the staff was nonexistent. The space was beautiful and we had very high hopes but sadly it was not a win in our book.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was delicious and service was great. The entrees were well sized for the price and I enjoyed every bite. We will definitely be back

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Excellent restaurant
Fabulous food
Great service

name: KarenP
review_text: We love coming here every-time we are in town.  Great food, drinks and services.

name: OpenTable Diner
