review_text: B st restaurant in Breckenridge we love it. Come every time we come to Breck

name: JJGG
review_text: Would dine again - everyone enjoyed their meals and the service was great.

name: DJay
review_text: A great happy hour- burger was fantastic as was the duck confit.

name: Sharon
review_text: Our food was terrific. We enjoyed Happy Hour; Caesar Salad, Cauliflower, and a Hamburger. We would recommend all.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent service and great menu!

name: LeighG
review_text: Good was delicious and service was great!

name: BruceA
review_text: Overall food was very good and serving sizes were most generous.  Our appetizers were very good; however the Caesar salad was far from a true Caesar salad.  Adding an anchovy does not make a salad a Caesar salad.  My cherry smoked pork remoulade was a bit dry but the side dishes were delicious.  My wife ordered the duck breast and thought that it was excellent.  Service was very good;; however we did not have sufficient time to finish our appetizers before our main courses arrived.  Very good food and plenteous serving sizes, but a bit too noisy to suit my taste.

name: JamieM
review_text: Loved everything about our experience here. Everything was top notch. Can’t wait to visit again!

name: AATK
review_text: James gave us the best experience. He had spot on recommendations for every course and great convo! Will be coming back soon thanks to him.

name: HughS
review_text: Nicely appointed, fun environment.  Our server was very attentive and knowledgeable about the  menu items.  Food was delicious and very nicely presented.  We had a great fine dining experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: My husband and I had a great experience at Aurum while on a quick getaway. We came for happy hour and stayed well into dinner. We loved all the courses we tried, especially the cauliflower and the chocolate hazelnut torte. Our server Kristin was fun and friendly, gave excellent, well timed service, and paired wine nicely. I am gluten free and there was a plethora of delicious options (most of the menu). We will be back next time we’re in Breck!

name: ClifH
review_text: Our Go To Breck restaurant. Always amazing!

name: Nikki
review_text: The food was excellent, and the staff was very knowledgeable about the menu and pairings. Our server was Kevin who did a wonderful job making suggestions and guiding us around the menu, and making our Bride-to-Be feel celebrated. We also spoke to the sommelier about his suggested pairings, and he did an excellent job helping us select a wine that complemented all of our party's 3 main courses. Awesome night!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We were so impressed with the decor, ambiance, food was outstanding and our server was excellent! We highly recommend a superb dining experience!

name: AndrewR
review_text: The food was amazing. Brought forth by a creative and animated server. Apologies for not recalling your name. The food was amazing.  All around wonderful

name: Cari
review_text: Great restaurant with great service

name: KevinB
review_text: Aurum is always an exceptional experience. My wife and I were coming for our anniversary and were surprised with 2 glasses of bubbly to start the evening. We took advantage of their happy hour, which is probably the best happy hour deal in Summit County. The curried cauliflower is amazing. Mixed drinks on happy hour were all good, the bee's knees is a recurring favorite. Service is outstanding, friendly and accommodating. A true gem.

name: Florida
review_text: The service was exceptional! The best chocolate chip cookies!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: My very favorite gourmet burger. Waited a whole year to have it again.

name: SarahW
review_text: The service was great, and the descriptiono on the menu spunded delicious, but somehow the execution was lacking----too much overly spiced sauce on my pasta, my husband's shrimp and grits had more sauce than grits and the pork roulade had a strange taste.

name: NickB
review_text: It was a great dinner. Katie was our server and she was awesome and very knowledgeable about the menu and made great recommendations. We would have liked a little bit of music playing or something cause it just got very quiet. Other than that we thought it was a great place.

name: JudyJ
review_text: It was just an ok experience. We ate at multiple restaurants during our stay in Breckinridge and this was our least favorite. Food was good service was ok.

name: Mike
review_text: We just love Aurum!  Consistently great every time!  From beginning to end. Food and drinks superb!  Will always return!

name: MollyB
review_text: Our server Katie was AMAZING! Great customer service and so knowledgeable about all parts of the menu. Food and cocktails were also fantastic.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We sat on the patio and enjoyed a lovely happy hour. The crispy curried cauliflower did not disappoint!

name: sallyc
review_text: Aurum is amazing! Greyson( manager) is so accommodating! We had to change our reservation time at the last minute yet when we arrived he had a wonderful booth ready and waiting for us! The wait staff is excellent and food is amazing ! Highly recommend!

name: MikeD
review_text:
We visit Aurum in Breck as often as possible; it is frequently booked weeks I advance.
Bright, exquisitely clean, prompt and attentive service; relatively limited but interesting menu; same for wine list; no shortage of alcohol selections. Great choice. MD

name: JasonB
review_text: Not worth it this trip. Disappointed in the quality of food. The chicken was over cooked and bare (all dark meat) bone. It was also really over spiced.  Wines are cheap options that are overpriced.

name: EvanG
review_text: This was our first visit to Autumn and we loved it. We started with splitting a Caesar Salad. They did have real white anchovies, but the flavor was lacking in the dressing, only complaint. My wife order the Shrimp and Grits, which she said they were the best she ever had. I am not a gratis fans but she made me taste them, wow. They were different from any grits I have tried, excellent. I ordered the Duck Leg Confit, seriously the best I ever had. The meat was melt in your mouth tender. Our waitress was exceptional and extremely knowledgeable of the menu. As you can see there was a large loud table next to us, giving the noise level a 2.

name: KSIrish
review_text: Aurum has become a tradition for us, we go every year for our wedding anniversary. Every year the staff is welcoming and fun. The food is always top notch. The experience is always a pleasure.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: My friend and I were in town for Labor Day and had an awesome meal at Aurum. We went for dinner, started with cocktails, the bread service, and corn fritters. The bread and fritters were both flawless — highly recommend both! We followed with the pasta of the day, which included a tomato cream sauce with fresh pasta, micro greens and shredded duck confit. Phenomenal! And the perfect portion. Last but not least, the chocolate chip cookies. Unreal. Can’t wait to go back and try more!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is our second time here on our annual trip to Breck and we couldn’t have better things to say about this place. It’s one of our favorite restaurants of all time. The service (shoutout to James!!) and the quality of food is unmatched. You will not regret your trip to Aurum!!!

name: Dixie
review_text: Service was very good. Wish the restaurant would allow table selection on Open Table.  Walk-ins had first dibs on nice outdoor tables, reservations were then stuck with what was left indoors.  The Korean Fried Chicken was great.  Pasta special was under-seasoned, sauce left something to be desired.  Happy hour burger is a great deal.  Inventive cocktail menu.  Would recommend/go back.

name: Elijah
review_text: Food was outstanding and service was impeccable. Great drinks as well!

name: rhonem
review_text: Service was poor. Waiter acted annoyed. Both dishes we ordered were terrible. Chicken was so dry & salty that I sent it back. Definitely skip this one.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had a reservation for a Monday night dinner during happy hour. We ordered two glasses of wine and some food (cauliflowers, Korean chicken, burger). The food items were good. When we wanted to order another two glasses of wine our server recommended a bottle of wine instead that he told us was 50% off. That was the first time we heard about that. When the bill came the bottle of wine was 4x$9 which was the happy hour price of a glass of wine. So what the server told its was far from true. Not a great ex!

name: NSNo
review_text: The room was crowded. Too many tables in a chamber that echoed everything to our center table. Bread was dry, steaks were tough, wine was good but upcharged a lot.

name: diningdiva
review_text: Good, but not up to hype overall for us.. who love Breck and the myriad of great food options.

name: MeredithM
review_text: This place is outstanding- the food was incredible and the service was wonderful.  Very cool vibe and attention to detail in the modern decor with perfect lighting.  HIGHLY recommend!

name: stepheng
review_text: Wife’s trout very average  charging extra for small amount of broccolini  should be able  substitute for French Fries

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Always great food and service

name: RobinD
review_text: Aurum is one of the best restaurants in Summit County and we’re lucky they opened here after great success in Steamboat.

name: VadimM
review_text: Great food and decent drink options. Some very sophisticated dishes with a lot of complex flavor. Highly recommend this place to all foodies of the world.

name: JackO
review_text:
We were greeted with a complimentary glass of wine for our anniversary. Pork entree was very tough and sides over cooked, salty, and unappetizing.  Shrimp and grits had 5 small shrimp and 5 gigantic shrimp heads. Grits were very spicy.
Wedge salad was pretty and tastey.
Overall very disappointing.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: All the food was absolutely amazing. So fresh and unique, we cleared all our plates. We will definitely be back! The service was great as well!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Very warm and inviting staff and ambience.
Excellent food!

name: Smstex
review_text: Friends visiting

name: JenniferA
review_text: It was great.  Wonderful happy hour! Great food, service, and atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Everything was perfect — excellent food, superb ambiance, friendly service — we loved it all! We definitely plan to be back!

name: KaelK
review_text: Very charming place. The food was fantastic and unique. Prices were slightly inflated but on par for the higher end restaurants in the area.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Get together with friends

name: Donna
review_text: Love Love LOVE everything about Aurum.  The food is fantastic and even though they like to change up the menu they keep all the favorites which keeps me happy.  Love the staff.

name: AndreaD
review_text: Tried a few of the shared plates and all tasty. Great wine selection.

name: GG203
review_text: We ordered a wide variety of apps to share, and all were outstanding - from the KFC to the beef tartare, curried cauliflower to the lowly Parker House rolls and decadant desserts. Beautiful back bar to admire while dining. Tight beverage menu with options for everyone. Our server, the manager, and all other support staff were impeccably hospitable. Would definitely be here weekly if we lived in the area!

name: ErinP
review_text: Lovely atmosphere and service, all on top of a really special menu. Discovered this gem on an earlier vacation and made sure to get happy hour reservations months ahead of time for this year’s trip. Best happy hour in town for a date night!

name: marilync
review_text: We have enjoyed this restaurant in the past, but this most recent experience was very disappointing.  The menu is very creative but the execution of each dish was poor!  Not one of our 4 dishes was good.  One dish was a corn fritter with a mole sauce.  We asked for some more sauce as there wasn't enough ( in our opinion and another customer).  After waiting a long time, it came out cold (like straight out of the fridge).  And they charged .75 for it!  Our server was friendly, pleasant, but service was very slow.   Just a very disappointing and expensive experience.

name: DavidB
review_text: Amazing happy hour!!  All good food and drinks.  Don’t miss dessert.  :-)

name: steves
review_text: Great food and service!!

name: TommyG
review_text: Delicious food & impeccable service

name: RHayden
review_text: Our favorite happy hour in Breckenridge! Aurum never disappoints.

name: RickB
review_text: Great vibe, great food, great service, great evening

name: davidm
review_text: Everything was wonderful. We were celebrating a birthday and everyone was so nice and helpful. The Who seated us helped make a last minute addition of two diners. The bartender was great especially with our bday celebration and finally the waiter was incredibly attentive. 5 stars all the way

name: JimB
review_text: The acoustics in the back room of the restaurant made it difficult to enjoy a nice meal.   We found the menu pretty limited and the wine list very expensive.  We paid over $70 for a Pinot noir, not served in Pinot glasses.  Overall, a meh experience and not worth the $200 price tag.

name: DBB36
review_text: Beautiful restaurant… great food and service. If you’re in Breckinridge don’t miss eating at Aurum’s.

name: BillH
review_text: We have now eaten at Aurum several times. Each time the food has been great and with happy hour, the prices are very competitive. The ambiance is very rich but casual and the decor of the bar is impressive. Wait staff are always helpful in choosing the best drinks and food items.

name: AteItAll
review_text: Enjoyed the food. The mole with the corn fritters was great…wish that there were a lot more there as opposed to just a taste. Service was on the slow side but we were in no hurry so, not a big deal. We’ll be back…thanks.

name: JohnB
review_text: Nice evening. Great trout and pork. Always fantastic food

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The service was phenomenal & food was delicious. Will come back for sure

name: JimJ
review_text: We always enjoy the happy hour at Aurum - food and service are uniformly excellent !

name: Teresa
review_text: Hands down our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge!  We come back every year when we visit and are never disappointed.  The cocktails, food and service are always exceptional!

name: accidentalfarmgirl
review_text: The service was exceptional ! Our server , James, was knowledgeable about every item and drink on the menu - even helping me choose unfamiliar cocktails when I told him my preferences. He knew that menu inside and out , was quite friendly . Aurum was highly recommended by family and  did not disappoint . The noise level was really loud at first but it was the tail end of Happy Hour 😊. We arrived 3 minutes before end of HH and our server gave us HH prices ! We’d recommend highly

name: MichaelC
review_text: Probably misordered. food overall was tasty but vey spicy ( we’re from south Louisiana) Brittany was great  and it seems happy hour is a hit because  it was packed  then cleared out at 6 overall good night

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent food, drinks and ambiance.  Our waiter went above and beyond for our young kids, who dined with us.  Fantastic experience all around!

name: DanK
review_text: Too pricey. Very expensive eventual bowel movement

name: TommyG
review_text: Best food & service in Breckenridge!

name: JenB
review_text: Best meal in Breckenridge! My husband and I were celebrating our 11 year anniversary and the staff at Autumn made sure that we felt very special. Everything we ordered was outstanding!

name: MelanieW
review_text: Love the food and service and atmosphere so much. Always very personable and consistently great food.

name: RobertWhiteDallas
review_text: Can’t wait to come back. Creative drinks great food, best hamburger I’ve ever had.

name: EatsCB
review_text: Awesome Server, excellent food, as always!

name: Alan
review_text: Very nice staff. Good, fresh ingredients. My pork loin was overcooked, too dry to swallow. My spouse's trout was perfection. A very good place overall, and worth another visit!

name: Andy
review_text:
Came here with local friends. It was very warm when we first arrived, but cooled down by the time we were finished. Wear layers for sure!

Food was excellent. We had pork, fish, and steak dishes and all were clean plates at the end of dinner. The meals took a while to come out, but we’ll worth the wait. 

Service was attentive - quickly picked up that we were not in a rush and gave us plenty of time to drink and chat before ordering. 

The music was loud and with noise from other tables made it hard to hear our friends. However, as tables left it became much better. 

Definitely a place we’ll go back to.

name: Winonaqueen
review_text: Wonderful dinner

name: scheetzd
review_text: Amazing happy hour food and prices.  The burger is one of the best we have had.

name: KimW
review_text: Mid-day dinning on vacation

name: SueS
review_text: You definitely want to go for Happy Hour!  All snacks are half price with reduced price cocktails, wine and beer.  Food is fabulous!  We come whenever we are in Breck!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing meal.  I would go as far to say that this is the best spot in Breckenridge.

name: Emptynesteradventurers
review_text: Amazing food and service.

name: CCapoo
review_text: My husband and I and our two adult daughters had a great happy hour last night.  Brittany and the entire staff took great care of us.  It got very busy around 5pm and Brittany did not skip a beat.  The food was fabulous!  We shared lemon parm fries, a French onion burger (to die for), the curries cauliflower (now our go to appetizer) and the rolls!  Everything was fresh and very very good!  The drinks were also spot on!  Will go back again for sure!

name: Sarah
review_text: Food and drinks were fantastic, our server Brittany was proficient and gave great recommendations. We will definitely be returning to Aurum in the future!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We were visiting from FLORIDA and our guests highly recommended Aurum.  It was absolutely delicious.

name: BU99
review_text: Great happy hour selections; unique food and cocktails menu

name: Marathoner349
review_text: We've returned to Aurum several times for special events and an occasional treat. Every time we're blown away by the quality of the food, cocktails, and extremely kind service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge! Service is fantastic and the food is amazing. The chef did a great job of altering the dish to accommodate my gluten free request. Thank you!!

name: RegP
review_text: What a fabulous place for dining in Breckenridge! We went for happy hour and had some appetizers and cocktails. I had the strawberry mojito which was simply delicious. I had to have a second. The corn fritters were heavenly with the mole sauce. Our server was top notch! Can’t say enough good things about this place. Will be going back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: ALL the food took forever; even the simple tiny appy plate of sausage. Then about third way through (our food still not there) our server disappears and the bartender shows up with excuses on where food is. We find out that the restaurant scheduled a menu tasting/learning for its staff. Seriously, in the middle of service!!!  Food received was good, pricy, but……

name: JerryM
review_text: I had the Korean Chicken. It was terrible.  The chicken pieces were so tough my fork or knife could not cut several of them.  Others could not be chewed!  This was the worst meal I have ver had!!!

name: BenMac
review_text: Excellent experience for higher end dining in Breck!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is a go to place for our annual trip or 2 to Breck.  Consistently good food and drink, friendly knowledgeable servers.  The staff always goes out of their way to accommodate my husband's food allergies.  We enjoy the atmosphere and decor.  Wouldn't miss happy hour there!

name: AnniJ
review_text: This was a repeat birthday visit with our neighbor. Kristin was outstanding as our server. She paced and visited us perfectly a and also gave great explanations of what the menu offerings were. We’ll most definitely be back again next year with our neighbor and before that by ourselves to enjoy everything about Autumn.

name: JulieS
review_text: Best happy hour in town.

name: Bevos3
review_text:
The noise level in the main dining area was oppressive. We could not speak to each other without practically screaming.  The food was good, especially at Happy Hour prices and the drinks were good,  Limited wine list.
Bottom line: great place to go for Happy Hour, if the weather permits sitting outside and, perhaps, in the bar area.  We'll never go there again for dinner inside.

name: DianaS
review_text: Wonderful service and the food and drinks were all exceptional.

name: Austin
review_text: Great happy hour. Good food at affordable prices.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It was great!

name: DanielH
review_text: Great food and service. Entrees were awesome and so was the mushroom soup. Best value for money

name: AMFM
review_text: The menu is limited and expensive.  I can not describe the type of cuisine.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This was our second time and it did not disappoint.  Great food, service and atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We made a last minute reservation upon arriving In Breckenridge.  From start to finish we had an amazing experience to include service and food.  The food was fresh and very tasty to the palate.  Drinks were top notch.  We highly recommend this restaurant.

name: kevins
review_text: among the very best dining experiences. create and wonderful dishes, outstanding service.

name: JLP1
review_text: Went there for happy hour and ordered most of the appetizers. They were all good. The cauliflower was the best. The drinks were good and the happy hour prices were great. Wonderful service

name: Sara
review_text: Outstanding from start to finish.

name: Chris
review_text: Food was delicious and the staff was very welcoming and warm!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Atmosphere is great. Food was hit or miss. Overall, very salty.

name: JohnH
review_text: Great Food & Drink, Great Service, TOO LOUD.  We have gone twice and have really enjoy the food and service.  However, the noise level on the second visit was much louder to the point the experience was very lack luster to the first.  Aaka - I can't hear the person across the table and barely the person next to me.  We will try to be seated in the front room next.

name: Shanna
review_text: Best happy hour in Breck! We’ve never been disappointed here. 10/10.

name: eyequeen
review_text: Awesome birthday dinner - apps & drinkswere outstanding - best burgers in the WORLD!!!

name: LindaB
review_text: Great Happy Hour!  The appetizer portions are very generous. We come here frequently and it never disappoints.

name: juliez
review_text: Always delish. Loved the seasonal salad and pasta. The burger is the absolute best and we always have to get it. We come back time and time again because the service and food is always fabulous.

name: SharonS
review_text:
Excellent service from the minute you entered the restaurant. 
Alexa greeted you as a family member and Birdie our server was exceptional

name: SharonL
review_text: Great dinner!  Chicken and Dumplings are not what you expect!  Trout was excellent as well.   Our server was knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Hans
review_text: Aurum is our new favorite place to dine in Breckenridge. Love the happy hour. The portions are so generous and the value is amazing!

name: DedeF
review_text: Our party of 6 was seated in the back room and it was a delightful dining experience! Our service was quite good and the meal delish!!

name: BobbyMaur
review_text: The Octopus and the night's special pasta were very good. The cocktails were excellent. The fried chicken was okay and the Caesar salad had no taste. Charging that much for a salad was the low light of the meal.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Really enjoyed the creations from Chef. Inspired. The Korean Tartare was superb. The Lamb is reminiscent of really good Oaxacan Mole and the Crispy Cauliflower appetizer had Mediterranean flavors that hinted at a really fun vacation.

name: Yoshi
review_text: Wonderful dining experience!  We will definitely be returning soon.

name: Claire
review_text: Great service, new menu items , good wine choice.

name: Brecktothefuture
review_text: My first two times at Aurum were amazing, once we had our own table and another time at the bar. This time we had a table in a part of the restaurant where the tables are just plain too close together and we could here every bit of our neighbors conversation.

name: Rebecca
review_text: The food is a level above all else. Cocktails are crafty. Yum!

name: KristinaB
review_text: Came here for happy hour and date night. Excellent selection of craft cocktails. Each one was amazing. We had appetizers, enough for a meal, all were extraordinary!

name: DeniseD
review_text: Our server was new but she did a fantastic job.  Our food and drinks were delicious.  It was quite cold in the restaurant but they closed the windows and it warmed up shortly.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great ambiance, great food, and great service. This is our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Happy hour a great value - wonderful second visit. Glad to find this place. Should have stopped on earlier trips to Breck.

name: Schmutzy
review_text: Great as always! Stacey was a terrific waitperson.

name: John3
review_text: Always a great time and well executed food and drink!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Eric did a great job taking care of us and the food was excellent.

name: MelisseS
review_text:
We celebrated our anniversary at Aurum this past Tuesday. We had a reservation for 6:00 and decided to go early and take advantage of happy hour. The bar tender was a magic man, his drinks were balance and complex. The half price appetizers were delicious and generous, I highly recommend the curried cauliflower. 
Once we were seated at the table, the delights kept coming. My husband has a gluten and dairy allergy. There were plenty of options on the menu he could choose from and the staff was knowledgeable and sensitive to his needs. 
 Overall, everything we ate and drank was amazing and the service was great, The staff was friendly, attentive and knowledgeable. As foodies and adventurous eaters we thoroughly enjoyed our experience. Thanks for helping make our anniversary a great one.

name: MollyDooker
review_text: We arrived just before opening and they opened precisely on time. We’re we’re given a complimentary glass of Prosecco for our 35th anniversary that was so good I ordered a glass with dinner. From the first order of the crispy curried cauliflower to the last order of the double chocolate dessert  every dish was exquisite. The cauliflower was perfectly balanced nothing overdone nor understated and deliciously seasoned with a hazelnut dukkah. For the main entree I had the duck breast cooked to perfection as James asked to what temperature I wanted the duck cooked. I asked for 150 degrees a medium rare and that’s what I got. The accompanying veggies were cooked to perfection and served with glass noodles. The flavors of all the sauces and dishes were 10 of 10. I will definitely come back and recommend this restaurant to any foodie.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Incredible food and great staff.

name: Amanda
review_text: Absolutely outstanding!!!! Everything was amazing!

name: COQn
review_text: I think the happy hour is the best in Breck as their website says....the HH menu is very fair if not generous the amount of items there are to try at HH prices.  Make a reservation...I have been turned away before because there were no seats left at 4:30.  We had the cauliflower which was yummy.  We each had the burger & fries which is a lot of food if you also get an appetizer.  We also got the falafel but had to take it to go because we had already had generous amounts of food.  The burger was good, the falafel nice but we eat a lot of Mediterranean food as local places so we like just a basic falafel...this one was elevated, for sure.  The hostess was very nice and she made me feel appreciated for making the reservation...'we have YOUR table right here".  Our waiter was also very good.  Oh, and I had a cocktail on the HH menu called the John Daly and it was lemony and delicious.  I heard the person at the next table say he really liked the mule.

name: MerrittV
review_text: Pam and I love the happy hour here. The food is always fun and very good. The service is normally great. We start with happy hour appetisers then a great dinner.

name: KrisR
review_text:
We have been here a few times while visiting Breckenridge. The food was excellent. They have an excellent happy hour too.  
Our service was very good.  We had a table for 5.

name: Student753980
review_text: The drinks and shareables were outstanding. I would definitely recommend going for happy hour.

name: AnielaW
review_text: Aurum is an excellent place for happy hour, dinner and catching up with friends! The service is top-notch, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. Highly recommend!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
We went to Aurum for Happy Hour and could not have had a better experience! The food and service were both amazing, the portions generous and wait staff attentive to our every need. 
We have gone there several times before and have never been
disappointed. Highly recommend for Happy Hour or a delicious  dinner experience.

name: Joymee
review_text:
Food absolutely great!!! 5star for it and compliment to the chef of course.
My only concern is that the lights at the top side seats in the corner is a little bit dark. I remember a family there sitting on the side they would open a flashlight just to see the menu.
Maybe try to improved the lightings. But overall experience was really great!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Superb food as always, great ambiance and fab for adults and kids alike! Don’t miss the curried cauliflower starter!

name: shirleyR
review_text: Our second visit to Aurum since arriving in Breckinridge a week ago. This place is special- delicious creative food zinging with flavour served by a knowledgable and efficient crew. We would go again, but our time in Breckinridge is over.

name: lifeofreilly
review_text: Excellent service, delicious food, incredible happy hour!  We had a great time celebrating a good friend's birthday here.

name: SydneyS
review_text: My boyfriend and I came here for his birthday and it was incredible. Amazing food and service.

name: Bere
review_text: Buen lugar con una propuesta interesante en la comida, amplia carta de vinos es uno de nuestros lugares favoritos en Breckenridge.

name: BigAl60
review_text: We first found this wonderful restaurant on a trip to Breck in January 2020, just before the start of the pandemic. We went for dinner one evening and our server told us about their great happy hour so we went back for that. On both visits we thoroughly enjoyed the creative cuisine and terrific wines and cocktails. We looked forward to returning but the pandemic restrictions prevented that for too long.  We were excited that Aurum came through the pandemic seemingly better than we had remembered.  We secured an early reservation - a must even on a weeknight. We took advantage of happy hour specials - savings on select wines and half price small plates. We shared a Crispy Cauliflower snack an unique preparation - absolutely delicious. We ordered the large plate Rocky Mountain trout which came with amazing accoutrements of English pea risotto, pickled asparagus and parmesan crisp. All portions are generous and great for couples to share. We finished with a double chocolate cherry mousse. We highly recommend Aurum - it is an exceptional restaurant experience.

name: Mindy
review_text: Everything was delicious and the menu was so hard to choose from because it all looked so good. Service was great too.and I love that you include all the people in the kitchen on your menu.. great way to let us know they need to be recognized.

name: CJCO
review_text: incredible food, friendly and knowledgable staff!

name: SaraG
review_text: Amazing and always delicious food and ambience.  Staff is very professional and informed.  Operations are excellent and not distracting.  Top notch and always my first recommendation for anyone visiting that wants a 5 star meal!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Beautiful upscale restaurant with amazing food

name: Robin
review_text: We had a fantastic meal @ Aurum. Their service staff is superb- friendly & attentive but not over the top. All of our food was delicious. We really enjoyed our experience & will be back ASAP.

name: Ontheverge
review_text: We’ve been to Aurum several times and it never disappoints. From service to food to drinks the experience is top notch!!

name: AlmaM
review_text: Everything about the experience at Aurum was exceptional!  So happy we have a quality restaurant for Foodies in Breckenridge.  Thanks Aurum!

name: Eats
review_text: Excellent cocktails. Loved the crispy curry cauliflower and the Naan flatbread. The highlight, though, was the octopus carpaccio-outstanding! Our server, Eric, was friendly and paced our meal beautifully (no rushing!).

name: JohnG
review_text: As always, the food was delicious and the service was great.

name: DruJ
review_text: Delicious meal & fabulous atmosphere!!  Excellent service!!  We are glad we found this last month & enjoed again this trip.  We will be back next year!

name: AnneS
review_text: Terrific food and service as always.  Back room seemed excessively loud this last visit.

name: JennyB
review_text: We loved our evening at Aurum! The food was simply outstanding. We especially loved the cauliflower, the wedge salad, and the flatbread. Kristen was a fantastic server and answered all of our questions about the menu. We can't wait to return!

name: ElizabethW
review_text: Aurum is consistently an excellent experience.  We have visited during happy hour numerous times.  You need a reservation!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour. Our server was great at explaining the menu options

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Our server was excellent, made great food and wine recommendations.  I ordered the Rabit pot pie and my wife had the duck confit pasta special.  Both were excellent!

name: JohnBoy
review_text: Arrived early for our 6:00 PM reservation and was pleasantly surprised Happy Hour Menu (which ends at 6:00)  extended into the dining area as well. Ordered off that menu, with staff encouragement, and felt like we had won the lottery. Appetizers were excellent with generous portions, terrific selection,  and 5 star presentation. Next visit will include delicious sounding full on entrees.

name: Kibbs33
review_text: We went for the happy hour.  Everything was absolutely delicious and our server, Peter, was fantastic!  Definitely try this out, you can't go wrong.  :-)

name: Karen
review_text: We went for a happy hour dinner and the food was fantastic at fantastic prices.  Aurum is one of our favorite places in Breckenridge!

name: AmandaS
review_text: Awesome happy hour! Tried the fries, Korean tartare, cauliflower and Thai ceviche all the dishes were absolutely fantastic. Service was perfect and the wine list was wonderful too. We will definitely return

name: DaveS
review_text: Food and service was outstanding!!!  Loved the local sourcing of ingredients for the menu items!  Will definitely be back.

name: rugratz
review_text: Went here for happy hour and it was amazing! Their so called "snack" portions looked like meal size! It was delicious!

name: JenniferS
review_text: Great food and intimate atmosphere! Friendly staff too and definitely a hip restaurant.

name: GaryS
review_text:
Food and wine were excellent.  
Our waiter, Michael was very friendly and knowledgeable on the menu selections So we tried a few different items that exceeded our expectations

name: CrystalG
review_text: This place was recommended to us for happy hour. The serving sizes were bigger than expected and extremely flavorful. The cocktails were delicious and many to  chose from. We will definitely return and likely order the same things.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aurum was an amazing experience. We booked our reservation 2 months in advance. I’m glad we did because we saw people turned away without reservations. There are 15 spots at the bar and long table that are first come first serve but apparently a line forms 1 hour prior to opening. Food was unique and delicious. The only food item we didn’t like was the pork belly. The flavor was very bland and all items didn’t taste well together. The Korean fried chicken wasn’t very Korean style. Too much sauce and the chicken seemed more like fried batter. Other than that the service was impeccable and ambience was nice. Highly recommend! Go during their Happy Hour so you can order snacks at half price!

name: PeterK
review_text: We went for happy hour. Had some half-price drinks and snacks. The crispy curried cauliflower, Korean beef tartare and pork belly were all delicious. Good size portions. Server was terrific. Highly recommend.

name: Jude
review_text: Great food, service and location. Make sure you try Aurum!

name: Tommy
review_text: Very loud, fairly confined space. The extra cost of the private yurts would likely be worth the expense. The food was good, but, while our waiter was very good, there appeared to be some disorganization with more than one table having problems getting the right orders in a timely manner.

name: WilliamB
review_text: We went during happy hour and found many of the food items were half price.  We had spectacular cocktails and a shared feast that I thought was going to be well-worth-the-price expensive, and the bill for our party of 4 was less than what one would pay for a single dinner in any nice Breck restaurant.  Phenomenal across the board.  Oh - and super friendly staff, too.

name: KeeleP
review_text: We love Aurum and come every single time we are in town. This was the best service we've had in all our visits, thanks Michael! We can't get over the rolls, Korean chicken, burgers and cookies!

name: BrandyS
review_text: We had the best dinner with our family. The owner and staff were amazing and the food was delicious!

name: Noreen4suns
review_text: Food was very good. Pricey. Noise level is high. Felt like I was eating in a waiting area in front room. If I  go again I would request to be seated in back room. Wish I had known myself.

name: MichaelS
review_text: First time at Aurum. Overall, a good experience. Dining Room became completely full and when that happened, service became less responsive. Food was very good. Price for what we ordered was on the high-side. Wait staff tried hard but they were just too busy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Consistent great sustenance, ambiance and libation

name: Mike
review_text:
We just love Aurum!  Especially the happy hour!  Last night was probably one of the best times we’ve had there mostly due to our great server, Mike!  What a sweetheart!
But the food and drinks were spot on as well!  We will always be back to Aurum!

name: Picadilly
review_text: I went for birthday happy hour in March with a new friend.  We had a delightful time together and both enjoyed the Dr. Jones cocktail and the happy hour wedge salad, curried cauliflower and Korean fried chicken.  Loved all - maybe a bit less enthusiastic with the chicken.  This is definitely upscale apps and creative cooking.  I took away a star because of the brusque rudeness of a manager that seated me (I think he said he was in from Steamboat so maybe not a regular) and then the dirty looks he gave us near the end of our stay obviously urging us to leave.  I would prefer an honest conversation about how it was a busy time for them… etc.  Our server, John, was pleasant and fine.  I would definitely go again.  No acknowledgement of my birthday, by the way.

name: JohnH
review_text:
First off, thanks for getting us in and seated after I entered our reservation time incorrectly in my calendar app.  We arrived 15 minutes late, and even though it was a busy night, they sat us and left us plenty of time for dinner.  We greatly appreciated the effort.

Our group of three enjoyed the Steak, the burger, and the cioppino entrees, as well as the curried cauliflower appetizer.  All were excellent.  The servers who took care of us were friendly, efficient, and fun to interact with.

It was a busy night and to say the noise level was "energetic" makes me smile.  There was a large party at the table behind us who were simply drunk and very loud.  It was quite entertaining, but it made conversing difficult.  It appeared that even the servers were having a difficult time conversing with the customers.

I love coming here and certainly will return on my next trip to Breckenridge.

name: ShellyF
review_text: The food was phenomenal….our waiter was not all that great…could definitely use some coaching in helping diners with cocktail suggestions because there are so many bourbon cocktails and not a lot of other choices…it was as if we annoyed him because we made a comment about that very fact. We will definitely come back but would hope our waiter was better!!

name: MargoW
review_text: The food was amazing. Waitstaff and management were very engaged. They ensured we enjoyed our meal by bringing extra dressing. We highly recommend happy hour great way to try a variety of their menu items and experience the chefs creativity and fresh local ingredients. We will be back!! Only drawback seats are really close so you interact with your neighboring tables.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was very unique and shareable

name: CassidyM
review_text: We had the BEST experience at Aurum! We went as a group of 6 women celebrating a bachelorette and had the best time. Our server Eric was phenomenal and everyone else there treated the bride to be extra specially as well. Food & drinks were absolutely delicious and the atmosphere is fantastic.

name: margaret
review_text: My sisters and I  tried several shared plates and snack plates (cacio e pepe, Korean fried chicken, Caesar, crisp curried cauliflower)  and then one main (Rocky Mountain Trout). The portions were very small with the snacks/shared plates even for splitting amongst the three people in my party. The Caesar had a very strong anchovy taste. The trout was dry and generic and seemed to be "dressed up" with alot of sauce and garnish instead of just letting the fish speak for itself.  A larger party was seated several minutes after us yet their dishes arrived before ours; we experienced a long gap inbetween salad/snacks and the main course/shareds.

name: Jane
review_text: Birthday celebration

name: MissJessica
review_text: This was one of the best meals we’ve ever had! We are in town for a vacation and we’re so excited to get reservations here since it’s so well rated and we understand why; the food was phenomenal, service was great, and overall decor and ambiance was very cozy and chic. It’s pricey, but well worth the cost for how good the food is.

name: Fancy
review_text:
We were looking forward to trying Arum but we were terribly disappointed.  It was very spotty. 
I ordered the -mahi-mahi entree. As soon as it arrived, everyone  at the table smelled a terrible fishy oder. I tasted a small bite just to be sure and confirmed that my $40-plus dinner entree was rancid. The waiter was  polite and took it away when I explained it wasn’t edible. 

However, this should not happen in a high end restaurant. Others in my party had better luck. The cheese burgers were decent. And the wedge salads were also fine. The cocktails were good. 
However, the putrid smell of the fish made us all agree that we will never return.

name: Kerry
review_text: This was one of the best dining experiences we've ever had. The food was STUPID good!!!

name: AmyD
review_text: This is our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge. Quality of ingredients and execution of every dish is absolute perfection.

name: Leohank
review_text: The food was great but not worth the price even with happy hour specials. Waitress charged us for 7 drinks when the table only had 5. When we mentioned the mistake, she argued that we were wrong and wouldn’t take off both of the added drinks. Totally ruined the experience.

name: ahammer
review_text: Chicken was dry.  Ordered too much food and portions are very generous.

name: rr13
review_text: Really nice place tha has been in Breck about 4 years.  Small, quaint, eclectic, with great food at reasonable prices (for a mountain town).  Quality is right up there with all of the great foodie options in breck.

name: Karen
review_text: Food had nothing special for a fine dining restaurant supposedly ranked 1st among Breck’s restaurants. Beef tartare to share was just a very small portion. Service was extremely slow despite the fact that there were maximum 5-6 other parties. NY steak was overcooked (we had asked it rare). Finally, our supposed glasses of French wine tasted really low quality and were very expensive compare to the actual price of the bottle online.

name: KenC
review_text: Outstanding food and service.  Arrived just before Happy Hour ended and were able to take advantage of the half price Starters.  Portions were very large and well prepared.  Our server, Katie, was extremely helpful and knowledgeable and always available for questions.  This was our second time and Aurum and we will definitely be back for a third.

name: valwood
review_text: The food and service was outstanding. Will definitely visit each time I visit Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is our favorite place in Breckinridge.

name: Jankoss
review_text: Burgers we’re great and fries were over the top.  We will return.

name: MargaretL
review_text: A lovely restaurant from the beginning to the end everything is Outstanding from the wine section to the appetizer and fine dining

name: hillaryc
review_text: Beautiful restaurant, unique food choices and excellent handcrafted cocktails. Our server John was highly attentive and very professional. The duck confit pasta and American wagyu steaks were the highlight of the meal

name: RhondaH
review_text:
Such a mindful place.
Attention to detail in everything and every way.
We dined at happy hour and got a great seat at opening.
Getting a spot is a worthy gift.
Then the food, so savory.
We have this in our memory bank and greatful.

name: Noname
review_text: Smart marketing in ski town destinations: a happy hour that features more than just a dollar or two off a few drinks. One can - and we did - easily have an entire meal allowing us to enjoy an otherwise tough table to secure and for the restaurant, obviously, to do extra covers in otherwise quieter hours. Very good atmosphere and professional service with some really terrific creative food presentations. Don't just stick to the happy hour menu for the best enjoyment if that's when you do go.

name: LauraR
review_text: We had an amazing dinner while enjoying the happy hour offerings.  Service was great and we look forward to dining there again on this vacation!

name: Teddy
review_text: The food was excellent with great service!

name: CharlesD
review_text: Awesome good, service and great ambience! Highly recommend!

name: VivianS
review_text: Last night me and my bf had the most delicious meal. I’m vegan and they were very accommodating and made me this delicious risoto veggie meal. Also the cauliflower appetizer was amazing! Amy the bartender made the most delicious Valentine’s drink and it’s a shame I was driving lol otherwise I would definitely have had more. Coming to Breck every winter is our tradition and now eating at Aurum will be too. Thank you!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing menu! Fresh, exquisite, and so flavorful!

name: LisaS
review_text: Our favorite place in Breckenridge that we only share with the best of friends

name: Monika
review_text: We had high hopes for a very nice meal on our last day, Friday. The place came with high praise. We arrived early for our 6PM reservation. A nice table was ready. However, the Happy Hour crowd was very loud and the place was packed. Was disappointed by the available choices at full price. The half price items were adequate.

name: ShannonS
review_text: Food good.  When we got the check there was a “kitchen staff fee” included. If a restaurant is going to put extra charges on the bill, they should notify you first

name: AndrewD
review_text: Interesting food well prepared better than other restaurants in town.

name: Marky
review_text:
Great food and presentation 
Our server Kevin was informed and entertaining. A pleasure to enjoy the restaurant with.
Alexa was very accommodating in offering us a wonderful table and changing our reservation time.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was phenomenal, loved the pork belly, trout and steak. The ceviche was also great! Would totally come again if we're in town.

name: Christine
review_text: My second dinner at Aurum in as many months, and it was fantastic! Wine list is great, the salmon is incredible, and happy hour specials are a great value. Micheal is such a wonderful server. The chocolate chip cookies are a must!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: John was a wonderful server.  Very knowledgeable and passionate about the menu!

name: Lonediner
review_text: Food was ok, nothing special. Friendly service overall. Naan flatbread was a bit disappointing.

name: debbiel
review_text: Excellent service food

name: Frinightnosh
review_text: Server forgot to ring in food for our child.  When we asked several others on the wait team we were treated poorly and told a lot of people had ordered at the same time and we needed to be more patient.  It had been 30 mins, every other dish had arrived and was finished and anyone who knows what it’s like having a kid being the only one sitting and waiting knows this wasn’t great.   A shame as we’d been really excited about this place

name: JoanK
review_text: The place had a relaxing ambiance!  Everyone working was very nice and friendly!   They had a unique menu .  We really enjoyed it

name: MikeR
review_text:
Well deserved reputation as the best Happy Hour in Breckenridge!  Excellent pricing on quality cocktails (try the Wassail you won't regret it!) and a broad range of high quality half price food options (they don't pack the specials list with junk food).  Other food options reasonably priced as well.  Everything we had was very well prepared and flavorful - it is obvious the kitchen takes pride in their work.  Great atmosphere and well executed team service.

Note - while Aurum has a lively bar scene, it is a somewhat smaller space, so while this is a best Happy Hour from a value and quality perspective I wouldn't roll in here looking for a big après ski party atmosphere, or without a reservation.

name: KaraT
review_text: Wow, This place was incredible! We've walked by this cute restaurant several times and finally decided to make a reservation. We came early for happy hour and were not disappointed. From the moment we walked in the door, the level of service was outstanding. The food was innovative and delicious. The drink offerings were creative and aligned with the local atmosphere. Their happy hour menu was a great value. I especially enjoyed the décor and cozy environment that created a memorable experience. This place belongs on a 'must visit' list for Breckenridge. We look forward to making this a part of future visits to come!

name: HappyCamper
review_text: Best happy hour in Breck! Based on service and vibe, would definitely return for dinner.

name: DavidR
review_text: Outstanding food, service and overall vibe. Highly recommended when you are in Breckenridge.

name: TessB
review_text: Felt a little rushed. Our entrees came out while we were still eating our flatbread and didn't have any space to put the plates down because it was a small table, so we felt we had to finish the flatbread right away so the food runner could put the plates down. Dessert came out and we didn't have any spoons. We waited but eventually got up to ask for some spoons so we could enjoy our dessert. Food was great just felt like our server (don't remember his name)wanted us out of there really fast.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was delicious, especially the shrimp ceviche. Don’t expect typical ceviche, flavor combinations were outstanding. Loved the duck too. Even my son’s burger was cooked perfectly. Only complaint would be the noise level, otherwise everything lived up to expectations.

name: CMun
review_text: We love coming here when we visit Breckenridge! The service and food is always amazing!

name: MichaelG
review_text: Fizschznit. Great food. Cauliflower and burger - amazing. Kinda cold inside.

name: CarolR
review_text: Never a disappointment! Always great food and service! Love dining here each visit to Breckinridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Went as a family with 2 small kids (3 & 7).  Lovely rustic mod interior—seemed kid friendly enough and not pretentious and were met by a friendly hostess and attentive wait staff. Let me start with the Children’s menu!! My son licked his trout plate and we all loved the Mac-n-cheese!! While the kids ate their meals, we enjoyed Drinks from the bar that were amazing. Had the blizzard and the old fashioned. Then the food.  Yes. I mean the quinoa stew and pork belly were just sinfully delicious and wedge salad seemed basic but the butter lettuce elevated it a little. The mahi-mahi was Asian inspired and each bite was a party in my mouth. Tried the “cheese cake” dessert w churros and man, I wished I ordered 2!.  My son loved the mango sorbet. Best meal of our trip. Highly recommend!

name: BrianS
review_text: It was a great meal and the staff was very attentive. My criticisms stem from a fairly limited, albeit unique menu selection.

name: Pedroc
review_text: The proposal of a gourmet cousin with a small menu, in my view, is not a good idea. They got a good hand but in my opinion they should mix a menu of a gourmet cousin with another of regular one. They will have mall tables and more people talking good things. Overall, over priced and over estimated. I am Peruvian and know a little bit about the industry around the world.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food and a nice surprise dessert for my birthday

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: As good as always

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The flat bread app was very good and really set the bar high and then some of the share plates were tiny and not really to share and the entrees were not good or worth the price. Seems like this place is new and has a lot of work to do but you don’t charge $48 for entrees if the entrees aren’t going to be cooked correctly. The service was good but personally we wouldn’t go back.

name: tallyho
review_text: AW&F was a pleasant surprise. The staff was attentive from the moment we arrived. We were early and they made sure to take a drink order while we waited. Our server, Katie, was pleasant and well informed about the menu. We had the rabbit pot pie and the 1/2 chicken. Both were delicious and the portions were huge. It is evident that the staff is hard working and want your experience to be a good one. We recommend Aurum wholeheartedly.

name: Hudson
review_text: Amazing experience. The food was absolutely delicious and the service was even better. You must get the cookies for dessert!

name: Mike
review_text: We just love Aurum’s happy hour!  Great food and drinks for a reasonable price. Wonderful service too!

name: CarolineS
review_text: The welcome from our server James was excellent, he was very knowledgeable and made us both delicious cocktails. Our dinner was very good some dishes better than others. The steak tartar was the most notable and a great blend of flavors . Overall a good evening.

name: Midwest
review_text: Very enjoyable experience. Good food and wine. Atmosphere is wonderful. Great happy hour food/drink options,

name: chris
review_text: Awesome appetizers.   Entrées are a bit over priced, would recommend the appetizers.  All are good

name: TNoons
review_text: Amazing place in breck for friends and family. Best Brussel sprouts I’ve ever had.

name: Andrea
review_text: Great fiind!  Great for Happy Hour but an even better late night find.  The food is a little different than the usual fare and the desserts are delightfully presented.  What a treat!  I will definitely return and recommend this restaurant to others visiting Breckenridge.

name: WilliamD
review_text: The smoked old fashioned was awesome.  Katy is a great server.   Every dish I’ve had there was top shelf

name: Anastasia
review_text: Not a place for pickey eaters. The food was definitely interesting, not really a place I would recommend for the price, but good atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: They made our engagement dinner so special, and as an added bonus the food was REALLY good. 10/10 would recommend if you’re in the Breckenridge area and want something a little bit more upscale, with still reasonable prices!

name: AlbertoO
review_text: La comida espectacular

name: HilareK
review_text: The duck & wagu steak were amazing!  The manager helped us to pick an outstanding bottle of wine to have with dinner & John provided excellent service.  And….have dinner in the yurt it is worth every penny!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and service!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is our second time at Aurum.  The food was exceptional.  All of the appetizers, drinks, and desserts we had were delicious.  Of particular note we highly recommend the chocolate chip cookies… just Wow!  And the rotating pasta, lemon lobster & caviar, was also amazing.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: New Eve, it was busy due to new eve, so perhaps that impacted service

name: Anne
review_text:
Birthday dinner. Lovely food and wine.
Unusual wine list!!

name: MarkH
review_text: Excellent menu and service….food was very tasty.

name: amce
review_text: We visit Aurum every time we are in Breckenridge. I love that they change the menu each season. Last night we split the curry cauliflower, chefs ravioli and the cioppino. I can’t say enough about the service. Everyone is wonderful.  (We forgot to take pictures)

name: KellyB
review_text: Great food. Great service. Beautiful spot. They even have party yurts. Get the cauliflower and rolls. My daughter and husband loved the rabbit pot pie. What a treat!

name: TerriR
review_text: It was nice ambiance and menu - food was over sauced and over seasoned.

name: Julie
review_text: Cauliflower is amazing! Excellent choices for all types of foodies

name: shane
review_text: Rabbit pot pie is a must. We loved it. Great service as well.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This is by far the best happy hour in town!  Great cocktails and fantastic food selections.  The curried cauliflower is a must!  Even if you don’t like cauliflower.  Service was fantastic and ambiance is great!

name: Mully
review_text: We made reservations at Aurum for a birthday celebration.  The food and drinks as well as the service were all excellent.  We highly recommend Aurum!  The food is delicious!

name: FaggS
review_text: Pleasant atmosphere, creative menu with delicious appetizers (beef tartar) & entres (duck confit & rabbit pot pie). Excellent waiter (Greg). Interesting and fairly priced wine list although limited lower priced options. Overall a very good experience.

name: NoelH
review_text: Food & service was amazing!! Staff very personable!

name: Agan21
review_text: Amazing ambiance! Food had unique flavors. Large wine & cocktail selection

name: KarenW
review_text: Wonderful service. Very attentive waitstaff.  The interior dining room is stylish Mountain elegance. Happy hour is a superior value.  They also take reservations.

name: stlfoodie
review_text: I am a huge fan of Aurum but this particular visit was a bit disappointing. I was bringing friends and shared that this was my favorite place in Breck.  Our server was very condescending (unlike any other time I’d been there) and although  I asked him to take the time to course out our meal, he had it all arrive within 5 minutes. The food itself was still great and I’ll go back, but not my typical 5 star review.

name: JeanetteB
review_text: Great food and great service, they just need to turn the heat up a bit. We all had to wear our coats inside the restaurant.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Michael our server was awesome!

name: AuntyB
review_text: Great food, great service

name: JessicaK
review_text: The waitress was super nice and gave us all the best recommendations. The food was stellar, and the happy hour is the best in town

name: MichaelS
review_text: Fantastic experience every time.  Will always continue to go back.

name: HeathLee
review_text: Absolutely loved this place for our first night on vacation. Staff was amazing. Some of the best ceviche we have ever had.

name: MelanieG
review_text: Dinner was fantastic. What made my birthday dinner even more fabulous was Kristen’s lovely service. She’s a gem! Thanks to Kristen and the entire Aurum team for a wonderful evening.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was amazing as always, the Brussels are to die for & the burger is a top fav with our group. John, our waiter, was knowledgeable, helpful & super efficient. We love bringing friends to Aurum Whalen we are in town.

name: WillP
review_text:
We sat at a high top in the bar area, so it was noisy, but not so much that it affected our dining experience.

We ordered off the happy hour menu which offered reduced prices on appetizers and drinks.

The wedge, Brussels sprouts and burger were all top notch as well as the drinks.

One of the better dinners we’ve had in a ski town and with the happy hour it was super reasonable.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was great and our server, John, was also!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
The service was great, we were seated quickly and tended to pretty fast, even though it was fairly busy. The wine selection was good, the Dr. Jones cocktail was very well made; highly recommended.
We shared a few plates, the Korean fried chicken and pork belly were incredible. Get it. You won’t be disappointed. The pork belly was so juicy and tender, the Korean fried chicken was crispy and perfectly sauced, juicy chicken bites.
We shared the duck special for our main, it was cooked and seasoned perfectly. Our only gripe was the price, but even at that price point, it was worth it.
We will be back again next time we are in Breck.

name: PacoS
review_text: Will visit again for sure. Best coliflower ever. Korean chicken outstanding. Brusselsprouts delicious

name: PaulJ
review_text: Great food and service. The pork belly and the curried cauliflower were amazing. Will be back soon!

name: JustinS
review_text: Must attend for happy hour. Excellent drinks. We really enjoyed the brussel sprouts and pork belly sharables

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: A+ good food

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We came here to celebrate a birthday and absolutely LOVED it! The service was excellent and the servers were very engaging. We came during their happy house and it was an amazing value! Would recommend this to anyone coming to Breckenridge!

name: Tiger85
review_text:
You must go!!!!!!  
Great date night restaurant!!!!
Outstanding cocktails and impressive dinner.

name: JohnC
review_text: One of the best places in breck!!! recommended very much

name: K2skiier
review_text: Everything was perfect from start to finish.  The server, Burt, was friendly and helpful.  He came to our table the perfect amount, and always at the right times.  His suggestions were fantastic, and he was very polite.  The food was spectacular and fairly priced.  The cocktails were amazing as well!

name: MercedesD
review_text: One of the best meals we’ve had this year. Certainly in my top 3 Breckenridge list. Food is great, the place is wonderful and everyone from the hostess to the waiter were so welcoming, warm and friendly.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Thanksgiving dinner… wonderful. Also had Brussels sprouts, duck confit, and the most delicious chocolate chip cookie dessert ever in life. Scrumptious. Waiter was excellent and made the meal even more enjoyable!

name: lyndsay
review_text: Kevin is the best! Fantastic thanksgiving meal, thank you!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Michael was awesome! Bartenders were great! We Managed to enjoy a variety of the small plates in lieu of a large entrée. This was ny Second visit to Aurum and I will happily recommend it as one of my Breckenridge favorites!

name: IanM
review_text: The food is fantastic, it’s more of an experience than just a place to eat. Our server Michael was knowledgeable, courteous, easy going, and an guide on choosing each course for us. If you’re in Breck and you don’t just like food but enjoy it, you have to check out Aurum!

name: BeckyJ
review_text: Always a pleasure to go to Aurum with friends and family for happy hour!! Alexa, the staff and food always fabulous!

name: Janis
review_text:
7 of us enjoyed a great happy hour at Aurum the evening before Thanksgiving. The restaurant was lively even at 4:15!  

Good selection of wines, cocktails and appetizers 1/2 off from 4-6.  Supplemented the apps with the chef's special pasta dish that we shared.

Good service, good food and fair prices

name: MichasfmOC
review_text: Awesome menu.  service quality and great food make Aurum a gem for this wonderful town.

name: LindseyH
review_text: It was our first time trying Aurum after coming to Breck regularly and we will be back!  They weren't joking about the best happy hour in town.  The food was unique and the diverse and fun cocktail menu were a joy to taste. We were seated and served promptly and our server Kevin was detailed and attentive.  It was the perfect way to kick off our vacation and celebration getaway!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food! Amazing service!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent food & Service! Amazing Gluten-free German Chocolate Cake!!!

name: melissam
review_text: Fantastic service during happy hour at the bar. Food taste, temperature and portions great.

name: AlexC
review_text: All 4 of us loved our dinners. Our server was friendly and attentive. Aurun is an unpretentious, excellent dining experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious Food. Amazing service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food, service and ambiance. Michael the waiter was excellent. Will be back soon. Thanks

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Some of the best food I’ve ever had and some of the best service I’ve ever had.

name: LindaB
review_text: Great food and drinks. One of the best happy hours in Breck. Husband and I split the cauliflower dish and burger that’s on the snack menu and it was delicious and plentiful!

name: LucyLila2
review_text:
I love this restaurant. I took a friend visiting Breckenridge and she really enjoyed the food and wine. 
The Parker House rolls are the best I have ever tasted and definitely a must try.

name: KristinC
review_text: It’s a very small restaurant. The menu is focused on trying to be exotic and unique over being tasty. We were in a tiny table by the walkway. Both my husband and I had did not have our meal sit well.

name: AZtoCOgirl
review_text: Service was amazing!! Definitely order the curry cauliflower appetizer; we don’t even like curry and it was one of our favorite things that night!

name: MackensieD
review_text: Their happy hour is not to be missed! It’s exceptional! The burger and house rolls are mind blowing! Can’t wait to go back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful experience. Happy hour prices are unbeatable and since it was our anniversary they surprised us with 2 glasses of champagne on the house!

name: Abigail
review_text: Had a fantastic experience at Aurum in Breck. Michael had an absolutely incredible energy and provided excellent service. Will definitely be back!

name: RobertaF
review_text: This place never disappoints.  Wonderful food, service and friendliness every single time.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Seriously amazing. Everything was on point - cocktails, shared plates, main dish….we had it all. Eric was phenomenal and his recommendations were spot on. Definitely try the curried cauliflower, pork belly and the melt in your mouth best chicken I’ve ever had main course!

name: stork
review_text: Wonderful place! Would highly recommend this place

name: RonS
review_text: Wonderful happy hour. Eric was a wonderful server.

name: SharonS
review_text:
A couple of items need attention:
1)  The lettuce in the wedge salad was mushy, frozen?  
2) The steak had a fair amount of grilse in the meat.
3) Potatoes and vegetable medley were delicious.

name: JuliaM
review_text:
There were only 5 entrees on the menu and they were sold out of 2 of them (both my husband’s first choice and my first choice) when we ordered and that was relatively early (6:30).
My food was excellent.  My husband’s Hanger steak was very tough.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Overpriced mediocre

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely LOVED this place!!! SO worth the money. I haven’t had a fantastic meal like this in a while. If you’re looking for a place, go here. Cauliflower app was amazing as well as the steak entree.

name: TamiL
review_text: Love the food and service will definitely be back

name: JenniferB
review_text: Another great night at Aurum!

name: MikeP
review_text: Bravo, well done. Great experience on all accounts.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We live Aurum! Service and food are fantastic!!

name: AmyM
review_text:
Wonderful experience. They were very sensitive to my allergies and made my meal taste delicious. 
We will be going back for sure.

name: PeggyD
review_text: First of all our server John was great. Enthusiastic about the food and explained everything and was spot on with suggestions. The food was excellent and prepared and served well.

name: John
review_text: My meal was absolutely delicious - really one of the best I have had.  I ordered the trout and it was cooked perfectly.  The sides of spaghetti squash and beets went very well with the fish and enhanced the meal. The atmosphere was lively and fun too and the service was excellent!

name: JuliaH
review_text: We always enjoy this restaurant. Great happy hour!

name: James
review_text: Best meal I have had in years. Unique flavor palates and seasonal ingredients.

name: Sweetwater
review_text: Had dinner and overall i would consider it a disappointment.  Our server was not well coached to work at this restaurant, nor give us the confidence that he actually knew the food or drinks available.  Starters and appetizers (a bit confusing on the menu) were not overwhelming.  We ordered three plates for our party of four.  The Crudo fish plate only had 3 servings.  At the very least the server should have made us aware and offered to add a fourth serving at additional cost.  The crispy curried cauliflower was definitely a hit.  The mains were okay, but by no means were they great,  A bit insulting to be charged $6 for four small dinner rolls which arrived late as the server forgot to submit to the kitchen.  Lastly there is a 3% surcharge which allegedly goes to the back room (kitchen).  Really?........why not just raise your already overpriced foods.

name: Dinnerout
review_text: Wonderful service, atmosphere and food

name: KatieZ
review_text: Can’t say enough good things about Food and service! They went above and beyond to give us a special experience, truly so kind and thoughtful. Also the food is so amazing! An experience we will never forget.

name: Kitty
review_text: Amazing happy hour and the staff is phenomenal. Plates were always picked up soon as we finished eating. Highly recommended 10/10. Luxury ambiance with a family staff feel. Will definitely be back.

name: CaseyT
review_text: Great experience, but the food took a long time. We ordered before 3 tables near to us and we were the last to get our food. We were only a party of 3. I would expect that for a larger party size.

name: PayTechtraveler
review_text: Michael made the experience over the top.  He was so attentive but also funny and knew his food.  I highly recommend this place and will steer others to this incredible restaurant.  Kudos to the chef!

name: JanetJ
review_text: The food was good but overpriced. A very small pasta appetizer was just under $25. Entrees start in the $30s. Again, good but not that good.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was amazing!! They are very helpful accommodating dietary needs.

name: CyrusS
review_text: Food and service were was excellent. Prices are on the high side, but it's in downtown Breckenridge, so to be expected.

name: Dinner
review_text: Great food and great prices during happy hour. We will definitely be back.

name: TravisR
review_text: Great service and incredible flavors!  Amazing Happy Hour!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and service!

name: Mully
review_text: The food is delicious and the drinks are creative at Aurum.  The service is impeccable.  When we have a special event, this is our go to restaurant.

name: karosm
review_text: Excellent food, excellent wait staff. Steaks cooked to perfection. Too loud for a romantic evening; poor acoustics mixed with loud groups trying to talk over each other wasn't a lovely combination.

name: KImR
review_text:
Surprisingly large venue. Bar space at the front of the house is well designed and fitted out. Long, share table between the bar and high top tables is a great idea. 

Food was modern, fresh and eclectic - in a good way! Not your average American fare which is great

name: Jean
review_text: Service and menu selections are excellent as always!  It does not disappoint!

name: RobinM
review_text: Went there for Happy Hour to celebrate an elopement. The food, drinks, and service was all amazing!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great! Enjoyed tremendously!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food, great service.

name: DenverResidentinBC
review_text: Unbelievably flavorful fare in this unique and lovely eatery.  Really loved every part of the meal from the ambiance, decor, service to the cuisine. The menu offers varied, interesting, and tasty dishes, balancing some traditional fare with more innovative dishes. Each day, the chef offers a different pasta dish, all of which sound wonderful.  I chose a blend of Asian-inspired dishes like the Korean Fried Chicken (by the way, super-delicious), and balanced that with a harvest season salad of arugula, almonds, pears, and burrata.  I topped it off with a delicious chablis, and ended with the chocolate gelato. Overall, a superb meal in the Colorado mountains that also offers excellent service. I highly recommend Aurum.

name: NatalieW
review_text: We loved it!!!!

name: MichaelM
review_text: The food and drinks were top notch, we will definitely be back here when we visit Breckinridge next

name: Rachael
review_text: Great happy hour here, but I added to Opentable that we were celebrating our anniversary. The server brought this up and asked if we'd drink champagne if he brought it. We said yes, of course. When we got the bill, we were charged for it. Not very classy, and I won't add a special occasion on Opentable again.

name: KearaK
review_text: Great happy hour!

name: KathleenS
review_text: We were vacationing in Breckenridge for our wedding anniversary and decided to celebrate the occasion with dinner at Aurum.  Everything was superb!!! We had the Corn "Ribs," the Hamachi, and Pear and Arugula salad for appetizers and then shared the Braised Chicken Plate as our main course.  Everything was seasoned and presented with perfection Our young server was helpful with wine pairings and made suggestions for wines that we have never tried before--all were outstanding and excellent choices for the cuisine. The ambience was lovely and the service in general was top notch! For example, being from California we booked an  table outside but the weather suddenly turned cold by California standards. The Aurum staff had the foresight to save us a romantic table inside--just in case--so we were seated there at once. I have led many Art/Food/Wine tours internationally as a museum professional and culinary enthusiast and Aurum is right up there with the very best!  Can't wait to return when we are in Colorado again. Thank you Aurum for a great Anniversary celebration including the delicious complimentary champagne for our anniversary toast!

name: SteveK
review_text: Wonderful food and some of the friendliest wait staff I have ever encountered

name: JudyB
review_text: We dined with our son who has lived in Breckenridge since 2007. After the meal, he told us and Katie, our server, that the Aurum meal was the best he has ever in Breckenridge. We concur! Katie was helpful, courteous, and knowledgeable.

name: Expectations11
review_text: Outstanding meal. Great service. Favorite restaurant of a week-long vacation..

name: Snowmanda
review_text: Very nice spot in Breckenridge, good quality food and service.

name: MaryM
review_text: Food, drinks, service excellent. Only downside was back room noise - very loud! We asked to sit in front room and was much better.

name: Janis
review_text:
Happy hour drinks and food were a great value and pretty darn good.  The main course we ordered was only fair - bland, underseasoned and not the right temperature.  We also ordered an extra crabcake for $8 - it was about the tiniest crabcake I've ever seen - possibly 1.5 tablespoons of crab.....  Tasted ok but not a good value for the price. 

Management was generous and removed the bland main course from our bill which was VERY nice!

BTW - their Aurum Manhattan was worth the $15! The addition of chartreuse gave an understated herbal note to the drink which was a great taste3!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The ambiance was nice but unfortunately the food was a big disappointment. One of us ordered the 16oz steak and did not even eat 1/4 of it because it was so chewy. Very disappointing.

name: Ramjet
review_text: The food at Aurum was very good.  IF you are looking for a place to enjoy a special meal, this would be a good choice.  Also, I liked the way they have selected a finite number of good wines and sell them by the glass.  Well done.

name: PeterB
review_text: Best hamburger in town.

name: ClifH
review_text: Our favorite go to spot in Breck!! Always amazing!

name: NinaK
review_text: We found the menu pretty limited and not much appealed to us. We ended up deciding on burgers. A burger and a glass of wine for each of us resulted in a $110 bill after tax and tip. Overpriced.
