name: Cari
review_text: Great food and exceptional service

name: MinerB
review_text: Fantastic food, great atmosphere, very friendly staff - would highly recommend!

name: Tom09
review_text: A terrific experience. From the time we entered the restaurant we were met with smiles and graciousness. A world-class treat!!!

name: KearaK
review_text: Fabulous!  Highly recommend

name: pounditout
review_text: This was my second dining experience at Aurum and it was not nearly as good as my first and I believe it was because of our waitress.  It took a long time for her to even say hello and get our drink order, which were good once we finally got them.  I had asked for a high top on my open table reservation and didn't get it.  We placed our dinner order and she must have forgotten to turn the order into the kitchen.  She apologized and said the "system" had some glitches but our order would be right out and she would appreciate our patience, we were fine with waiting as we had ordered some $6 rolls which she did replenish free of charge after I asked for more.  People sat after us were already eating.  She asked if we had been brought our food (there was no food on our table)?  Food finally came but wasn't cooked as requested (medium) for the Manhattan steak...my friend ate it anyhow because we waited so long.  I informed the waitress that the steak was undercooked but she blamed it on her handwriting saying the chef probably couldn't read it.  Over all I wouldn't go back unless it is 1/2 price happy hour because the prices aren't worth the experience especially if you have an inattentive/unapologetic waitress.  They need more vegetarian options on the menu as well.

name: AshleyF
review_text: Always the best of the best. Our favorite spot in Breck!! Most delicious food, drinks, wonderful staff and gorgeous design!

name: Ashree
review_text: Excellent food and great service and wait staff.  Michael is was our server and he was fabulous!

name: Foody
review_text: Our waiter, Burt, was extremely nice and we cannot say enough about how amazing the food was! Korean fried chicken was delectable, as was the pasta special. My husband had a sort of honey cake for dessert, which he said was amazing and I had the German chocolate cake, Oh My!!!!

name: KarenR
review_text: We visited Aurum79 for happy hour. The drinks were outstanding and the food and service was worth returning more often. Very happy with everything and we recommend it to everyone.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Such a lovely time. Great group experience near the bar area.

name: KJD1234
review_text:
Inventive wonderful food…every dish was a hit, full of flavor..
Michael, our waiter, was just excellent…. Sociable, knowledgeable, and attentive…
Would highly recommend..we will be going back…

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic food and atmosphere. The food was local, fresh, and creative - Kristen was engaging and helped us select an excellent drink and dinner selection. Will definitely be back XOXO

name: MarkC
review_text: Always a favorite. Can’t beat the Happy Hour menu with good food (unusual and not cliche Happy Hour food) at a great value.

name: Bumpkin
review_text:
Our server gave us excellent advice on the dishes and suggestions for wines. He didn't say everything is excellent as they so often do but actually said there was one thing he didn't like and why - that was fine.
The salad was excellent, the burger and fries tasty, the duck delicious, the wines went well. 
Only disappointment - the bill came with a surcharge for the kitchen. That is not mentioned on the menu and seems dishonest. Consequently our tip for the meal overall was lower.

name: Matthew
review_text: Amazing food, great service, and cool spot. Would definitely return!

name: Andrew
review_text: This is one of my favorite places in all of Colorado!

name: NMFoodie
review_text: We went for happy hour on a Wednesday and sat outside. The food was fantastic, vegetarian-friendly, and on a great happy hour discount. The dishes were unique and creative with well-integrated flavors and textures that I find many unique dishes miss. Our waiter was attentive and helpful with suggestions for food and drink pairings. We had our 4 year old son with us and he enjoyed the macaroni and cheese from the children's menu and space to run in the front yard area. I look forward to going again and trying more of the regular menu items.

name: streat
review_text: This is a go to place for us when we stay in Breckenridge each summer.  Their Happy Hour is excellent, with interesting food and beverage options.  All the staff is very welcoming and service is consistently good.  We also enjoy the decor and the atmosphere - very comfortable and relaxing.

name: JBH69
review_text: The best dining experience I've ever had in Breckenridge.  A must for anyone that enjoys great food and great service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was great but waitress was overwhelmed and kept forgetting to bring drinks.

name: MooseMama
review_text: BEST Happy Hour in town!  Great Food, Drink & Ambience!

name: MichaelS
review_text: Very nice little place in the heart of Breck. We took our kids with us and the staff and menu selection were awesome for them. Highly recommend the chicken and seabass!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This was one of the best dining experiences I have ever had. It was pricey, but worth every penny. The food was some of the best I’ve ever had, presented so beautifully with INCREDIBLE flavor. Such a gem of a restaurant, you will not be disappointed!

name: AmyA
review_text: Edward did a great job. We appreciated the check in right before happy hour ended! The burrata was fantastic and the honey butter with the rolls was really good

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful.  Manager unbelievable.  Sweet evening

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Creative pan-Asian twists on familiar dishes, well balanced and flavorful. Excellent service in a welcoming environment.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Thank you Kristen for,all,the recomendations, we loved pairing the diferents wines with the plates, love it will, definitly see you guys again!

name: murban1019
review_text: Excellent!

name: vickih
review_text: Our go-to restaurant for happy hour - always great food and service!

name: HomerK
review_text: Aurum is one of our favorite restaurants in the world, but their Happy Hour drink and food specials are the best by far!   They actually promote great wines at a great price, and their French Onion Burger with lemon-Parmesan fries,,,wowsa, we think the best burger in the world!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Every bite was delicious, came here for our honeymoon and was one of the best meals we’ve ever had.

name: JayD
review_text: Exceptional every time.

name: SWeat
review_text: Aurum is our favorite restaurant in Breckenridge. We always try to eat here at least once whenever we’re in town. We did have to send back an over cooked burger (the first time we’ve ever had to send back food in 25+ visits!) management was extremely accommodating and other waiters were attentive, while our waiter was slow and less attentive. We’ll be going back for certain and already have Aurum booked for an event next summer.

name: Michelle5280
review_text: Always the best in every way

name: PMH12
review_text: Burrata and stone fruit salad had no peaches in it and a tiny amount of plums. Does not deserve to be called a stone fruit salad. 3% service fee is stupid. Just pay your employees more and increase menu price. Main courses (trout and duck) were great!

name: Kadi
review_text: We come to Aurem every summer when we visit Breck and we are always impressed with the food and service. Our sever, Eric, was extremely patient with us and explained the menu and answered all our questions. Great cocktails and the food is always new, fresh and outstandingly prepared.

name: TommyG
review_text: Perfect. Service, food, and ambiance 5 star!!

name: DPRBreck
review_text: The best bet for Aurum is to share plates; the menu is always changing and there's something for every foodie here. Not a kid place, thankfully.

name: KaylaS
review_text: The service was outstanding and the curry cauliflower starter was the best thing we tried.

name: JozetteL
review_text: Server could have been more interested. Food runner with glasses was amazing.

name: LeslieS
review_text: Great happy hour!

name: luv2dine
review_text: Always fantastic food and drinks! Best happy hour in Breck!

name: DanS
review_text: James was an amazing server. The Happy Hour menu and pricing was great.  That is what brought us in.

name: AmandaB
review_text: Quite possibly the best restaurant experience we have ever had. I’m not sure if the food or the service was better. Absolute perfection. We recommend getting server all things to share to really experience the menu.

name: Casey
review_text: Best experience in dining we have had in a while. We are eloping and the staff went above and beyond to make us feel special. The food was fantastic, one of the best steaks I have ever had. Would highly recommend.

name: DebHubb
review_text: It was our first time at Aurum and we loved it!  Great food accompanied by great service.   The burger is to die for - one of the bests we have ever had!  Definitely need a reservation and the restaurant was very busy!  Enjoy!

name: Bostonfoodie
review_text: A great meal — every bit as good as the Steamboat location!

name: LizaK
review_text: Our waiter was friendly and knowledgeable.  And the menu and specialty cocktails were outstanding!  Our anniversary dinner was a night to remember.

name: Bdaygirl
review_text: Exceeded my expectations! Food was delicious (grilled octopus, sea bass, and the chocolate chip cookies!), service was excellent, and the restaurant had a very cool vibe to it. Will definitely come back when we are in town again!

name: NodgieB
review_text: We love this place. One of our very favorite. The wait staff is so friendly as is the hostess who seats you. Hope they continue to do well during these hard times!!❤️

name: GinaD
review_text: Fabulous as always. Love the friendly and professional staff, food is always superb.

name: JessicaF
review_text: Amazing food and service. It is quite loud, but if that doesn't bother you it is worth the trip and money!

name: TimV
review_text: Happy hour is fantastic!  Don’t miss out on the Curried Cauliflower, Wedge and Caesar salads!  The Colorado bass entree was the best we ever had!  Our waitress was super and so attentive. We will definitely be back!

name: STAR
review_text: Went to Aurum for happy hour before a concert. We had a fabulous experience with Birdie as our server. The best service I can recall since the pandemic began. The food was also wonderful - we really enjoyed happy hour on the patio. The curried cauliflower was delicious, as was the burrata salad. Just a wonderful experience all around. We will be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went for the “best happy hour in Breck”, and it did NOT disappoint. Not only were there some great deals but everything we consumed was absolutely delicious. The cauliflower and rolls were unmissable, and the Caesar salad & French onion burgers were delicious. Our server, James, was attentive (but not overbearing), and always attended our table with a friendly positive attitude. We were so sad to discover Aurum on our last night in Breck, if we were there longer we definitely would have returned.

name: Chenz
review_text: My young son and I had dinner here.  We were rather casually dressed and I could immediately sense the waitress wasn’t as interest in us as a result.  The neighboring tables were told the specials, I had to ask for the info as it wasn’t offered.  I sense she figured we weren’t big spenders so weren’t  given the same level of attention as others.  Food was good, the Bass was only ok.  Cocktails and moctails were great.  Our dessert was sent to another table where it sat for 5 minutes and then given to us.  The guy at that table shopped it around stating it wasn’t his.  They were billed for it too.  Value is low in my opinion, my son and my bill totaled $225.  Way better value in Breckenridge.  Won’t go back.

name: camille
review_text: We had a really nice meal here. Our server, Katie, did a great job guiding us though the menu. Would definitely return!

name: BEFL
review_text:
The food and service were amazing.
Our server provided very valuable and spot on descriptions and recommendations of food and wines. There was a large bachelorette table of 12 so the noise level was pretty high. It did improve once they left, but it is not a quiet restaurant.

name: dockate
review_text: My husband and I went to Aurum during Happy Hour. It was amazing! We had the Parker House Rolls, Crispy Curried Cauliflower, Aurum Caesar and the French Onion Burger. Each dish was better than the next. Theses dishes are considered “snacks” and made for a delicious dinner.  My husband had the Manhattan cocktail and I had the Negroni. We highly recommend this restaurant. Reservations are a must for the Happy Hour as it is very popular.  The only downside is the noise level in the dining room. As the room filled, it became extremely noisy, especially when a party of ten women were seated. My waiter had difficulty hearing me and my husband and I periodically couldn’t talk to each other. This however, improved when they started ordering and eating.

name: MarkO
review_text: While a couple of the menus items were OK I do not understand the best in Breckenridge rating as we have been to much better restaurants in town such as Embers and Hearthstone. Menu is very limited and over priced for what you get. It started to rain so we had to move inside and then told we had to leave in 45 minutes as they had another reservation for the table.

name: JaneW
review_text: Outstanding as always. Such a creative menu, and servers are knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the food they are serving. A must when we are in Breck!

name: SusanD
review_text: Best happy hour in town!

name: VictoriaD
review_text: We enjoyed the happy hour. Fantastic food, great prices and a special atmosphere.

name: ReganC
review_text: Dinner was amazing! Service was excellent. We're a family of 4 with a 3 year old and an 8 week old and we didn't feel out of place. Kids menu was a little pricey. I had the Rocky Mountain Trout, it was incredible and worth every penny!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fab, fab, fab. Get the corn, cauliflower and cookies!!

name: RonR
review_text: Dinner 6 weeks ago was outstanding.  Dinner last night was disappointing.  Trout was not fresh and duck was undercooked and very tough.

name: JillM
review_text: This is over favorite spot in Breck. Great food, service, and charm.

name: RobertS
review_text: Great folks & food!  We enjoyed every bit of it!

name: StevenY
review_text: Celebrated our recent engagement at dinner at Aurum and they were so awesome. Reserved us a nice booth with a little more privacy and gave us some celebratory bubbles free of charge. Everyone was so nice and welcoming. Food was EXCELLENT.

name: JoeyP
review_text: Thomas is a great waiter! Bartender great too! Food was superb!

name: AndrewR
review_text: Absolutely love Aurum! Best happy hour ever!

name: BirthdayGirl
review_text:
Morgan was our server and she was gracious, friendly and hospitable. We were celebrating a special occasion and were greeted with glasses of sparkling Rose without reminding Morgan. 
The food was amazing, we enjoyed the ambiance outside on the patio on a warm summer evening. 

The food, service, ambiance and experience were all fantastic!

name: Patschi
review_text: Aurum always delivers!  Great food, friendly servers, & delicious drinks.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: A quarter ear of corn costs the same as a smoked old fashioned. 1/5 stars.

name: Teresa
review_text: The food was delicious and the service was excellent!

name: AmyG
review_text: Food and presentation was excellent. Turns out I don't like Stripped Bass , but the Duck Confit was terrific as was the Hamachi Crudo.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went for happy hour and everything was excellent!

name: TommyG
review_text:
Excellent food & staff.
Generous portions, perfect dining experience.

name: Nancy
review_text: Our first visit to Aurum was perfect!  Delicious food and wine with unique cocktails. Our waiter Eric was attentive but never made us feel rushed. We’re still talking about our experience and will definitely return.

name: owlridge
review_text: Consistent for and service. An enjoyable evening until a bachelorette party arrived....

name: Potcake
review_text:
We always enjoy Aurum. Best happy hour in town. The food is incredible and the service is always great. Tried the Korean tartar and it did not disappoint. I will def be ordering it again! 

On our most recent visit I requested an intimate table on Opentable and I am not sure of they took my request seriously or if it was coincidence but we were seated at a corner table near the window and it felt almost like we had a private room so I really appreciated that. 

Another great part of our last visit was our server, James. He was attentive without being overbearing or hovering. He was just lovely and made our night even better. Looking forward to our next visit.

name: PrestonJ
review_text: Aurum is my favorite place in Breckenridge. Staff are always in a good mood, ambiance is amazing, and the happy hour cannot be beat anywhere (even in a major metro area).

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and cocktails!!!! Excellent choice

name: PJDCO
review_text: Well developed dishes with amazing flavors.  Will definitely return!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Delicious food, good service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was delicious, great service - James was amazing. Highly recommend

name: EricZ
review_text: Michael and the team were great!

name: TC46
review_text: Anniversary treats. We are from the appetizer menu and we’re quite satisfied. We will be back. Happy hour was worth it.

name: KatieH
review_text: Beautiful restaurant, our server Burt was outstanding and the cheeseburger was divine!  Didn’t love the crab ravioli pasta special but the small plates of cauliflower and Korean chicken were top notch.  Definitely recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had a terrific French Volnay.  The octopus and fresh, handmade pasta appetizers (crab stuff pasta) were phenomenal!  We’ve had the Parker House rolls in the past (cutting back in bread currently), and they were amazing!  I had the chicken/farro dish…excellent!  My husband had the trout and enjoyed.  The portions are large, we probably should have split a main dish after the wonderful appetizers.  Our server was terrific.

name: LIthfoodie
review_text: Loved the happy hour offerings- best in town!

name: Tourist
review_text: Nice meal, not an extensive menu but offered fish, beef and chicken. Service was good with an adequate wine list.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic food. Great service

name: Katie
review_text: Great service. Ready for the reservation, organized for a small birthday celebration. B-day card on the table when I arrived. All items ordered simply delicious! Excellent. Can't wait to return. Aurum is really wonderful.

name: Rose
review_text: Service, seating, atmosphere, drinks...all outstanding.  We will be back.  The lesser rating had to do with the duck main dish which was unremarkable but expensive.   People seated next to us ordered sharable items (cauliflower, octopus)...looked great.   We were told that the restaurant was out of octopus as well as one of the fish dishes....we would have ordered both.   Again, Aurum is traditionally a wonderful restaurant that we enjoy...and we will be back.

name: RJskier
review_text:
This was our first time dining here and we will return . Our server James was excellent . He made us feel welcome and free to take our time dining . The food was incredible! My husband and I had the pasta of the night for a starter and it was stuffed with caramelized onions and bacon and a crispy eggplant strip in a yummy white sauce . For our main entree we split the sea bass served with risotto and green beans and a red vermouth reduction sauce . The chef knows how to deliver the sauce - oh my - so very good .  Not that we had to have dessert but we did . James suggested a honey cake with some peaches and cherries . I think I will go for a chocolate dessert next time . My husband loved it . 
It’s is a bit pricey but worth every penny if your budget can afford it - give it a try

name: Aplus
review_text: Excellent atmosphere. Cocktails are amazing, I had the Aurum Manhattan which was a great take on that drink.  Food was stellar.

name: CarolineM
review_text: We had great service and enjoyed the happy hour. The cauliflower was excellent. The Caesar salad was delicious. The kids menu was refreshingly progressive… one of my kids ordered the steak, mashed potatoes and veggies!  The only miss that we ordered was the Korean fried chicken. If you like chicken wings you might like it, but my husband likes wings and could only take 2 bites.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was amazing.   Really great.   We had fried chicken and peach salad.   Duck and burger.   Everything was really great.   The service was just Ok.   Our server never came to our table at all so we had the flag down the hostess to take our order.  Not sure what was going on, but it all worked out in the end.   Super cute and cozy inside and the food was great.   Make sure you get the chocolate chip cookies.   So yummy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Cute outside and great food.

name: KarenP
review_text: We love coming here whenever we are in Breck.  The team of servers and all the staff make it a warm and inviting experience. The food is always great.  Parker rolls and cauliflower are a must.

name: Jill
review_text: Every time, expectations are met! Great food, staff and service!

name: TandS
review_text: Beautiful day to be eating outside.  Amazing food and wine

name: DavidB
review_text: We were outside on the deck which was lovely.  Noise level was pretty high inside. Outstanding service and food was creative and delicious.

name: JessicaK
review_text: Tomahawk steak was amazing. Craft cocktails were amazing. Killer ambiance. My favorite restaurant in Breck

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Passionate about high quality food and service. Clean wine list and great atmosphere.

name: LarryA
review_text: Wonderful appetizers and entrees in a beautiful setting.  Service was great and we'll definitely be back.

name: AshleyM
review_text: Wonderful dinner, great staff and atmosphere. Can’t wait to return!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Happy hour deal was amazing

name: Carol
review_text: The food at Aurum is truly delicious.  The pairings are unique.  Staff are always friendly and courteous.  Their curried cauliflower is a must.  Definitely one of my go to restaurants in Breckenridge.

name: streat
review_text: Best happy hour in town.  Atmosphere is upbeat, wait staff is friendly and attentive, chef can accommodate dietary restrictions.  Drinks are delicious and served promptly.  It's our favorite place to hang out when we make our bi-annual visit.

name: Limax
review_text:
Waitress seemed uninformed 
Only advised our main course was not available halfway thru meal
It's trivial but it's meaningful that they served felafel with a scant amount of dip and then wanted .75 more for what we should have gotten. They like to represent how unique they are and there's a bit of emperor's new clothes. Glad we went to see what the noise was about but wouldn't return

name: JC14
review_text: We had the best experience at Aurum. We were promptly seated upon arrival. Our server, James, preemptively acknowledged our daughter’s nut allergy when he first greeted us, which was very comforting. He answered many questions and even went to ask the chef when he didn’t know the answer to a question. The specialty cocktails and food were delicious and beautifully presented. One of our best meals in Breckenridge, but the service made our experience even better. Thanks Aurum and James!

name: Luvtogoout
review_text: Staff was very friendly and the food was really good.

name: LindaB
review_text: This is our first time visiting Aurum.  We read quite a few reviews ahead of time to get an idea from others customers on menu items.  We were very excited to dine here based upon reviews.  We have been dining in Breckenridge for over 35 years and love when new restaurants come to town.  Although they have been open since 2018, with the pandemic, we didn't have an opportunity to visit until now.  To be honest, we were underwhelmed over all.  Our starters were the crispy curried cauliflower and the Aurum caesar.  We loved  the cauliflower and 5-stars!  A wonderful blend of flavors and crispy to perfection.  Finally a restaurant that serves "real" caesar salad with anchovies and disappointed to have only 2 anchovies.  For dinner, we ordered the Korean Fried Chicken, French Onion Burger and Half Chicken Duo.  The Korean Fried Chicken was very tasty but not as "hot" as advertised.  As for the French Onion Burger, it was very good but paid $27 for burger and fries because they were out of our original order of Grilled Octopus.  The Half Chicken Duo had a beautiful presentation!!  A hearty serving and many different flavors but lacked that last finishing flavor that would send it over the top.  Great service from Thomas!!  Overall, a bit pricey even for resort standards and compared to many of the other fine-dining restaurants we frequent in Breckenridge.

name: MarkC
review_text: Best Happy Hour in Breckenridge. Tried the octopus (not on happy hour menu) for the first time and it was amazing - fresh and tender.  Our waitress Morgan was a delight

name: DerekOmalley
review_text: As always, the food at Aurum never disappoints. Only disappointment for us was that they were out of the FG. We will definitely be back for that. Also, we definitely want to give a big mention to Thomas!! He made the evening a fun and wonderful one. Super attentive (without being in your face)...magically appears every time we needed him...helped coordinate the orders so that we have enough room on our table before the next dish comes out. We enjoyed seeing and messing with the big man, Grayson as well. The people at Aurum have always been just the best. See you guys soon!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Husbands birthday/4th of July

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Really great food, you can tell a lot of thought went into the preparation of each dish. Will definitely come back! 
Only suggestion would be to have a better wine selection but other than that 10/10.

name: SteveC
review_text: Great food,Great Service we always eat here at least twice on our visits.Highly recommend.

name: Lauren
review_text: Came for dinner/happy hour and sat on the patio with our dog.  Loved the food, service and comfortable atmosphere on the patio. The interior is very pretty- We’ll come back to enjoy that sometime without the dog. Cauliflower app was a hit all around!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Probably the best food in Breckenridge

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great place. Good vibe. Octopus was great. Pasta special was surprisingly lite, and the trout had a red sauce that added the perfect tang. Foodies will love this place.

name: Sarah
review_text: Great happy hour!!   Highly recommend cocktails, shared plates, and pasta dishes!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Nice outdoor dining!

name: worldaround
review_text: The best Happy Hour in town. Make sure to order cauliflower. Burger and fries are delicious.

name: JS1234
review_text: Phenomenal place. Everything from the second we walked in, to when we left was fabulous. Ambiance, service, food, wine, dessert. 10 out of 10 recumbent this place for an incredible meal!

name: JessicaJ
review_text: We enjoyed Aurum during happy hour and nothing can beat the quality of food for the value. My kids enjoyed the kids steak meal and they both said it was the best meal they ever had!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food and drinks are amazing!  Service is too notch. Happy hour is a must!

name: Vicki
review_text: Aurum was an amazing dining experience; from the food to the attentive staff. Would definitely dine again when in town.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
There were three of us for reservations at 7:30. The restaurant was quite packed so I was anticipating some service that might have been a little bit stressed. That was not the case at all. We arrived a little early but were seated immediately. The host was incredibly gracious and personable; we all wanted to marry him. Our server was Francesca (I apologize if I slaughtered the spelling) and she was a delight. She recommended things (aka the Pinot Noir that was absolutely killer) when we got stuck, sold the dishes so well, and was a comfortable level of casual while keeping things professional without being stuffy. There were about 4-5 people either picking up plates, replenishing water, taking pictures for us, dropping off food, opening windows....you name it, they did it. And might I add that everyone was so heckin’ pleasant and great? Because they were and it elevated the experience. The food could have been only subpar and I would have come back there in a heartbeat. Luckily the food was absolutely killer. Everything from the rolls to the asparagus soup to the hangar steak....there was not one single bad bite of food the whole night. 
From what started out as a rough day due to a power outage while on vacation turned into something we will remember for the rest of our lives. We were so happy we made the reservations because that trip to Aurum made our trip so much more incredible.
Thank you to everyone at Aurum for embodying what great hospitality is.

name: AlisonK
review_text: We were pleased with our entire dinging experience. The food was delicious, the presentation was to match and the ambiance and service were excellent. No complaints and highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for something fun but with a fantastic culinary twist.

name: EmilyK
review_text:
We were lucky to snag a reservation at Aurum when in town for the weekend and thoroughly enjoyed the experience! The food was imaginative, fresh and delicious. Our waiter made great recommendations for wines to accompany our selections. The cocktails were fantastic! I highly recommend the chocolate chip cookies for dessert…yeah, you can easily make them at home, but not like this. Trust me. 

The only reason I couldn’t give five stars for service is that we waited nearly 20 minutes after being seated before being able to place our drink and app order. Granted, it was during a very busy happy hour, but it also seemed like there may have been a miscommunication about who would work our table. The dining experience was well worth the initial wait. Cheers!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We went for HH. Food selection was outstanding, unique, creative, prices reasonable for HH. Enjoyed our time and the substance and libation.

name: TaraB
review_text: Always have a great time and meal at Aurum! They even treated us with a celebratory glass of champagne for our engagement!

name: Diner
review_text:
Went to check out the best happy hour in Breckinridge and Aurum was exactly that 
Breck has lots of great happy hours and this one is the best
Great food, drinks and wonderful staff and service 
So good 😊

name: LauraJ
review_text: My favorite place for happy hour in Breckenridge!

name: JenniferC
review_text: Fantastic choice in Breckenridge. Excellent food and reasonably priced.

name: TimG
review_text: Delicious food well prepared.

name: Mike
review_text:
My husband chose Aurum for his birthday dinner. We went to happy hour and we were seated right next to a huge wedding party.  The hostess immediately accommodated us as soon as we asked to move.  Fantastic service there.  
The drinks are outstanding!  The food is always good but we tried the falafel for a change of pace and it was not very good. Too dry and over cooked. Everything else was great!

name: LizC
review_text: Food was fantastic! Service was great and chef spoiled us :)

name: FizzPoff
review_text: Great food! Yummy, creative flavors.  Great for GF diners.  Excellent service.  Will go back

name: AdamH
review_text: Great food, nice patio, great service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We had an amazing experience here! They were so friendly and accommodating. Also, the food was delicious!

name: MabelG
review_text: Best deal at Aurum is happy hour but we went for dinner. Had cocktails, entrees, wine... all great.

name: happypapi
review_text: Delicious, delicious, delicious! Everything was so, so good. We ate way too much but regretted nothing.  The pasta was fresh and tasty, had the French fries as an appetizer and the whole family loved it. Highly recommend

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Outstanding on every front. We had a most wonderful time celebrating our 41st wedding anniversary.

name: CourtneyK
review_text:
It was a great experience, food and drink ... my Mom turned 77! We all enjoyed ourselves.
Thank you!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour!  Good food and drinks.  Great service and the space is beautiful.

name: DavidB
review_text: Excellent restaurant, the best meal I have had in months. The restaurant itself is beautiful too with great staff

name: SharonS
review_text: Excellent service. Food is delicious. Best restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Awesome happy hour. Food was outstanding.

name: UptownDiner
review_text: Probably, if not, the best restaurant in Breck. Can’t believe we waited so long to try it. Unbelievable happy hour menu and drinks - four drinks, 2 generous snack plates for about $50 before tip. Killer burger and fries - we split. Nice patio facing East, so the sun is blocked by the building. Absolutely going back. Thanks Katie!

name: Michael
review_text: Very enjoyable Office Happy Hour.  Great Drinks and amazing small plates

name: LikeItHot
review_text: The cauliflower was over the top absolutely cannot miss yum town!

name: DanK
review_text: prices way to high, especially for a glass of wine, burger and fries. Good food, service, but won't be coming back

name: NancyW
review_text: French onion burger was the best burger I might have ever had. And the cauliflower appetizer was outstanding.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Insanely wonderful foodie experience!! Everything was amazing but particularly loved the curried cauliflower, korean chicken, and the octopus. Every dish was wonderful, the only one not quite as superb was the pasta of the day. We loved our waiter, the restaurant n staff, and there is a fabulous and innovative cocktail menu as well. Perfect fr families which not many foodie places accomplish with a terrific kids hanger steak n chocolate chip cookie dessert that one child said “was a taste of heaven.”

name: RogerL
review_text:
Great atmosphere; fabulous food; excellent service 
The place to go in Breckinridge

name: Afif
review_text: An absolute favorite in Breckenridge. Unbeatable ambience, service and food/wine! It tops our List on every visit to town.

name: EmyR
review_text: We went during happy hour and enjoyed some delicious appetizers and drinks. Service and food was fantastic!

name: Garrett
review_text: Exceptional dinner with THE best Old Fashioned I’ve ever had!

name: JoJo
review_text: Short ribs and chicken entrees were delicious and cauliflower and Caesar salad were, as always, wonderful.

name: Martin
review_text: Great food, service and drinks--really inventive and well-preserved. Ask to NOT be seated in the back room, though, as it was hot and very loud.

name: atlinsept
review_text: Great food great service, the entire staff was helpful, Nick took great care of us. We’ll be back!

name: macsmak
review_text: The food and staff at Aurum are simply the best!! Thank you for another fabulous dining experience. We love you and will be back very soon (literally tomorrow)!

name: ColleenG
review_text: We love happy hour at Aurum!  Great deals on happy hour food and drinks and a lovely space to hang out in.  Always our go-to spot.

name: AlaynaK
review_text: Wonderful food and gluten free options for someone with Celiac.

name: MistyS
review_text:
Best Happy Hour ever and the Ftench Onion Birger is top notch.
Also the Mr. Pimm's is awesome.

name: elra26
review_text: This place really did not live up to the hype. I am a vegetarian and their menu is NOT veggie friendly. Not a single entree I could eat. They need to do better. I thought the market pasta would be vegetarian at least, but it wasn’t. I ended up cobbling a meal together from appetizers. The asparagus soup was good but barely warm. The falafels were fine but very bland to make a meal out of. The one bright spot was the strawberry and burrata salad, which was awesome. As for others in my party, the trout was apparently over cooked and over salted. The Asian noodles in the chicken and Asian noodles dish were quite spicy and undercooked. They were hard to chew. Overall, feels like a wasted dinner in Breckenridge. No issues with service or ambiance.

name: anastasiaj
review_text: It was just ok. We had a good waiter but watched food and drinks being miss delivered all night. The apps for great but pasta with mussels fell short, no real flavor. The wine and the drinks were low pour. Just not worth the money in general. We won’t be back

name: BeckyJ
review_text: From the welcome greeting upon arrival from Alexa, to the top notch service from Greyson to the killer happy hour priced menu we were more than delighted with our experience! Not our first amazing visit nor will it be the last! Aurum is a true gem in Breckinridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We are visiting Breckenridge for our honeymoon and Aurum surprised us with a champagne toast! The service was impeccable, the food was so flavorful and they had so many gluten free options. I highly recommend the strawberry sponge cake

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We really loved our first experience at Aurum! They helped us celebrate our anniversary, the service was outstanding (thanks, Thomas!), and the food & drinks were exceptional. We were actually there for Happy Hour and made a meal out of the Snacks (appetizers), which made for an enjoyable variety of food. We’re looking forward to going back next time we’re in Breck!

name: James
review_text: Aurum is one of the 2 or 3 best restaurants in Breckenridge.  The drinks are well made and creative.  The wine list is good and fairly priced.  The food is prepared with fresh ingredients and the menu changes with the season.  Service team is great!  This is not a great place for children - leave them at home with a pizza.

name: Woodswoman
review_text:
This restaurant was highly recommended by friends who come up to Breckenridge often.  We weren't disappointed.  Our waiter, Thomas, was exceptional, and I hope when we return, he will be here.

As are any resort restaurants in resort towns, the sticker shock on some of the main courses was a bit much, but we knew what we would probably encounter, and didn't want to just go out for burgers or pizza during our four nights here.

I would return!

name: SarahB
review_text: Great food,  service , and setting amongst the snow cap Breckinridge mountains

name: Steph
review_text: This place is 10 out of 10! Attentive and helpful service, creative and unique dishes and cocktails and great ambiance. When in Breckenridge you must stop by! We had the Beef Tartare, short rib and trout (thin so a bit dry). The mountain thyme drink is one of the best gin drinks I have had all year!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Serving staff made all accommodations for our guest with special food allergies , so appreciated

name: Bryce
review_text: Service was good. Arugula in Caesar salad was not so good. Curried cauliflower was delicious 😋 Drinks were mediocre but overpriced even for happy hour. Will not return.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The dinner and experience was fantastic. The staff was beautiful very polite friendly and helpful. However they did not give us a military discount or a Peak Eight discount. I just felt that the food was a little bit expensive but it was really wonderful food

name: julieb
review_text: Aurum (for me) is best for happy hour. Great ambience and fun with friends or date night.

name: DannyP
review_text: Great food and atmosphere in Breckenridge. Great Happy Hour

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Been dieing to spoil my woman and couldn’t think of a better place.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Excellent service. 
The food was good but limited choices. 
Happy hour specials were offered. 

The design had some interesting decor’ and was nice to look at. 
The overall layout of the restaurant was not so comfortable. 
The seating was set up like a coffee shop. 
It was very small and had a crowded feel.

name: Ontheverge
review_text: One of the best. And not just because the food is Ahhhhmazing!!! The service is exceptional. We love this place and look forward to going back often!

name: BarbA
review_text: Great evening! Eric, our server was excellent. Fun Happy Hour Celebration!

name: Dinnerout
review_text: Wonderful meal with unique combos. Great happy hour prices!

name: Callie
review_text: Food at Aurum is phenomenal! We try to go as much as we can for happy hour to get the burger, rolls, and Korean fried chicken! Yum!!!

name: HannanM
review_text: Such a great experience! Delicious food and attentive but not intrusive service. Easy to see that everyone cares about the experience they provide. Thanks for a wonderful meal!

name: alaala
review_text: Beautiful bar and space, great service! The cauliflower dish was AMAZING. Will now be an every time stop we are in Breck. We only did happy hour, which was a great deal!, but will definitely be there for dinner at our next visit to Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aurum continues to be one of our top 2-3 restaurants in Breckenridge!

name: natalieg
review_text: Delicious! Our favorite meal in Breckenridge. The lamb was perfectly done. We also really loved their Mules! We will be back!

name: Disappointed
review_text: Service and atmosphere was good, but food was so so for the money.

name: Jgadon25
review_text: Incredible place - look no further than here for a night on the town

name: Jill
review_text: Aurum never disappoints! The food, staff and atmosphere are always top notch!

name: TracieT
review_text: I feel they had an 'off' night. I let them know ahead we were celebrating a birthday, to do something a bit special..... Never did.  Very cool decorated establishment. Food was great except my trout, a touch overcooked.  The wait staff were super kind! We waited for our main course a long time. We were there 1.75 hrs. Two people no dessert. I would go back and try again.

name: KrisR
review_text:
We had the appetizers and happy hour drinks. All the food was exquisite!
The service was excellent!
The restaurant itself was charming inside

name: Sarah
review_text: My favorite happy hour in town. Amazing food, drinks and service. Never fails to impress!

name: jk08
review_text: I have been coming to Breckenridge for 40 years, and this is the best restaurant in which I have dined. Great food, excellent service, and good value. Thank you

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best oysters, perfect wine pairings, great service!

name: Kyle
review_text: Wonderful meal! Brussel sprouts were amazing! Loved the happy hour!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great. The food and staff were terrific

name: blueacemedia
review_text: Aurum in Breckenridge is one of our favorite places to go when in town to ski.  They have exceptional Happy Hour specials (which we missed by 15 minutes because our hotel shuttle was LATE... Darn.)  The service is great, the cocktails - both classic and specialty - are terrific, and the food is always exceptional.  We very highly recommend Aurum at any time - but if you are lucky enough to get there during Happy Hour - you'll be blown away.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: I get the same thing every time I visit. Burger medium rare. Just right. Wedge salad was good but lacking in bacon. Otherwise good experience. Recommend outside seating availability when temperatures are mid 50’s or above

name: RobertaF
review_text: Aurum never fails to delight.  Absolutely wonderful food, terrific service, and wonderful cocktails make for lovely evenings every time.

name: Patrick
review_text: Our table had the pasta, wagyu, and hanger steak, and they were all remarkable.

name: KarynS
review_text: Always always impressed with Aurum every time we're there!  Unique delicious menu options with a great wine and cocktail list as well.  Everyone is so friendly and love the atmosphere of the restaurant too!

name: KevinJ
review_text: Food creation were fun to explore & our server offered wonderful recommendations. Very easy to overeat with so many tempting possibilities.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wow!!!!!! This was my third time at Arum. I just can't believe how well done the food is here. So much care is out into the flavor, texture and presentation. And they are adventurous with their menu. Here is a funny story...my family of 4 ate here a few nights ago. I already knew how great the food was and was excited to come back. We could only get a 5:15pm reservation as everything late was booked 2.5 weeks out already. We got there and the waiter mentioned happy hour food selections were half off. So, WE WENT NUTS!!! We ordered so much for our stomachs HURT at the end of the meal. Then the check came. The prior 2 nights we are good meals at nice restaurants that we about $400 for the 4 of us before tip. I completely expected our tab at Arum to be around $400 as well--AND WOULD HAVE BEEN HAPPY TO PAY IT!!! Because the food is that good. Our bill? $211....OMFG. I was shocked!!! What a value. Book well in advance.

name: MarlenaG
review_text: We had been looking forward to this meal for a month and it didn't disappoint. It is fairly costly but we have found it to be well worth it on multiple occasions. Can't wait for our next visit! Our compliments to the chef!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great service, food was good but not outstanding.

name: AnnB
review_text: One of our favorite spots in Breck! We enjoyed the Parker house rolls, hanger steak, and trout - all cooked to perfection. The cookie dough dessert topped off a great meal. Only one suggestion: please add a Pinot Grigio offering to your wine list! Excellent meal made with quality ingredients. We’ve already booked our reservation for our next trip in a couple of weeks. Great job with covid distancing and protocols, too.

name: lbarry101
review_text: I think the restaurant was just ok. It got very noisy at times even with very few tables. The service was good but was not impressed with the food. Portions were small and not much flavor. We ordered brussel sprouts which were good. We also ordered a pasta dish which was very bland and the burrata and squash salad. The portion of the salad was very small, it was over salted and the bread served with it was stale. Would not recommend for the price.

name: MarkC
review_text: Very impressive menu and execution, from a foodie! Service like most of Breck was young snowboarders who could use a bit more professionalism and hustle. Otherwise, though, it was a nice, relaxing atmosphere. Really enjoyed the dinner.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best happy hour in Breckenridge! Very creative menu.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing time

name: SharonS
review_text:
Excellent customer service . Food is the BEST.
Recommend Aurum highly

name: RonnieB
review_text: Everything about Aurum was fantastic!  The service was impeccable, drinks amazing, and everything we ate was delicious.  Would definitely eat here next time we are lucky enough to be in Breckenridge!

name: PattyN
review_text: Large portions so good idea to share and mix it up a bit!  Main courses a little too fancy for me, but did several appetizers. Wedge salad was outstanding and a meal in itself!

name: JamieE
review_text: We chose Aurum to celebrate our daughter’s birthday because a good friend recommended it and the reviews were spectacular. Aurum did not disappoint

name: Audra
review_text: We went to Aurum our first night in Breckenridge and it was a truly amazing experience! The food, service and ambiance was stellar- their special homemade pasta that night was carbonara and we ordered it twice because it was so good!! Definitely recommend checking out.

name: Afif
review_text: The very best that Breck has to offer - from fabulous food & wine menu to incredibly friendly staff. Be sure to enjoy their unmatched Happy Hour in town!

name: RebekahM
review_text: Absolute best food in Breckenridge. We had happy hour small plates and drinks first. The brussel sprouts, cauliflower, and Korean BBQ chicken were so good that we ordered another round! We were so full off of our apps that we could hardly eat our duck main dish but it was very very good. The service was just as good as the food! Our waiter made the experience perfect. We didn’t want the night to end. But we ended wirh perfection...cookies and milk dessert and the creme brûlée’. My mouth is still watering. Thank you Aurum for the best parents’ night out night ever!

name: JaneW
review_text: Food and wine were great, as usual. The staff is always knowledgeable and enthusiastic about their menu- don’t miss the chocolate chip cookies!

name: KatieS
review_text: Always love it here. Extra great since they got us a table 30 min before our reservation!

name: Jeannie
review_text: Great food and service. A bit pricey but great experience...

name: KarenP
review_text: We enjoyed delicious shareables of cauliflower and brussel sprouts great signature drinks potato leek soup and Creme brulee with lavender honey. Wonderful attentive server and savory food.  We will be back.

name: CharleeA
review_text: Absolutely fantastic! From the moment we walked in to the time we left this restaurant was extraordinary! Service, food and atmosphere was phenomenal!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Chef, Brian Duncan, Alexa and Ed understand how to navigate one of the world's toughest industries. From Rio, to Barcelona to Breckenridge, CO, the creative dining experience here is one to recommend. Chef, Brian and team - cheers!

name: ElaineM
review_text: Great food, service and ambience. Happy hour is fantastic! Love the burger and wedge salad.

name: KymL
review_text: We love it here.  Our first time and look forward to many more. The food, the cocktails and service were all amazing.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Visiting Breckenridge and we were looking to try somewhere new. We are so happy to have obtained a reservation at Aurum. The food was outstanding from beginning to end. Presentation and the melding of flavors was exceptional. Speaking of exceptional our server Francesca was attentive and helpful. 
This is a top notch establishment that I would recommend to and “Foodie”

name: MissyC
review_text: We never miss Aurum on a trip to Breckenridge.  Easily top 5 of outstanding restaurants at Breck.  Service is always friendly and professional and the food is delicious!

name: CallieV
review_text: Food and wine was excellent. Service was very knowledgeable and helpful. Would definitely go again!

name: Breck101
review_text: Nice ambience and the service was good, but unfortunately the food was WAY too salty.  Four different dishes and they were all too salty.  They need to fix that before anyone in our group would be able to recommend eating there.

name: Chris
review_text: Amazing food and great service.   A little pricey but you get what you pay for.  One of the top restaurants in Breck.

name: Dotzero
review_text: Autumn is a must visit if you are in Breck. Small plates through dessert are excellent. First visit just ordering small plates and appetizers is a meal.

name: JohnN
review_text:
Cauliflower was amazing as was there pasta of the day.  

Everything we ate was amazing!  Great COVID precautions as well.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aurum Never disappoints. We go there every time we’re in Breckenridge. They’re handling of Covid protocols was flawless. We had a very safe and enjoyable meal. Our server Erik was fantastic.

name: RichardG
review_text: The beef tartare and brussels sprouts were OUT OF THIS WORLD! Delaney was our server and she was so nice and kind and helpful with the menu and suggestions, it really made for a great dining experience. Will 100% be back the next time we are in Breckenridge. Great job to the whole Aurum team.

name: tamsam29
review_text: Great meal.  We got there in time for happy hour and had 1/2 off drinks and apps.  My husband got the salmon, his favorite dish so far on our journey through Colorado.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Such an incredible restaurant! I brought my two daughters for a girls night. They had a fantastic kids menu which made my life so much easier. The regular menu was sophisticated and thoughtful - everything was delicious!! We will be back :)

name: AnthonyL
review_text: Valentine’s Day! Amazing menu, slightly limited but overall amazing. The cookies for dessert are TO DIE FOR

name: MrsMac
review_text: The food was amazing!! The server was knowledgeable and engaging. If I am ever any near Colorado again, I have to eat at Aurum!

name: BPERuns
review_text: We went with a large group for dinner on our annual ski vacay and it was great.  The staff was friendly and accommodating and our meal was good.  Several of us shared the 50 oz tomahawk - great flavor.   Also they are in a good location one block off Main Street.

name: AmyD
review_text: Francesca was amazing! Very down to earth. Lots of great recommendations. Every single item we ordered to eat and drink was fabulous! Will definitely recommend to others.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great dining experience all around.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Older hostess lady was a nightmare to deal with. Everything else was fantastic.

name: AubreyT
review_text: The food was delicious, with a top-notch presentation.  Even the kids meals were executed beautifully.  I was surprised what a great happy hour selection they had for an upscale restaurant.  We will look forward to returning.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The best meal we had in Breckenridge- which was a difficult decision to say because all of our meals were fantastic! We had Michael and he was very attending to us. Thanks For an amazing dining experience. From cocktails to apps to entrees... everything was amazing. I had the scallops special and my boyfriend had the duck confit. We got the crudité and squash burrata for appetizers... wow!

name: SylviaN
review_text: Happy hour- oysters, yellow fin tuna, Caesar salad, Korean bbq chicken, Brussels sprouts- all were exceptional! 2nd year in a row we made sure we made a reservation. Visiting from S Florida on ski vacation. Thanks Aurum!

name: BridgetC
review_text: Amazing time! Grayson and team blew us away! Thanks Aurum - will be back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely phenomenal. One of the most outstanding restaurants in Breckenridge.

name: Neil
review_text: Great meal!

name: Beth
review_text: The trout and lamb shank were excellent. Service was outstanding.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: First time in Breckinridge. It was a beautiful drive in from Evergreen. Ambiance, food and drinks were all so good. The staff were all so pleasant. Hubby enjoyed his lamb & Manhattan. I enjoyed the duck & oysters. Will definitely be returning next time I’m in Colorado.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: So cute and romantic

name: gjkkca61
review_text: Everything was outstanding!  The duck was so delicious.

name: MeredithO
review_text: Such a nice spot for HH or date night. Everything was top notch!

name: polishpatriot
review_text: Amazing meal with top notch service. Well worth a visit.

name: DillonL
review_text:
All the food was excellent. Our waiter, Ed was friendly and attentive. He also handled an annoying “review” from the table next to us exceptionally well. 

The curried cauliflower will blow your mind. Who new it could be so fluffy ans good.

name: RobinM
review_text:
All was great until we received the bill.  A 3% “Back Of House” fee was added. The owner should not pass his labor cost on to the diner as a fee on the bill.  We didn’t encounter this added fee anywhere else in Breckenridge. 
Add it to the price of the meal if you need to pay the kitchen staff more.

name: Eats
review_text:
Our meal was excellent! The Crispy Curried Cauliflower was out-of-this-world! The daily pasta and Burrata/Quinoa salad were also excellent. The trout was just so-so. Our biggest disappointment was the service: our waiter was overly-emotive and inattentive. We understand Covid has changed things up, but when he walked past our table several times without checking in or even making eye contact, we were at a loss. When I eventually received the nice glass of wine I had ordered with dinner (it came half way through, by the way), he never came back to check on us. The wine was 'corked' (I think I've returned wine only twice before). Eventually we caught the attention of another staff member who immediately brought over some options (of course, I chose a different wine). Literally within 2 minutes, our original server came over to remove all alcohol from the table (county restrictions). We asked if he could clear the other tables first and then come on back as I had just gotten this $16 glass of vino. "No" was his response! So, bottoms-up: what a waste! Then he mentioned a "birthday dessert" for our daughter. With hesitancy, we choose the creme brûlée with 3 spoons. Soon the check was presented: wine, dessert all included. What a shame - I will never go back and certainly not recommend Aurum when there are so many other lovely customer-friendly restaurants in Breckenridge. 
PS. In all the Open Table reviews I've made (hundreds), this is probably the 2nd bad review I've ever given. Sorry, but true.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
The food was really nice but the menu was a really odd collection of different cuisines. They also didn’t have the fried chicken which was why we went. To compound matters when we asked about this the waitress told us the fried chicken was only on the menu to attract a lower end clientele in the off-season. 

The food was really nice so we would recommend.

name: Heidi
review_text: Our favorite place in Breckenridge-love happy hour

name: Anastasiya
review_text: Incredible food, whatever you get it will not disappoint. The staff is great! Highly recommend a night out at Aurum.

name: KristenE
review_text: Excellent happy hour, one of our favorite Breck places to dine

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Loved everything about this spot. Portions were great for the price point and all the food was local and delicious. Great balance to cocktails as well! Server was awesome? Wish I could remember her name!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Great service. 
Food was sub par for the price. I expected more

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Holy Moly!!! This restaurant was INCREDIBLE!!! We tired 11 different menu items and each one was insanely delicious! We started out with the Parker House Rolls, BBQ'd Brussels Sprouts, Prime Beef Tartare, Burrata & Stuffed Squash, and their special Pasta of the Day dish. For dinner I had the Rocky Mountain Trout (which was amazing) and my friends tried the Hanger Steak, Prime Tenderloin, and Duck Breast (all gave raving reviews about each). And last but certainly not least we indulged in 2 of the dessert items the Smoked White Chocolate Creme Brûlée and the Warm Milk and Cookies. Wooowwww both were so enjoyable but I think we all agreed our favorite part of the whole meal was the Warm Milk and Cookies! If you are considering Aurum on a night out for dinner I highly recommend and seriously cannot say enough good things about the food and service!

name: SteveS
review_text: My wife and I split the wedge, oysters and duck. Very exceptional. Good cocktails and wine selection. Great service. Normally ambiance would get the highest rating, and this should be a vote against the governor and health departments high handed, hysterical and foolish regulations. We love this place.

name: CrystalP
review_text: We went during happy hour which allowed us to try more food off the menu. Everything was AMAZING!! Service was great and perfectly timed.

name: Tham
review_text: Great HH prices for food and drinks. Curried cauliflower had great flavour and cooked to perfection. Korean fried chicken and brussel sprouts were good too. We were served by Micheal who was very friendly and had great knowledge of the menu and Breckenridge in general. Great experience overall.

name: ScottO
review_text: It was my son Tyler’s birthday. Our server was awesome!

name: Mike
review_text: We’ve been to Aurum many times and always enjoy it!  But this time, the food was over the top great!  We went for happy hour and the drinks were superb and the food was fantastic. From the salads to the burger, all tasted beyond good!  Services was great, as usual!  Highly recommend this place!

name: RobR
review_text: My family and I had New Years Eve prix fixe dinner that was outstanding in every way, from the portion size, the chef’s creative use of delicious ingredients,  wait staff attentiveness, friendliness and the overall vibe.  Wow. This place rivals any big city dining.  I look forward to eating there again on my next visit to Breckenridge.

name: Bravohappy
review_text: Excellent food and service, per usual. Food is inventive and delicious; was served at perfect temperature and great presentation. Staff was friendly and attentive.

name: Sandy
review_text: Aurum is consistently awesome.  My favorite bar items are French 75 and Bees Knees.  I would be happy if I had nothing besides their heavenly Parker House rolls and chocolate chip cookies.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Love this place!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was absolutely fabulous. They work together as a team to ensure everything is amazing & their attention to the details makes it a perfect night out. We will absolutely be back!

name: 1775CC
review_text: Excellent food and service. I order duck infrequently because it is difficult to cook correctly but took a chance here and was not disappointed. The duck breast was tender and juicy. My colleagues raved about their meals, especially the trout with mushroom risotto and lamb shank. We thought this restaurant nailed everything.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Over priced as well.

name: Cladaghrin
review_text: Always enjoy it

name: SuzanneS
review_text: This was possibly the best meal my husband and I have ever eaten and we are foodies. The trout and hangar steak were both delicious.

name: LAMF
review_text: So flavorful & delish!

name: PamM
review_text: Beautiful surroundings with excellent food and wine. The Caesar salad actually has anchovy’s - highly recommend. Entrees were delicious and quite filling. Service was magnificent.

name: Mully
review_text: The service is excellent, the food delicious and memorable.  We always look forward to the very tasty Smoked Orange Old Fashioned cocktails.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food! Will be back :)

name: Claire
review_text: One word... FABULOUS!!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Sydney went out of her way to get us in despite initially
Canceling our reservation due to Covid restrictions out of her control. As soon as they received their 5 star safety rating she called us back and worked with our schedule. We are so lucky to have gotten in...such a thoughtfully curated menu and the ambiance is modern but comfortable. The food was elevated yet approachable. Ed the bartender was our waiter and was a delight. It was a surprise that a restaurant of this quality would have such a great happy hour with discounts on small plates, classic cocktails and half Priced beer. There’s definitely something for every budget. If we had more than 2 people in our group we would have loved to try the Yurt dining as it seemed like a very unique experience. Highly recommend.

name: LaurenB
review_text: We ended up going early for happy hour and expecting to stay for dinner. The happy hour drinks and snacks were FABULOUS, we were thrilled and couldn’t wait for our entrees. The pork entree came out and was almost inedible... we were so disappointed after the amazing starters. Will be going back but staying away from certain entrees.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One word: outstanding!  In every way. Best happy hour in Breck. Ed was great!  Can’t wait to go back

name: KarimM
review_text: The yurt experience was truly fantastic. Beautiful inside, brilliant food, great drinks. Eric was an attentive and thoughtful host, and the entire team knocked it out of the park. Don’t miss out!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Came here on a recommendation from a local and were not disappointed. The cauliflower appetizer was unbelievable. My party got the duck and lamb for our meals and loved it. Incredible, will be my first stop next time I’m back in Breck.

name: Jess
review_text: We love this place! We came here this summer for our anniversary and loved it so much we drove up to Breckenridge for a night just to eat here.  The food is incredible and the people are even nicer!

name: AneF
review_text: Great happy hour with wonderful starters and small plates!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Always great food & great service!

name: LindseyS
review_text: Amazing food and wonderful service! We loved every single thing we ordered especially the Brussels Sprouts!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Love the food and great Happy hour! Burger and Brussels are amazing!

name: NorfolkGirl
review_text: This is a wonderful place to enjoy a beautiful meal that is delicious.

name: KateM
review_text: Aurum is hands down my favorite restaurant in Breck! Best Happy Hour from 4-6, too. :) We always get the french onion burger with lemon parm fries and the Wisail bourbon drink is amazing!!

name: Scuba
review_text: Delicious food with excellent service!

name: AngelaC
review_text: The bacon onion jam burger is a must as I happy hour.

name: Hayley
review_text: Incredibly delicious meal and cocktails in an intimate setting. Loved every bit from start to finish. Would absolutely come back here!

name: goodgreatfun
review_text: Always amazing! Thank you for all this restaurant has to offer.

name: AimeK
review_text: Fantastic food, approachable setting, great service

name: DaveM
review_text: Had an awesome meal at Aurum last Thursday night.  The staff was great, the food was great, the setup felt very safe.  Highly recommended.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It was a great experience of dine in at Aurum. I stayed in Breckenridge for 2 nights with my boy friend and we were looking for a great restaurant for dinner. I’m the one who picked Aurum and really happy that we had a wonderful dinner! Every single food from appetizer until dessert is amazing. Shout out to the server lady and chef, include all of the restaurant’s crew. Such a great job

name: KimberleyL
review_text: Love their happy hour prices.  Service was terrific.  Their brussel sprouts are wonderful.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This goes down as a top 10 meal of all time. As a celiac, there’s (usually) not a lot to choose from. Not here. I was so well taken care of and each dish was truly gourmet dining. Grayson was our server and made the entire night 1000x better. If we didn’t live in Chicago, we would dine here all of the time. My next trip to Breck will put this place at the top of the dining list!  Thank you for such a wonderful evening!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best Happy Hour Ever! I have to say the whole experience was wonderful. We had a reservation for outside but it was cold when we got there and they were very accommodating to find a seat inside. The drinks and food were delicious+good proportions+worth the value. Snacks menus is 50% off. We ordered the burger and Korean fried chicken to split between two people and we felt so satisfied with just those dishes. Our waiter was just as nice and accommodating but also witty. I absolutely recommend and will come again!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great burger!

name: LFAlexander
review_text: This was a super fun find. The menu was great and the place was very modern compared to most other restaurants in town. We will definitely be back - and try the sangria!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful atmosphere presentation was fabulous

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was absolutely amazing! Staff is wonderful. Will definitely be going back.

name: ZacharyR
review_text: My girlfriend received a gift card to Aurum for her birthday. We went for dinner and got an appetizer to start (during happy hour the apps are half off). The curry cauliflower appetizer was amazing (and I'm not huge on cauliflower). For dinner she got poached salmon and I got pork. Both were so tasty. For dessert we go the tiramisu. It was unbelievable. The environment and there service were top notch. We will definitely be returning.

name: SarahW
review_text: We visited Aurum on a Sunday night. It was surprisingly crowded for a Sunday during the off season, so would highly recommend making a reservation. We went for happy hour with the intention of having a few drinks and apps. The happy hour menu is great. Food is delicious and at happy hour prices, very affordable. Our waiter, while I can’t remember his name, was attentive and had a great sense of humor. We’ll be back for sure, most likely for happy hour again or dinner for a special occasion.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing!  We love Aurum!!!

name: avakmccloud
review_text: The service was wonderful and the food was really great! The desserts our table ordered were incredible (chocolate chip cookies and the creme brulee). Would go back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: A group of 4 of us went to the happy hour which the deals offered a great opportunity to try great wines and cocktails at a reasonable price. Their festive cocktail, the wassail, was our favorite. It warmed us up as we sat outside. They also have plenty of heaters which kept us very comfortable. Their staff was very accommodating even though we arrived early for our reservation. The food was fantastic! I had the baratta which had a beautiful combination of flavors. We had only great things to say about our experience! Highly recommend.

name: Kailua333
review_text: This is my second time to Aurum and it’s one of my favorite places to go! The service is always wonderful and the food is always great! It’s hard to find really excellent restaurants in the mountains and this place never disappoints! Really a great find, I drive to Breckenridge just to eat here. Thank you to the whole staff for all that you do!

name: Graham
review_text: The happy hour is a must.

name: JillM
review_text: Came here for my birthday out in the mountains, and the food was incredible. The cocktails were also delicious, and the kitchen made me a hot toddy though it wasn’t technically on the menu. Thanks for making our visit to Breck a trip to remember!

name: DeahnaB
review_text: We absolutely LOVE Aurum. By far, the Best restaurant in Breckenridge and one of our most favorite in Colorado.

name: Benji
review_text: Food was INCREDIBLE and worth every penny. The salads were unique and just perfection. Our only complaint has to do with sitting outside. In COVID times they are at 50% capacity so the only available tables were outside. It was SO windy and quite cold it almost distracted from the incredible food... almost. I’m glad we went but will surely sit inside next time! It looked amazing inside!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We live in Denver and love to spend a day in Breckenridge. We always end it with a bang! Going to Aurum for happy hour. Love the burger and blue cheese wedge salad. It’s a special treat.

name: Carly
review_text: Amazing food and wonderful service, would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice dinner!

name: SharonM
review_text: Food was outstanding (had to order a second flatbread to take home for dessert)! Ed, the server, was excellent & hostess helped navigate our food choices & provided ample heaters so we could enjoy dinner outside. We can’t wait to return.

name: KMartinez
review_text: Fantastic service!!! Great wine recommendations!

name: JBrooks
review_text: What a treat to find this place.  Highly recommend!  One of the best old fashioned cocktails I've had in a long time.  The menu was fantastic.

name: Sid79
review_text: We ate at Aurum twice this past week.  The BBQ Brussel Sprouts were so good, we had to go back.  Service was top shelf on both visits.  We will be back on our next visit to Breckenridge.

name: SteBie
review_text: This is an awesome restaurant! A must try in brecky!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food and wonderful flavors! Loved the Happy Hour specials!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Randomly picked for happy hour and was best meal of the trip!! Service and food were outstanding.

name: Sarahmatocha8715
review_text: Good was terrible. Could not eat it. Server did. It seem to care that our plates were untouched when he came to remove them. My husband has the hanger steak that was doused in some kind of A1 sauce prior to grilling ....so terrible we would not even consider taking it home to our dog.  I had Korean fried chicken ....also terrible.

name: SanMarcolocal
review_text:
Aurum did not disappoint. We were given a socially distanced comfortable table amidst beautiful
Fresh flowers Our server was friendly and attentive, even offering us samples to help us choose wine. She was also very knowledgeable about food subtleties and favors. We shared the Brussels as a starter. A hearty portion, they were flavorful and unique. My friend ordered the trout and she was pleased with its freshness. The accompanying pea risotto was different and exciting. I got butternut squash soup and a salad and they both likewise were fabulous. The soup was fresh and offered three varied styles of apple, but could have been a little thicker and richer. All in all, it was an amazing evening.

name: Fristy
review_text: Brussels sprouts were life changing!! Steak tar tar was not. Overall we loved it for our anniversary dinner- quite the splurge, but the quality of the food was worth it!

name: GB2016
review_text: This was an interesting dinner.  We were able to make a reservation for 8:30, outside dining.  While being out side was great....as we were eating the staff was starting to close down the patio....putting up chairs, turning lights off, moving tables in side.  We ended up feeling pretty much like they were ready for us to leave.  The food was good, but my suggestion is wait till your guests are done dining until closing shop, we felt like they were in a hurry to get the heck out of there.  Not good when you spend the $$ we did and sat on a lovely patio.  The 15 minutes it would have taken after we left would have been well spent.

name: Bees
review_text: Food was so fresh. They were able to highlight every ingredient. Staff was warm and friendly. I would highly recommend.

name: MVP1
review_text: We sat outside on a hightop which was not my personal favorite seating option, but everything else was perfect with food and service.

name: BajaFoodie
review_text: Celebrating our 25 and were delighted to be welcomed with a glass of bubbly which set the tone for the evening🥂. Service was first class, efficient and fun! Food was local, seasonal and very creative. We are both chefs and super picky about all elements of dining out. HIGHLY recommend Aurum above all others.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The best in Breck!

name: Stevedallas
review_text: Wonderful food and attentive service.

name: DonB
review_text: wwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwweeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

name: KyndallJ
review_text: Food was delicious, love the happy hour prices!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This spot was a wonderful treat on our recent Breckenridge holiday. We will definitely return. Lovely patio, friendly staff and outstanding food that was the best these two foodies had during our trip.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Our first visit to Breckenridge and this was the culinary highlight!
The cauliflower and the squash soup were amazing! The trout and pea risotto were delicious. Great wines and cocktails. I especially liked the Pinot Noir. It was chilly and windy. The heaters were great. I hope to be back!

name: Leigh
review_text: The food here is consistently good. I often come for happy hour snacks and wines, but this time also got dinner. I had the trout and it was very good. I also found the hostess and the waitstaff to be very accommodating and helpful. I will definitely be back!

name: shbreck
review_text: From the ease of a reservation including indoor/outdoor preference to arriving to our available table, Aurum Breckenridge takes happy hour to the next level! Great options and setting for outdoor covid friendly dining. The food was absolutely divine and we can’t wait to go again!

name: Vanessa
review_text: AMAZING staff and great food! Outdoor seating was very nice.

name: LaurenL
review_text: Such a sweet waiter, he brought us sparkling wine because it was our anniversary!

name: MatthewR
review_text: Wonderful experience. Would come back every visit to Breck. Our server Michael was fantastic.

name: KATHYA
review_text: We went to Aurum during COVID because we wanted to be safe outside & meet another couple. There were 4 of us seated at a 2 top round table with the other tables less than 6 feet away. We ordered apps and drinks & could not fit the food on the table, bc the plates were large, we had to actually combine appetizers together on one plate to manage the space. Our server was great dealing with the difficult situation. It was all to close together for these times. At least consider putting 4 people at a 4 top & following the 6 feet distancing.

name: Querico
review_text: Our favorite happy hour in Breck.  Try the cauliflower, the Caesar salad And the hamburger.  It’s delicious. Great wines also.

name: PeterB
review_text:
My friend and I were there for happy hour, which was great. 
I do think it’s a shame that you have this incredibly beautiful architectural space and you spoil it with plastic flowers and plants, particularly the ones on the bar and the truly dreadful one by the front door. They are so obviously fake and erode the integrity of the space.

name: TeriLovesToRun
review_text: My daughter and I were really looking forward to our dinner at Aurum.  Our waitress just couldn’t get it together. When I ordered a glass of also ordered an appetizer. 10 minutes later she came back to ask us if we wanted to start with something. So she had forgotten to put it in.
