To make matters worse I also ordered fries as a side to my entrée. They didn’t come, because she didn’t order those either. They didn’t come until at least 15 minutes after we received our entrée. So it was pretty much a bust for us. Also not a great wine list for wines by the glass.

name: leslieb
review_text: Well.  The service was excellent.  The appetizers were excellent.  The main dishes were very disappointing.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food and service were excellent as usual.  This was our first time dining on location (we have done take-out) since the pandemic changed everything.  We ate outside, which was perfect with one exception:  the property next door was the subject of a very loud Bobcat doing some heavy landscaping work, which went on pretty much our whole time, from 4:30 to 6:00 pm.  It made the ambience less than we have come to  expect, but it may have been a one-time thing.  Usually, Aurum gets five stars for everything from us, and we plan to return again soon.

name: Spotdog
review_text: The duck is to die for.  Everything was excellent.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic anniversary dinner here! Aurum is an excellent place to enjoy a meal at Breckenridge. We had a fantastic assortment of food and could not have been happier.

name: DavidB
review_text: Went for happy hour. Service was great and the happy hour prices were great

name: BreckMomma
review_text:
Aurum offers a beautiful dining experience for date night, families or friends. We easily made a reservation for outdoor seating a few days in advance. The restaurant is on Ridge St, so off Main, and more secluded than most others. Parking is easy, right out front.
The staff was very friendly and the food was fantastic. Chef Brian surprised us with several courses of his choosing, taking us on a journey of culinary delight in celebration of our anniversary. It was fun and delicious! We highly recommend Aurum for dinner out in Breck!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Mike was a fantastic server.

name: JohnD
review_text:
As a Summit County local, I appreciate the consistency in quality of food and service that I get at Aurum. It's a quality that's generally lacking in other area restaurants. 
One thing that would be great is if they switched up the menu a bit more from time to time. That would have me coming back more often.

name: Samy
review_text: Very nice food. Loved the cauliflower and corn ribs! Service at reception wasn’t great but the food and service at the table were awesome.

name: AshL
review_text: The food and drinks were amazing here. We did the appetizers and small plates to have quite a few options. The Butternut squash soup, burrata, the ravioli, the peach cheesecake and chocolate brûlée were fantastic. Our server was extremely attentive. It was such a great experience and highly recommend this restaurant.

name: BryanG
review_text: Quaint, clean, casual, fresh and just overall delicious.

name: Reth
review_text: Outdoor dining felt clean and safe. Cocktails are exceptional, especially the creativity of the bar staff when asked to go off menu. Food was the star, from corn 'ribs' to house-made pasta of the day. We went back two days later.

name: ChrisM
review_text: We always appreciate the consistency of the excellent food quality and the friendliness of the staff

name: LyndaA
review_text: Wonderful food & great service. Will certainly go again when in town.

name: Mike
review_text: We always love this place and  once again it didn’t disappoint!   Best happy hour in town!  Generous portions and great service!

name: LisaM
review_text: We love Aurum and always visit when in Breckenridge!  Great food selection and wine list and fabulous Happy Hour!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: FANTASTIC happy hour & environment. Restaurant is one of the best in Breckenridge and a must-visit. We are so excited to go back again sometime soon.

name: Martin
review_text: Another great meal and wonderful service. One of the very best in the Colorado mountains?

name: ChrisH
review_text: Everything was fabulous.

name: CindyL
review_text: Dinner was excellent as always!

name: JoyceS
review_text: Went for an early happy hour dinner with our 3 kids.  Dining room was appropriately spaced out, and we did not feel crowded at all.  Fast and friendly service, but a couple small mix-ups with dishes, which they happily fixed. Ordering mostly from the happy hour menu made the prices reasonable for our family of 5.  Our favorites were the curried cauliflower (this was amazing!!), Korean fried chicken, and elote corn ribs.  Beef tartare was very good; felt like we could have skipped the hamachi crudo (it was tasty but have had better at Japanese restaurants). Cocktails were tasty. Even kids' meals were substantial and yummy, too (one got cheeseburger, which was very large for a kid, and the other got seared trout which was cooked nicely).  We will definitely return!

name: katherines
review_text: The food atmosphere and service was amazing!! We sat outside on a colder night and it was still enjoyable with the heaters. Ordered a pasta special, wedge salad and the hanger steak.  The wine was also amazing. Great staff who was very helpful in our dinner decision. Can't wait to go back.

name: Donna
review_text:
Our waiter was very attentive and helpful, super friendly too.  We had the curried Cauliflower- amazing.  Elote "ribs"  I could eat that all day long   what a fab and new way to eat corn.  The burger was fantastic as was al of our drinks   Very reasonable prices for a fab dinner.

We will be back

name: MiamiAl
review_text: We never miss Aurum at least once when we visit Breck.  Service is always attentive.  Food is always fun.

name: Kate
review_text: Delicious food. Great Service. Sat outside and it was lovely. They have heaters for the night time chill.

name: AdrienneM
review_text: Had a wonderful meal.

name: NaplesFoodie
review_text: We were visiting Breckenridge and this restaurant was either #1 or #2 on most review sites.  We sat inside because it was a bit chilly and we loved the chic ambience...especially the beautiful bar area.  Our appetizers (Hamachi Crudo and Prime Tartar) were 5 star as were our cocktails.  My husband’s filet was a 5-star perfectly cooked meal, but my entree (the curry Halibut) must have sat under the light because it was overcooked and dry...and too heavy on the fish sauce...so disappointing after the strong start.  I ordered curried cauliflower with my meal but it got missed.  Our waiter still brought it with a big apology and comped it because we were mostly done.  Service started out strong and then weakened greatly after the appetizer.  A lot of time passed between apps and dinner.  Not sure what happened because all started so good.  We left satisfied and would definitely come back for happy hour and dinner again.

name: CathyK
review_text:
The staff was very knowledgeable, friendly and professional.
The food was fantastic and beautifully presented.

name: Molmam
review_text: The fish was dry, but the dishes were tasty. We really loved the cauliflower!

name: ZagNut
review_text: Decent, but nothing special. Not likely to return.

name: DavidP
review_text: Good but pricey for Breckenridge.

name: Jcrawford
review_text: Great atmosphere, delicious food, creative cocktails, and awesome service. Will definitely be back!!

name: PDST
review_text:
Overall good experience. Prices have gone up post-covid, but still a good happy-hour.

Construction next door made it *LOUD* - but not their fault really. Had some saw-dust hit our table as well - but what can they do about the construction next door? Overall a good experience.

name: JosephH
review_text: This is an awesome restaurant. Great food and world class service at reasonable prices.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: First time at Aurum and it did not disappoint.  We had a party of 7 and had to change our reservations a few times and the hostess was more than accommodating.  Our sever, Jake, was amazing!  Sincere, knowledgeable and was attentive to our group and the timing of our meals.  Looking forward to our next visit back to Aurum.

name: nhampton6
review_text: We absolutely loved our food but I’m not sure why this is listed as $30 and under.  Should be at least $$$ which is $30-$50.  With that being said... my husband and I ordered two starters and two shareables which was plenty of food!! Everything was delicious.  He loved the beef tartare and we also loved the curry cauliflower.  We also had dessert, chocolate lavender creme brûlée!! So amazing!! Highly recommend!!!

name: Kadi
review_text: Always good. Interesting menu and great service

name: HollyB
review_text: Delicious food and great service! We were there for a bachelorette party and they made everything so special!

name: Jennic
review_text: Food was good but expensive.

name: AnneB
review_text: Really enjoyed the food and the service! Especially the curried cauliflower appetizer and the sausage entree. The cocktails were only okay- wine was better. The restaurant was so quiet we felt a little weird talking as a group and the indoor ambiance wasn’t quite as pretty as the patio. Would absolutely come back and recommend!

name: ElizaW
review_text: Awesome birthday dinner for my 24 year old son. Restaurant more than accommodating with weather disruption (we had to move inside mid-meal). Food absolutely delicious!  Service good. !

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Anniversary 🤗

name: FrankB
review_text: This rates right up there as the best restaurant I’ve ever had the pleasure of enjoying.  I love food and this place melds the flavors.  They don’t just serve food.  Great experience!!  You are missing out if you don’t try this one.

name: BeBe
review_text: Best restaurant in Breckenridge.  Love the food and the wine list.  Sidney was so helpful. A must go to while visiting.

name: TeeGee
review_text: We love Aurum, please stay consistent in this crazy world!

name: kathleenw
review_text: Incredible food!

name: Amber
review_text: Such a fantastic meal! Amazing service and every dish was outstanding.

name: MISTYC
review_text: Delicious!! Can’t wait to go back!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Service and food was outstanding!

name: ChuckS
review_text: Always a favorite. True hospitality. Incredible food. The bartender has found new ways to make drinks that are not fussy and over-engineered. The patio is so perfect.

name: ShannonN
review_text: Everything was amazing! Our drinks and apps arrived so quickly. Kids food was out immediately. Seating for 5 at high table next to bar. Food, Environment & service was fabulous. The cookies, milk, icing and whipped cream dessert as well as the chocolate creme brûlée and Palisade peach dessert were all outstanding. Alison was the BEST server. Will return over and over again.

name: Cathy
review_text: We had a wonderful meal with great service.

name: AndyH
review_text: Great restaurant for Breckenridge! Eclectic menu with dishes from around the world, all of them fantastic. A must try!

name: UWSer
review_text: My $50 pork chop was overbrined to the point of being inedible.  Will not return. I noticed a lot of people who were happy with the place were there for happy hour and the much lower prices.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Ambiance is definitely lacking but food was very good

name: CarolineW
review_text: Great atmosphere and service! Food is wonderful and drinks are even better. Super modern decor and the staff is extremely friendly.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Good was wonderful.. server was great .. definitely recommend

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great restaurant! Highly recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great night out with my beautiful wife. The staff was amazing!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was delicious, but I was disappointed in the service. We had 3 children with us and the adult entrees came out 10 min before the kids’ entrees. I would rather have all the food be delayed and come out all together or have the kids’ entrees our before the adults’.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The califlower app was amazing as always! Loved the drinks and the food! Will go back!

name: Nyari
review_text: Fantastic food and fabulous service. 10/10 would recommend

name: LinkN
review_text: 8/2020 My husband and I had dinner here and found everything to be excellent.  The food was outstanding.

name: MatthewW
review_text: Excellent meal! One of my new favorites in Summit County.

name: ScottU
review_text: Outstanding food and service. When we were seated there was construction going on next door, not the restaurants fault, and they were gone by 5. Price is just a tad high, but really, the food was first class!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aurum is one of our favorite restaurants in Breck that we absolutely must dine at every time we visit. It never disappoints!

name: Jill
review_text: Great service, delicious happy hour food.

name: MaryA
review_text: Rolls&butter were outstanding. We shared several different appetizers/shared dishes rather than big entrees.

name: SharonS
review_text: Best Happy Hour in Town- Excellent food and service-

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great experience. Wonderful service and a great happy hour. 2nd visit and will be back again soon!

name: Patschi
review_text: Aurum has a great Happy Hour from 4-6 pm.

name: AnnB
review_text: Aurum never disappoints! We were a little nervous about dining inside a restaurant for the first time since the pandemic hit. However, Aurum handled everything perfectly! Tables were well spaced, staff was attentive and very cautious. As always, our food was excellent and the service was impeccable. Highly recommend the trout and my son loved the hanger steak. We’ll be back the next time we are in Breck!

name: Afif
review_text: Fabulous food, ambience and service - our absolute favorite dining place in Breck!

name: MaxS
review_text: It was a delightful dining experience. The food was top-notch. So were the cocktails and service. At no point did I feel uncomfortable or unsafe while dining-in during these unprecedented times. Thanks for the memorable Saturday night.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Anniversary

name: exmodelinDallas
review_text: It was my first time to try this restaurant and I think its become my husband and my new fave!  Food was great!  No complaints !

name: Dfsmon
review_text: First food was great! Second, hospitality was super as we arrived early due to shortened church service. Finally, Covid measures were the best in Breck. A great time .

name: junes
review_text: This was our second time dining in 1 week. Had a great first experience.  Waited 30 min for bar drinks, had to ask for water multiple times.  Back room was loud this time around as well.

name: Steeple
review_text: Was expecting more. The food was good, but nothing special. Our waiter was great but we kept being annoyed by these other people constantly checking in on us. If you told them that anything was something other than excellent, they just nodded and walked away. Strange. Seems like the place for the local cool people to come hang up. Not that impressed.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Incredible food and incredible service. We have never had a bad experience here. Every time we go, we feel it’s better than the last

name: MerindaH
review_text: Greyson was our waiter and he was fabulous. The food exceeded our expectations!  We will definitely return.

name: Jeff
review_text: Great food and ambiance!  Very attentive staff!

name: HollyG
review_text: Good menu and fabulous service. Sadly, the rib eye we got was just incredibly fatty (more than a typical rib eye). I do not recommend it. The salads, veg, and after dinner drinks were lovely.

name: MarlaR
review_text: From arrival to ending our evening, it was a very nice experience. We celebrated our anniversary with complimentary sparkling wine, great meal suggestions from our server, and a take home box since the portions were plentiful. We certainly will return the next time we are in town.

name: MikeW
review_text: Always great!  Trout and halibut were delicious.

name: Allisonh
review_text: Great food, fast service, delicious food! Highly recommend!

name: fyskigod
review_text: Ever skeptical of great reviews, I must say that the restaurant deserves all the accolades it receives. Not inexpensive but well worth the cost. From outstanding ingredients, excellent service and a great wine list this is now my number one restaurant in Breck. It is comparable to fine restaurants on the East Coast without the pretentiousness of many East Coast restaurants. While this first experience was at Happy Hour, now contemplating when we will return for dinner. And one caveat do make reservations.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food and wine awesome. Loved the Mountain View from the Windows during sunset.

name: DebbieQ
review_text: Our tradition is to enjoy a special meal out on our last night of vacation and try a different Breckenridge restaurant. Lovely space, great wine and food. Thank you for a great experience.

name: NotaBigComplainer
review_text: Overly generous portions. We loved the interior design.

name: LisaO
review_text: We originally reserved a patio spot, but when the weather was warmer than expected the staff worked to find us an inside spot with a nice view. Appetizers were large in size and a great deal during happy hour. Everything we tried was amazing: wedge salad, elote corn “ribs”, lemon Parmesan fries (!!!), and the prime ribeye was perfectly cooked. Service was quick and super friendly. This dinner was the perfect wrap up to an incredible week in Breckenridge.

name: Cynthia
review_text: Had a wonderful special occasion here.  The 6 of us are almost everything on the menu.  The small plates and shared plates were all creative and delicious.  The mains were all thoughtful and cooked well.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and even better cocktails! Happy hour is a must

name: CarrieB
review_text: Sat outside...it was lovely...our server was delightful...the food was yummy...couldn’t ask for more!!! So glad Aurum came to Breck!!

name: ChrisM
review_text: We had a wonderful experience with excellent service and delicious food.  Our server, Grayson, was great and provided for a great experience.

name: Paul
review_text: Good but over priced. For a nice, but not spectacular, dinner for 2 we spent $190 before tip. I love it for Happy Hour and the appetizers, but will pass on dinner going forward.

name: downtown1
review_text: The most incredible happy hour in Breck! The food was wonderful and you can't beat 1/2 price apps and discounted wine and drinks!

name: SSED
review_text: Tasty and creative dishes. We tried the Buratta starter then the Duck and the Elk special ($65). Not really an ambience for kids but ours were with us and well behaved, and they were treated perfectly. I was impressed. They had a small kids menu which made us all feel welcome and the kids' food was great too. Service was excellent. I missed a little music. My wife and I would probably enjoy it more as date night. We would return and recommend it highly. Just don't dwell on the prices and enjoy.

name: Mica
review_text: Staff is very welcoming and are happy people.  Aurum offers a wide selection of crafted spirits and delicious food pairings.  We will return & enjoy the outdoor dining throughout the summer!

name: matthewv
review_text: We love this place food is great and staff is attentive but not intrusive.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fathers Day

name: shawns
review_text: The duck confit was cooked to perfection!  Outstanding flavor and presentation.  And to top it off our waiter was a joy ( even with the mask). We will definitely be going back

name: JohnW
review_text: Our first time at Aurum, and it was awesome.  Food, service, and experience made it a perfect ending to our vaca!  We couldn’t decide if the drinks,  cauliflower, or burger was our favorite.  We will definitely be back!!

name: AshleyF
review_text: Love it as always!! See ya next month!

name: BobB
review_text: The food was awesome! The cauliflower appetizer was the bomb. We loved everything and the wines were delicious. We will be back soon.  Bob & Debbie

name: Bevos3
review_text: Grayson, our server, was very helpful and personable. Ask about his new son, Waylon. Food was very tasty.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Love this spot! So happy it is back open. They’re really considerate to children, too.

name: Carolyn
review_text: Love this restaurant! The service is impeccable and the food is delicious! Their burgers and lemon Parmesan fries are half price during happy hour but I also love their trout dinner! Wonderful atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Awesome food and drinks. Great customer service!!

name: renee
review_text: Awesome food and service. Everyone was very welcoming.  The foood and wine choices are excellent and everything we had was delicious. We love this restaurant.

name: amyf
review_text: Went there twice so far this week! Great service, great food, and awesome drinks!

name: amyf
review_text: Service is outstanding! Restaurant was able to provide a seamless experience given the new normal of social distancing! Phenomenal drinks and menu. I am definitely coming back again....

name: MarioMendias
review_text: The staff there is amazing. Alexa keeps everyone in order, Tavish makes great cocktails, and Amy was wonderful. The food is ridiculously good and priced fairly. I’d say it’s the equivalent of eating in Aspen without breaking your wallet or dealing with people who would drown if it rained. 🤷🏽‍♂️

name: CharlesS
review_text: One of the best in Breckenridge.  The food is amazing and the people who work there are great!  A very creative menu, high quality food and great atmosphere.

name: AlanT
review_text: We visited Aurum for happy hour and the food selection and quality was excellent. Thanks for the great service.

name: dwsColorado
review_text: Great foodie experience in Breckenridge. Menu is quirky and interesting. Happy Hour is always a good value and time.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Place rocks.  We actually saw a fox outside which added a cool element.  But this is one of the best places in Breck!

name: kgh23
review_text: Always a great experience here, all the way from the food and drink to the service. Every time we come to Breck, this is a must-stop place. Glad to have it back!

name: MalloryK
review_text: We are SO excited Aurum is back open. Aurum is our favorite happy hour spot in Breck... the experience was perfect. We felt safe and clean the entire time. 10/10 recommend Aurum, BEST happy hour in Breck- Dinner is amazing too!! We look forward to going back every weekend as we used too :)

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Another opening day! Dinner was great, and we felt completely safe in this Coved-19 time.

name: MountainGrl
review_text: Our server was absolutely amazing, the food and drinks were awesome and it was an incredible evening!

name: RachelD
review_text: Great experience and great server. The food was so good except the Hamachi was fishy. Other than that it was a great experience. Will visit again.

name: AnnB
review_text: Aurum Food and Wine never disappoints! It’s a must every time we are in Breck. Great food, excellent service and a stylish atmosphere. The trout is my favorite and the edible cookie dough dessert is a must! We will be back!

name: dwsColorado
review_text: Excellent choice for a foodie taste experience.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and wines.  This is one of our favorites in Breckenridge!  The food is fresh, elegant and unique.  Happy hour is great value with 50% off the starters and select cocktails/wines/beers.

name: StanLap
review_text:
Ambitious preparation. 

Had duck. The duck skin was not crispy and the fat underneath was not rendered out. I don't know if the chef had this in mind or it was a failure of execution. Quite unappealing. 

Otherwise, all good: Service, wine choices, appetizers. 

We'll give them another chance.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Waiter made the night. Played along with jokes and was very informed about the menu. Burger was really good as well. If you go, definitely get the Parker House Rolls. Totally worth it.

name: Sharon
review_text: Love this restaurant. Our server, Aaron, was amazing!

name: luv2dine
review_text: Good variety of small plate and main selections and the most imaginative wine list in Breckenridge.  The only downside is that, like most restaurants in Breck, it is too loud for casual conversation.  Hint to restauranteurs in Breck - volume does not always equal 'energy'.

name: JudithS
review_text: My husband and I dined at Aurum in 2019 for the first time and very much enjoyed our meal. This year we returned with friends. We were disappointed in the menu options and prices, in comparison with other restaurants in Breck. Our dinners were mediocre despite the higher prices. It was our only disappointing meal of the week, and our most expensive.

name: Jean
review_text: Terrific food and service and the desserts were amazing.  The noise level was a little high but we had a lovely time and really enjoyed the food and the drinks.  Will return!

name: MikeR
review_text: Out for birthdays (x2) and had such a great night.  To begin with, Michael was our server and as always he was excellent (knowledgeable, personable, and humorous).  He makes everyone feel like they are the most important client in the room.  Throughout the meal, cocktails were perfectly concocted.  Most importantly the food was out of this world.  Everybody ordered the Hangar steak which is well proportioned, melt in your mouth goodness.   Thanks Aurum for a great birthday experience.

name: ChuckS
review_text: This is by far one of our favorite restaurants in the country. Country, not county. This place is incredible. The lamb....

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Sydney helped me coordinate a surprise cake presentation for my husband's 40th birthday. She was super responsive and friendly and everything went perfectly. Food was great and the sommelier helped us choose that worked for all of our palates. It was awesome!

name: MikeyD
review_text: The trio of salmon starter was worth the visit alone. Very delicious.

name: TheRealDavidJ
review_text: Great menu.  Kudos to Amy for the excellent service and being very knowledgeable about specific ingredients.

name: SylviaN
review_text: My son and I went at 515 for happy hour after a long day of skiing, our last day in Breck. Appetizers were 50% off and we tried the brussel sprouts, cauliflower, Parker rolls, steak tartare, Caesar salad and the Korean chicken. Every app was delicious! Finished it off with the ice cream sandwich. We enjoyed tasting lots of small dishes so this worked out fantastic for us. Ambiance in the bar area was upbeat, lots of friends enjoying each other- nice vibe.

name: FCW555
review_text: Nice staff. Good food Well appointed dining room & bar area. Probably one of the finer dining establishments in Breckenridge.

name: GregS
review_text: Food very good but over priced.  Chocolate creme brûlée was excellent!

name: JenniferK
review_text: Amazing experience from start to finish. Place was hopping, deliciously tasty and extremely enjoyable.

name: KarynM
review_text: Ambience and service was very good. Specialty cocktails were weak and honestly just okay. Food portion size was on the smaller side. Shared a few appetizers-all were unremarkable. Three entrees were meat and one fish. My duck was skimpy-a leg portion, not a breast. Skin was not crispy and duck was a bit chewy. The others in my group said their meals were okay only which was a disappointment. I thought it odd that the busboy did not ask how our food was when 2 plates went back half eaten-he never even asked if we wanted to take the food home.

name: MichaelW
review_text: Another wonderful evening of great food and great service from Alexa, Sydney & Tavish.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
We have eaten there a couple of times before and always been impressed. This time the kitchen either lost or messed up our order and we didn’t get our food until being seated for over an hour.   When our meals did arrive, my wife’s steak (the order that was reportedly the issue) was under cooked and the elk I ordered was overcooked.  We didn’t even consider sending either back since we were starving at that point.  

Our server and the manager both apologized and didn’t charge us for my wife’s steak or 2 glasses of wine, so we were satisfied with their response.  However, it was a disappointing experience overall especially compared to our dinner the previous evening at Hearthstone.

name: ElaineM
review_text: Happy hour was fabulous. Great deals! Everything was delicious!

name: foodie172
review_text: Having vacationed in Breck for more than 20 years we were excited to try out Aurum given its very positive reviews.  In short, we were disappointed.  Let’s begin with the positives.  The restaurant creates a nice vibe with contemporary décor that works well with mountain décor.  The menu has many interesting options. The Parker Rolls with house-made honey butter were a great start to the meal. The cauliflower appetizer was amazing, and the Korean chicken was very nicely spiced.  The Hamachi crudo was also excellent.  Service was spotty - our entrees arrived while we were still eating our entrées despite the fact that we explicitly asked our waitress to appropriately space the courses. Plates were cleared even though 3 members of our party were still eating, an appetizer was totally overlooked, and the server only had basic knowledge of the wine list, which was oddly concocted and overpriced. The best description of the entrees is that the chef is trying too hard to make disparate elements work together and it falls short.  The lamb shank, though beautifully presented and cooked, was bland and badly in need of salt.  The river trout was dry while the accompanying squash hush puppies were quite good. The squid ink risotto was bland with an odd texture.  The duck breast was overcooked and dry despite requesting it medium rare.  We ordered an Amaro after dinner drink and received bourbon.  Although the bartender apologized for the error there was no effort on the part of the restaurant to address this and the other errors that should not have occurred with a restaurant of Aurum’s caliber.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent dining experience. Our waitress was very accommodating and informative when reviewing the menu options. The hot toddy like cocktail for 2 was very delightful and warmed us on a cold frigid evening. The recommended pasta appetizer was great. The trout and pork chop entre were both fabulous

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Yet another fantastic meal. Creative and flavorful dining options, amazing cocktails and great service.

name: AlexB
review_text: Food and service was wonderful.  It was a little noisy but I enjoyed the vibe!

name: LESLIE
review_text: Great happy hour and excellent food.  We have been to Aurum twice this season and the service is always impeccable.  We will definitely be back.

name: Xxxxxx
review_text: We had the best experience here. The food was top notch, we made reservations 2 nights in a row. Only complaint is that we couldn’t order everything on the menu! Thanks for a memorable experience!

name: maryt
review_text: Fanatastic food and awesome waiter

name: Rebecca
review_text: This is exactly what Breckenridge needs. It has a great atmosphere and fantastic food and cocktails. Very hip and finally a place we are excited to go to because of the fun vibe.

name: WorkoutEatRepeat
review_text: Wonderful experience! Wide variety of cocktails, beautiful bar area, fabulous food, and great service!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was unbelievably good, staff where attentive and always had a smile on their face. Great place to eat.

name: KeithB
review_text: We are 20 year residents of Breckenridge, and in our opinion Aurum is the best restaurant to come to Breck since we’ve been there. Excellent food and ambiance, and happy hour is a great value!

name: Jenn
review_text: This was our second visit.  The food was still good and the service was great. Make sure to specify if you have a special occasion to get a more private table.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We sat near the entry and the noise level was fine.  The rear room was very full and therefore more noisy.  The food was very good and the service was prompt until the end of the meal when we had to find him for the dessert menu.  the menu is a bit unuaual but the trout and the burger were 2 good dishes.

name: mlm0617
review_text: Our server was great!  The food was good, but nothing amazing enough to would warrant 5 stars.  We had the Korean Chicken, Scallops, Trout and Carrot Cake.  We both agreed that the dessert was the best part of the meal.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour and food is consistent and delicious!

name: MikeP
review_text: Aurum is Latin for gold and you'd expect that for the high prices they charge they would provide a gold-standard experience. Sadly, that's definitely not the case. The food is just ok, not particularly remarkably prepared and the portions are definitely on the small side. While the interior design is quite nice, the restaurant gets quite loud and the ambience is anything but high-end. Breck has plenty of other good restaurants to check out...

name: LizJ
review_text: Wonderful experience for a party of 10! Everything dish was wonderful and staff was very accommodating.

name: frequentconsumer
review_text: Nice atmosphere, ambiance, great food, all a great experience.

name: KevinN
review_text: Outstanding!

name: JoeT
review_text: This restaurant was recommended by several locals, and did not disappoint.  The food was outstanding and the service was excellent at the table from our waitress, Allison.  After dinner we went to the bar to hang out, and the bartender, Brennan, was awesome too.  Truly and amazing experience all around, and we will definitely go back when in Breck again.  TRY THE SCALLOPS!

name: CareyP
review_text: It was a wonderful dining experience.  High end food, friendly, knowledgeable service and  great design.  Definitely go!!

name: HollyG
review_text: We had many adventures that evening with ski rental / should have been easy, were sent to multiple places  -  making us 46 minutes late on a busy evening.  The hostess was charming , found is a great table for 2 on a busy night.  Dinner was deliciousl

name: JuliaM
review_text: Food was AMAZING! Great wine selection and a fantastic atmosphere! Please go here!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful foot and great service. A little pricey but worth it in the end.

name: GaryH
review_text: Thouroughly enjoyable

name: AmherstDiningClub
review_text: This was our favorite dining experience in Breckenridge, by far. We loved the ambiance, the decor and the food was outstanding!

name: MjSte
review_text: The space is very small and uncomfortably warm. The food was nicely presented and good. It was loud but probably due to the size of the space.

name: nancym
review_text: Great restaurant. Casual but refined. Great ambience. Service was fantastic. I highly recommend.

name: Hacksaw
review_text: Caesar salad needs fresher lettuce.

name: PBJ1
review_text: Nice place for a dinner.  The food was mostly outstanding, but there were a couple of misses.  The trout was overcooked and very dry.  The pasta special was a very small serving.  Service was stellar.  Loved the energy in the bar area.  We had dinner in the back dining room, which was a better space for table conversation.

name: MichaelW
review_text: Another wonderful evening at Aurum, great food and excellent service by Tavish and Alexa & Sydney always make us feel special!

name: DavidW
review_text: Very disappointed in our whole experience particularly after reading other reviews.  Perhaps our expectations were too high.  Food and service were highly average.

name: JerryN
review_text: Wonderful, delicious restaurant!  Great service. Nice owner. Enough said!

name: Marcellam
review_text: Amazing . Creative dishes - great service . Casual but upscale feel

name: MarianaS
review_text: They knew i

name: Carol
review_text: Wonderful culinary selections to suit every palate.  Friendly and courteous staff!  One of my favorite restaurants.  Highly recommend!

name: AndyN
review_text: This restaurant is one street off the main path through downtown Breckenridge, but it's well worth it! The food was fantastic, reasonable sized portions, and just overall an excellent dining experience. I had the hangar steak (based on recommendations) and my wife had the pasta special; both dishes did not disappoint.

name: keithS2013
review_text: After a day of skiing in Breckenridge we needed a nice place for dinner. Aurum was the perfect spot!  Great food and drinks, and their Old Fashion is one of the best I’ve had.

name: Ccgirl
review_text: We had an amazing experience at Aurum! We arrived ten minutes early and they still seated us, even though it was quite busy! Our server, Amy, was a true rockstar! She was knowledgeable about the menu and very good with pairing cocktails/wine to the meal and what we liked.  Each dish was exquisite with taste and brought out so many flavors that made the perfect medley! We will definitely return if we go to Breckenridge again!

name: goblue0498
review_text: Wagyu ribeye was amazing!   Great happy hour specials & service!

name: MichaelL
review_text: A group of my friend’s and I were going to Breckenridge on a ski trip and after reading the positive reviews on Aurum I booked a reservation. We were definitely not disappointed. Every dish we ordered was excellent and beyond expectations. Very unique wine menu and quite possibly the greatest chocolate chip cookies I’ve ever had in my life. I’d highly recommend dining here; and getting a reservation in advance.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Both our meals were an A+. I had the duck and my husband had the Nast York Strip. Couldn’t ask for a better meal. A little pricy, but it was our one expensive meal this trip.

name: BigAl60
review_text: At our check in for our time share in Breck our concierge recommended some new restaurants including Aurum. We are so pleased that we went. A very creative menu with interesting and unique offerings. Our selections Root Vegetable Salad, Korean Fried Chicken, and Pappardelle special are all superb. We selected two excellent wines by the glass and finished with a wonderful dessert (Blood Orange Semifreddo). We hope to return before we finish our visit and Aurum will be on our list for future visits.

name: RKG1
review_text: Great food, great service. We were seated promptly at arrival.

name: Carolyn
review_text: Aurum’s Happy Hour is a great value. The burger and lemon Parmesan fries are fantastic! I got enough delicious brussel sprouts for 3 more lunches!

name: Maril
review_text: The food was good, not great. For fine dining prices I expected more.

name: Mike
review_text: As usual, Aurum never disappoints!  We had delicious dishes off the happy hour menu and some great cocktails.  I highly recommend Aurum!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It was our wedding anniversary and first time in Colorado! They were very welcoming and allowed us to just take our time and enjoy each other and our dinner during our special night. They even gave us a glass of prosecco on the house to help celebrate! Friendly and very attentive staff. Food was amazing! Loved the parker house rolls, and cauliflower curry for appetizers. My husband had the lamb and i had the sea scallops and they were heavenly! We would definitely come back if we get a chance to visit Breckenridge again!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Always my favorite for happy hour!

name: JohannaF
review_text: We had a wonderful dining experience. Our server Richard, was charming and real and knowledgeable. He seems to be truly invested in our having a good dining experience. All the food was great, as usual, but the lobster risotto was out of this world!

name: macsmak
review_text: We can't say enough wonderful things about Aurum Breckenridge. We will keep coming back again and again for the fantastic food, drinks, and staff.

name: Customer
review_text: Amazing food, wine and service, at Aurum, for our family dining on our ski trip!  We will return!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: So nice. Steak was ok

name: viajero
review_text: This place has consistently been one of our favorites in Breckenridge over the past two years. On this recent dining occasion in January 2020, the hostess sat us ahead of our scheduled reservation time. All dishes came out from the kitchen promptly. Every dish we ordered was super delicious.  The service was top notch (much better than the other 6 nights we ate out in Breck area).  I would highly recommend Aurum.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The fried chicken appetizer and brussel sprouts are insanely good! Beautiful interiors and delicious cocktails. Only reason this didn’t get 5 stars is because one of the servers made some snarky comment about putting our phone away after we instagram. We were actually in the middle of researching altitude sickness for my poor husband. Would have been happy to put away our phones but could have done without his snap judgement.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food was fantastic!

name: Dfsmon
review_text: Great as always -lobster risotto was a surprise excellent

name: MomOnTheGo
review_text: Delicious food but pricy.  The presentation and quality of the food was excellent.  Entrees averaged in mid 30s with steaks from 30 to mid 50s.  Cocktails were unique and tasty.  We were a party of 6 and gratuity was added so look out for that.  Overall, I would definitely recommend Aurum as long as you don't mind paying for excellent food.

name: Khonor
review_text: Delicious, interesting food. Service was great too!

name: eliet
review_text: Our waiter Robert was simply aweful. He is the sommelier and a waiter. The manager Sydney was nice and professional.

name: NinaT
review_text: Nice atmosphere, great service and delicious food. Pasta special was yummy.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Phenomenal meal, cocktails and service! We were delighted!

name: DebbieM
review_text: Family Christmas Eve dinner

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: First time here and it was a first class experience. Service was outstanding, very knowledgeable staff and well coordinated effort by all. Quality of food was excellent as well. This place is a bit pricey but nice for a special occasion. We’d definitely return next time we’re in Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was not good, we had to take back one plate. Nothing was outstanding

name: JenniferS
review_text: It’s quite interesting new restaurant that we decided to try. Everything we ordered was tasty. The server was friendly and attentive.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was great.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Special occasions only to justify cost imho

name: macsmak
review_text: We were ‘wowed’ by our food and service! Aurum continues to impress and the new menu items are deliciously memorable. We are enormous fans and will be back very soon!

name: BrettG
review_text: Love the happy hour. Great deal and food is always fabulous. Hard to beat the burger and we love the beverage selections.

name: WendyP
review_text: wow - I am beyond impressed - go for happy hour from 4-6pm and get the half price 'snacks' - which are HUGE by the way - the food is incredible!!

name: tjwhenley
review_text: We love this place.  This time my steak was under cooked however, they did an excellent job of handling the issue.  I have no issue with a problem when the response is on par to the restaurant expectations.  They responded quickly, professionally and confirmed our love for this place.  Will eat there again soon.

name: KidC
review_text: Great place for a date night.  Stopped in for apps and drinks before some live music.  Great atmosphere and service.  The cauliflower app is unbelievable.  Highly recommend Aurum.

name: ktlh2
review_text: Try to make it to Aurum whenever we are in Breckenridge. Love taking friends and family here when in town.

name: DrewB
review_text: My fiancé and I went in to celebrate our engagement and we were beyond impressed. We both got the different specials they had and seriously was the best meal we have ever had! The atmosphere was elegant but still so relaxed. Jade was an amazing server as well, leading us in the right direction food and drink wise. Over all the experience was so beyond special. Thank you all so much for an incredible night. We hope to be back soon and hopefully see that amazing pork special on your already phenomenal menu.

name: KimP
review_text: Great food!  This was our second time and we’ll be coming again for sure!

name: macsmak
review_text: Our favorite food in Breckenridge! I have never had a better hangar steak in my life, so tender and delicious.

name: saltiam
review_text: For a $200 bill three people meal, the service was disappointing. No complaint about the food, but nothing to praise either.

name: sjlt
review_text: Cauliflower starter was unique & delicious. Both the trout & lamb entrees were creative, with a delightful mix of flavors. And their apple dessert is a must have! The down side is the noise level. You can see that they have tried to use baffling on the ceiling, but more/something else is needed. We felt like we had to almost yell to have a conversation- it didn’t help that the guy next to us could NOT stop talking. We did move but the noise level is an issue. Prices are high.

name: Bigheart
review_text: Great small plates!

name: MariaV
review_text: It’s great place with a contemporary and fantastic ambiance.

name: JoanW
review_text: I had the trout and my husband had the lamb shanks. Both were delicious. Employees were quite friendly and service was great. We will return to Aurum!

name: HeatherTX
review_text: Always an amazing place off of Main Street.  Love the vibe and the food is amazing. Top notch service!

name: LindaC
review_text: Must go for Happy Hour for very reasonable prices on delicious options! Wonderful, imaginative appetizers, even some items that would qualify for main courses, such as a giant burger.  Yummy alcoholic beverages.  Service is impeccable.  First rate restaurant.

name: CaroleB
review_text: One of the best meals I've had in a long time.  Nice setting, great company, good cocktails, great service.

name: lanikailiving
review_text: Our server, Amy, was excellent; as was Sydney, who helped us select our wine.  We tried lots of shared plates and shared 3 entrees among our group of 5.  Everything was excellent with interesting combos and flavors.  We especially enjoyed the cauliflower appetizer and the lamb shank.  Our only disappointment was that they were out of mussels, but we were informed by the staff that they only have fresh seafood on weekdays.  So if you want the mussels, don't go on a Sunday.  Otherwise, we highly recommend Aurum for a wonderful meal while in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Aaron was a delight recommended the most fantastic dishes and his knowledge and taste for wine was spot on. Truly, a valuable asset to your restaurant, not to discredit the magnificently cooked quality food.

name: John
review_text: Cauliflower and Parker House rolls for starters were excellent, but shared plates and entrees were mediocre.   Squash soup was a lovely presentation, but only lukewarm.  Rocky mountain trout was not exciting.   We've heard happy hour us good here so will try that in the future, but thought the dinner was not up to snuff.

name: Smstex
review_text: We love going there - for happy hour especially..     my favorite summitt county restaurant!

name: ChrisM
review_text: Everything was good.  Although when we heard the specials given to the table next to us from a different server we were a little annoyed.  We would have definitely ordered one of them if we had been told prior to us ordering.

name: JennaS
review_text: Amazing!! The food was prepared so well and tasted the best. The staff was so nice and friendly. Wish we would have come sooner on vacation so we could have visited more than once!

name: MerrittV
review_text: This is our second tine to enjoy the Aurum.  Food is outstanding.  Service is personal.  Atmosphere is awesome.

name: AmberH
review_text: Our server was nice, but no one at our table liked anything we ordered... things were over-sauced, too rich, too salty, too oily or too fried.  It made the place feel very over priced, especially based on all the hype about how good this restaurant was supposed to be...we were disappointed and won’t return.  In fairness, someone came by and asked how things were, but we didn’t speak up - it felt like too much to say everything was unacceptable and we were tired.

name: BradP
review_text: Enjoyed happy hour\ early dinner and sat in the bar high top area. Happy hour menu has a nice offering and the burger and fries were over the top.  Highly recommend.

name: Truckeegirl
review_text: Food was good not amazing for a $450 dinner.

name: MindyT
review_text: We have been hearing of how great Aurum was but as locals we waited until the slow season to truly enjoy it. I have been twice this week and absolutely in love with it.  Love the curry cauliflower, rolls and the hanger steak. Perfect sized portions. Great service. Will be going back often.

name: JBH69
review_text: Fantastic food, service, and vibe!  A must if you are in Breckenridge.

name: Craver52
review_text: Excellent food - great service

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This was possibly my 12th visit to Aurum, and it was outstanding, as usual.  Being on a Sunday evening during the off-season, the restaurant was especially quiet and the staff were very attentive and helpful, from seating us at our favorite table, to impeccable service from the wait staff.  I had the pork roulade, which was superb, preceded by their squash soup.  My wife had the trout, with the Brussels sprouts appetizer, which were also excellent.  Great cocktails (Smoked Old Fashioned and a Bees Knees), too.  Aurum’s consistent excellence is the reason we keep going back to Aurum, which is our favorite restaurant in Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Thanks guys!

name: LucyLila2
review_text: Great food and service. We went for happy hour so enjoyed the discounted wine and snacks!

name: breckyogi
review_text: We are new residents to Summit County but have been coming to Breck for over 30 years, and nice to have a new restaurant that caters to the "foodie" experience. While I thought our hamachi crudo was slightly fishy, the accouterments were spicy enough to make it enjoyable and the other dishes we ordered:  arugula/romaine caesar salad and rainbow trout and pork entrees, all were outstanding, so I still gave an outstanding rating on the food. While our main server was super nice, let me have a taste of wine before ordering, he was a little inconsistent and forgetful when it came time to bringing the food.  And the only reason I mention that is because it is a pretty upscale place price-wise so the service should match.  Regardless, it was still a great experience, loved the ambiance, food, as well as our friendly and eccentric waiter!  Definitely would go back and recommend!

name: DavidR
review_text: Excellent food, service and ambiance. Appropriate for a special occasion, since prices are pretty high. Convenient location near Main Street.

name: Carolyn
review_text: We love everything about Aurum including that they have delicious gluten free options

name: NickS
review_text: Too many additional charges. Told them it was a 5 year anniversary, they bring out 2 champagne glasses, and then charge when I didn’t ask for it. Also a “kitchen appreciation” charge that caused the overall tip to go down.

name: BrentK
review_text: The food was great except for the Brussel Sprouts that were a little on the tough side other than that it was great.

name: KristenD
review_text: This was the best meal I’ve had in a long time.  Trout was exceptional,  Korean fried chicken and cauliflower did not disappoint.

name: SAMANTHAK
review_text: Great food and atmosphere! Some of the best dining in Breckenridge. Love the ambiance.

name: CK2WAP
review_text: Wonderful food beautifully prepared. A bit noisy.

name: ARFUSA
review_text: Our waitress Amy is great!

name: DavidM
review_text:
Aurum was absolutely delicious.  From the appetizers to the main courses, all was top notch. They have a wonderful drink menu also. 
And the servers were wonderful. I expect to go back the next time we are in Breckenridge.

name: MichaelW
review_text: Another excellent meal...Alexa and Sydney once again provided outstanding service and great food which made for a wonderful evening.

name: Milliwood
review_text: Rarely does one find an eating establishment that brings unique and refreshing menu items along with friendly and casual yet attentive service like Aurum.  So fun, and so good.  Go.  Ask for David.  Can't wait to go back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic!

name: Scott
review_text:
This place is amazing and has it all - great location, ambiance, incredible service and amazing food / drinks.

This is our favorite place in Breck to eat.  The Cheeseburger is nothing less than pure heaven and the Brussels Sprouts are to die for.

Very nice wine list! 

You wont be disappointed.

name: EricG
review_text: The menu is fresh and inventive.  Some of the items are there all the time,  some change.  Interesting flavors and spices.  One could eat there often and not be bored with the menu.  The ambiance is casual and fun.  People are friendly.  On this particular night, the dining room was full and it felt a bit like they were understaffed.  We had a reservation, but the table was not ready.  Normally that’s not a big deal, but for a party of six it was a bit hard to find space to wait.  All in all, terrific.  Would go back.  Would recommend to others.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Recommended by a local and what an experience! Obsessed with the ambiance and the food was great - ordered trout which I never would and it was one of the best dishes I’ve ever had.

name: GregK
review_text: One of my new favorite places. Beautiful contemporary design with subtle rustic touches elevates the ambiance and sets the tone for the dining experience. The staff is fantastic, personable, friendly and engaging. Richard is an example of why people come back to restaurants - yes the food and setting need to shine - but the people that help make your experience stellar are true ambassadors of the concept and the brand

name: DeenaD
review_text: It was my friend's birthday and you couldn't have made it more special for her.  The best trout I have ever had and my friend said her steak was amazing.  I will definitely come back!!  The only thing that kind of disappointed me was how the other guests were dressed.  I would have thought at these prices and quality of food, people wouldn't have come in their ski pants and stocking hats. A dress code would be nice. But hey we are in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing! Thanks for the special attention to my birthday guest. Be back soon

name: kgh23
review_text: Great portions and incredible tastes. Was very happy with our choices at Aurum and will absolutely be back next time we are in Breck.

name: SusanB
review_text: Great experience!

name: LeeS
review_text: Lovely restaurant with a very attentive staff!

name: Gourmand
review_text: Food was okay, not outstanding. Had to pay extra for a couple of slices of bread. Used a "Passport" for half priced  dinner. Definitely would have been really disappointed if I paid full price. Sat at a high top near the bar. Way too noisy/loud. Had to tell across the table to speak with my friend. Sorry.

name: JoyT
review_text: Food was delicious and the staff very attentive. Will definitely be back!

name: CarlK
review_text: A very nice place. Definitely recommend the trout.

name: DiscerningLady
review_text: Decent but not spectacular food.  Server was excellent.  Warm place but nothing special considering the prices.  Wine list is appalling.  Nothing decent for less than $100.00 plus.  Nothing.  It’s difficult to love a restaurant with decent food if a basic, decent wine selection that costs the restaurant about $30.00 is offered at a hundred dollars or more.

name: KippF
review_text: Fall pasta of the day was terrific!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Menu tries too hard with stuff that is weird for the sake of being out there.
Couldnt find anything we wanted to order, and only one of the three dishes was unique and palatable.
Drinks definitely better than food.
There are better options in Breckenridge

name: TomP
review_text: This was our first visit to Aurum, but we’ll be back again & again.  The menu is the first signal that you are going to love everything and have a hard time choosing.   Our table of 4 ordered about 5 appetizers.  The apple foie gras presentation is beautiful plus delicious.  Cocktails were wonderful.  All the main courses were delicious:  Duck confit, fresh mushroom pasta, steak.   This is probably the best restaurant in Summit County.  Food is very inventive and also delicious.

name: JennR
review_text: One of THE best dining experiences in Breck!

name: ChrisD
review_text: Excellent salmon dish. Excellent service all around. Will be back

name: GregS
review_text: Aurum is a wonderful restaurant.  Food and service was excellent.  My wife and I both had the Hanger Steak dinner, it was outstanding.  You must get the cookies for desert. That's right, the cookies, you won't be disappointed.  We look forward to a return visit.

name: Dean
review_text: Wonderful all around.  Unique food options and well prepared and flavorful.

name: PatrickM
review_text: Loved everything

name: Scout
review_text: We had delicious food and interesting cocktails.  I would definitely return if I’m back in Breckenridge.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great spot with awesome food and wonderful staff. Thank you all for an excellent evening!

name: JohnG
review_text: Great food.  Good value.  They Italian Waygu beef is quite good.  Nice wine selection.  Personable service.  A bit loud, but my hearing is not  great.

name: LindaH
review_text: This was our first meal at Aurum and it was outstanding.  The food selection is amazing and outstanding.

name: IngridE
review_text: Fantastic meal and fantastic service.

name: juliez
review_text: Everything was delish! Love the cauliflower and the burger. My only request is for the servers not to remove plates when people are still eating, especially for a restaurant at that price point. Pet peeve. Great food and drink.

name: filterml
review_text: Amazing pasta dish!  Definitely enjoy the 1/2 price happy hour specials!

name: Vicki
review_text:
All I can say is WOW!
The food, service and ambiance stellar

name: DanB
review_text: Always ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ experience! Well ran, the food and cocktails are always consistently good!!

name: FoodJunkie
review_text: On vacation in Breckenridge and found this wonderful restaurant. Don’t miss it when you are here!

name: Wk4fd
review_text:
The food and service was very good.  My wife and I went during Happy Hour and would definitely go back.
The entire experience was very nice without feeling stuffy.

name: ClarisaH
review_text: Wine festival

name: Kadi
review_text: Beautiful food and fantastic service

name: Cari
review_text: Such a cute place, with the best happy hour! We ate dinner there too, and the pasta special was unbelievable! Every time I’m in town, I eat here! But it’s getting too popular, so watch out for the crowds! Reservation is a must

name: LisaB
review_text: Enjoyed a nice dinner with my mom. We were pleasantly surprised to find our arrival coincided with happy hour. We split the curry cauliflower, beef tartare, Korean chicken, and wedge salad with Bibb lettuce. Everything was delicious, particularly the cauliflower.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was better than expected! Every part of the meal was delicious and carefully planned. Service was great and her recommendations guided the meal. Chocolate chip cookies for dessert for sure!

name: KevinW
review_text: Excellent all around. Great to go to a place that gets it all right. Great cocktails then on to a dinner for four mostly made up of small plates and apps. We tried them ALL I think. Both salads, Korean wings, corn ribs (super interesting and delicious), Parker House rolls, and the French Onion burger. Stuffed, but had dessert anyhow. Excellent. Warm choc chip cookies. We eat out a lot and rarely is it all perfect. But Aurum did it. Our server Amy was outstanding. Super friendly and helpful. And we had a nice table visit from Sydney the manager. Well done Aurum. We will be back.

name: Sandi
review_text: Delicious food and wonderful service.  We were there during happy hour and it was a value.  Loved the place!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Another fun night at this restaurant.  Good food, good cocktails, but most of all from the management, to the hostess, to the waitstaff, we found nothing to complain about.

Here are the special people that made her night so complete.
Tavish
Amy
Kelsey
Willis

Great atmosphere, great pictures on the wall, decor is fun and I love how they set up the bar.  I definitely want to replicate that bar in my house, LOL.

I WOULD recommend going there and starting off with their happy hour.

name: DerekOmalley
review_text: Aurum is my favourite restaurant in Summit County!! Never a bad meal ever. Definitely my go-to place especially for the happy hour goodies. Always greeted with a smile and service here is what makes the place. What wonderful people. Thank you again for a phenomenal meal.

name: beachbaby
review_text: Fabulous experience!  The best, freshest food we have had in Breckenridge.  Try the corn “ribs”, rolls and butter, trout, and the vegetarian option they made for me with risotto and seasonal vegetables.  Delicious!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great server- Meagan was awesome!  Food was outstanding!

name: Andy
review_text: Had reservations for birthday dinner. Birthday card was nice touch. Most of items were overpriced considering it was average in quality. Very disappointed with my salmon and the 24 $ hamburger. The salmon looked and tasted like chunks of boiled fish. Our waitress though efficient was robotic in demeanor. Won’t be back.could have bought a plane ticket.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: I have reviewed Aurum several times, and they are always 5* reviews, probably because the place is very consistently excellent.  Reservations are a must for dinner, but they always manage to accommodate our special requests, whether they be food allergies or table preferences.  This most recent time, we had the trout and lamb shank entrees, with a Caesar salad and Korean chicken appetizers to start.  All were excellent.  I have to give a shout-out to the bartenders, who made us some excellent classic cocktails (Bees Knees and Aviation), and they, too, were superb, well-balanced, flavorful, and nicely presented.  Service was excellent, as usual, and the owner was busy checking up on everybody, when he wasn’t pouring wine or otherwise attending to other details.  His and other managers hands-on involvement, together with an excellent kitchen and bar staff, could be the secret to Aurum’s success.  The staff are all very well-trained and work as a team to make every diner’s experience the best it can be.

name: RobertG
review_text: Perhaps a little too "trendy" for us, but did enjoy the evening

name: DiningDoug
review_text: This relatively new spot in Breckenridge is one of the best in Colorado!  From cocktails to dessert,

name: Granmylinda
review_text:
Aaron, our server, made an awesome experience even better. The food here is inventive and fabulously delicious!  We first stop here on our 1st of 7 days in Breckenridge for Happy Hour. Yum-my!  We enjoyed it so much that we promptly made a dinner reservation for later in the week. We are now contemplating one more Happy Hour evening before we depart. 

Aurum has now joined our favorite Breckenridge eateries. Must try items: Cauliflower, Korean Chicken, Beef Tartare, Elote Corn and the Beef Tenderloin entree. But truthfully, you can’t go wrong here!  We are eating our way through their menu and enjoying every bite!  

Uh, oh!  Do not Miss the cookies and cream!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Awesome. Thanks.

name: LDub
review_text: We had a birthday celebration during this meal and Aurum staff made it perfect -- food, ambience, service was awesome!!!

name: SteveS
review_text: This place is a welcome addition to Breck. A go to location. Great service, atmosphere, food and drink.

name: MarieK
review_text: Small plates prepared in new and delicious ways. Grilled Corn Ribs!

name: MickeyT
review_text: Disappointing.  Inattentive waiter.  Ordered a salad to share as a 1st course. Entrees and salad were all served at the same time, on a table not big enough to hold 3 large plates. Ordered burger and tenderloin "medium".  Both were served rare.  Ordered nice bottle of wine.  After 1st pour, no one returned to pour more.  Sad.  Our 1st visit back in June was a much better experience.  Unlikely to return.

name: Bevos3
review_text: The service, food and drinks were all excellent, as was our table setting.  However, in the back room (facing the mountain) the noise level went way beyond energetic to overwhelming.  It was impossible to talk, even though we were at a table for 2 by the window.  We will go back to Aurum, but only for their excellent Happy Hour - not dinner.

name: CRLx2
review_text: The food was amazing, and the options of the menu are different, yet comforting. Our service was fairly slow, and could have been more attentive for the prices paid. Small space, which tends to get fairly loud. High-top seating not as comfortable. Overall, great food and would try again.

name: KathleenW
review_text: We had a wonderful anniversary dinner at Aurum. We were seated in a booth in the back which was very nice. Levi and Richard were attentive, our water glasses were always full, and the young woman that brought our Prosecco, was wonderful! Our entrees were cooked perfectly. We will be back, but probably for happy hour which we enjoyed a couple of days earlier!

name: DavidP
review_text: Great food, great service and a wonderful atmosphere. Everyone enjoyed their meals very much.

name: travelfoodie
review_text: Beautiful space. Food extraordinary. Had Caesar Salad, Rainbow Trout, Four-Cheese Pasta and Cookie Plate. It was a Friday night & very loud, but happening place. Splitting plates needs to be more seamless even if there is an up-charge for splitting. No one wishes to have a pile of Caesar Salad without a plate to split it when articulated this was going to be the case. Other than that, all spectacular.

name: TriciaC
review_text:
We'll be traveling to Breckenridge frequently this year and I'm sure that Aurum is going to be our favorite Happy Hour spot!
This was our second visit and we have loved everything we've tried. Great atmosphere, great food, amazing service.

name: NancyF
review_text: Food is interesting and delicious. Service is genuinely warm and friendly.

name: MarkandMelissa
review_text: We vacationed in Breckenridge for 6 days recently. Lots of good restaurants there, but this one was a standout. Very friendly, attentive staff. Inventive food - the corn “ribs” and salads especially. Would not recommend the steak tartare however. It was like a beef mush served in a glass - not very appealing. Everything else was outstanding. We’d planned on going to a different spot every night, as there are plenty of restaurants to choose from in Breck. Instead we went to Aurum twice. Oh, and happy hour 4-6 pm daily, with all appetizers, beer and wine half price.

name: Hammy
review_text: My husband's hanger steak was one of the best meals we have ever had!

name: DPRBreck
review_text: Always great.

name: HelenR
review_text: Everything about this restaurant is superb. . . the food, the service, except the chairs are hard surface and very difficult to sit in for any length of time.

name: MoniqueT
review_text: Creative, excellent food and great service!

name: KeithB
review_text: A great experience overall! The service and ambiance were great. I had the Hanger Steak -- very flavorful, and I could literally cut it with a fork. My wife had the French Onion Burger with the bacon fat fries. The burger was excellent, and the fries were probably the best I've ever tasted. We will definitely be back!

name: Alex
review_text: After hearing good things about aurum I was eager to have a special meal there with out of town guests. Unfortunately we did not have a great experience. I felt like everything was over inflated and pretentious. Service was slow which was not really a problem but then our salads arrived at the same time as our entrees. Food was just ok. I might consider returning for happy hour but not for a meal.

name: Foodguru
review_text: We love Aurum for happy hour.  Great corn ribs, cauliflower as well as salads.   All 1/2 price.  Their rose is excellent too.

name: aarond
review_text: Best food I've ever had in Breck... been coming 10years.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Oh my....what to pick? Food, presentation, or service? Food was as good as we had heard. But the best meal can be ruined when accompanied with bad service. At Aurum our meal was doubly enhanced by warm, prompt service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great meal and service.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great happy hour!

name: HillCountryHappy
review_text: We went for a ladies night out while le on vacation. Couldn’t have chosen better. The entire evening was perfect and the corn ribs on the share plates took it over the top!

name: Patschi
review_text:
Extremely loud in the back dining room area.  The food was excellent but service a bit forgetful.
Have been before for Happy Hour & that’s a great value!  Would recommend.

name: holly
review_text: We had a great dinner!  Our sever (Richard) was amazing and made our Saturday night dinner a pure delight.  We started off with a round of cocktails and 2 appetizers (both delicious) followed by a bottle of wine and large plates (none of us were able to finish our plates - they were truly large).  Not inexpensive, but, well worth it.  Looking forward to going back the next time we are in Breck.

name: JohannaF
review_text: Food, wine, cocktails, and service continue to be outstanding!  We will keep coming back. My mom want to live on a diet of the Parker house rolls and the chocolate chip cookies:)

name: Donny
review_text: Great dinner. Everything was delicious and excellent service.

name: Tiggerpup
review_text: Had happy hour which turned into dinner.  Awesome drinks, delicious food and our waiter Richard was fantastic.  A definite go to in Breckenridge.

name: JimM
review_text: Always the best dinner in Breck!

name: Carolyn
review_text: We love this Restauraunt and often come during Happy Hour for the 50% off wine and their delicious onion burger! However their salmon and trout dinners are also outstanding! We will keep coming back!

name: PatK
review_text: One of the very best restaurants in Breckenridge...maybe the whole county...

name: AndrewR
review_text: Great food, cool vibe, incredible happy hour!  Our whole family loved Aurum!

name: Tnttown
review_text: This was our second visit in as weeks and the food was every bit as good as the first time.  We stayed with the happy hour menu and ordered almost everything on it.  Not a single dish was disappointing.  I highly suggest a visit.

name: LarryM
review_text: Our server Richard rocked. The food was amazing. Ambiance perfect. Even great for families.

name: KSgirl
review_text: We celebrated our son’s Golden Birthday and had the absolute best experience at Aurum! The food was amazing, service exceptional. Aurum is by far the best dining in Breckenridge in every category!

name: actionman1
review_text: Were to start. Great food, vibe, and service. On 4 occasions was asked how our food was. We had the crispy cauliflower, strawberry & beet salad and mountain rainbow trout.  Everything was prepared to perfection. If you want an impeccable dining experience, then I highly recommend Aurum.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Incredible food but pricey and worth it

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Beautiful dinner! Everything was delicious. Our server Stephanie was excellent and spot on with recommendations. Inviting atmosphere, dishes worth savoring.

name: MichaelR
review_text: This was an absolute disappointment. Gazpacho soup was absolutely disgusting. Like uneatable to make up a word. My entree was cold, and steak undercooked. Just very disappointing from somebody who frequents Breckenridge and was excited to check out restaurant. I will say my waitress was awesome and I’m the type of person who doesn’t like to send food back, so I just didn’t eat the soup and barely ate entree and didn’t complain. First impressions are big, and I’ll never go there again

name: TammyM
review_text: We had a wonderful meal. Lamb shank was spectacular!  A plenty large enough portion to share.  Everyone in our party of six were completely happy and satisfied with out meal and service.

name: Myshell
review_text: We are locals who love Aurum and have always had a great experience, this dinner was no different. Our server Richard was very knowledgeable and accommodating. His suggestion to try the steak tartare with the Parker house rolls was a game changer. We also really enjoyed the corn elote “ribs”—what a neat concept! Best restaurant in Breck!

name: Rose
review_text: Staff brought a glass of bubbly for my husband and me..we are celebrating our 50th anniversary in 2019.   he food was inventive, delicious and reasonable.  The staff was attentive in service and placed us at a nice table for two out of the serving path.   All in all, a great restaurant.

name: LindaC
review_text: We were given a nice table for two by the windows. The restaurant is chic and tastefully done. Unfortunately people were all shouting to be heard and it was very difficult to even hear each other. The food is very high quality but the menu is extremely limited. All of the main entrees were meat or seafood and cost $40-$60 per plate. I ordered basically an appetizer pasta to have something vegetarian. Most listings in Breck claim this restaurant is “one dollar sign” meaning inexpensive but that is NOT the case unless you come during happy hour and order half price shared plates.

name: KimL
review_text: Both the salad and the trout dish were flat, lacking taste.  Unsatisfactory.  Also the plates were too big for the table.  Awkward meal and service.

name: DBall
review_text: Cauliflower, fried chicken were a big hit. Everything was delicious but those were especially tasty. Also, the bacon fat/lays bbq flavored fries were hard to stop eating.

name: BarbaraH
review_text: Although we knew we were going to celebrate my birthday dinner at Aurum, we forgot to make reservations. Thank goodness for Open Table and for a not so busy night, we were able to book a table within a very short period of time. They made it a very special birthday dinner. We began with an apricot cucumber gazpacho. Very creative and very fresh.  We had the rotating pasta dish, which was delish! A traditional bolognese on a handmade pumpkin seed pesto pasta. We ended with the Asian style lamb shank. Very good and enough that we had to take leftovers with us. Highly recommend.

name: Gary
review_text: Incredible food and service.  Appetizer portions are generous and great to share. We shared the curried cauliflower and beet salad, which were both amazing. Perfect place to celebrate our wedding anniversary!

name: Tnttown
review_text: We went for Happy Hour for the half-priced appetizers and everything was absolutely delicious.  We plan on going back and trying some of the mains too.  Very organized and efficient, the service was excellent too.

name: BonBonTamale
review_text: By far the best food and wine pairing I have ever had. Chef Brian is awesome. Awesome is an understatement!!

name: slfoodie
review_text: Richard was an amazing server and the food was outstanding!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One of the best meals we have had in a while.

name: JamesH
review_text: This place was amazing. Cool little place. Great service. Great drink selection and food was to die for. The portions of food were outstanding for the price. Well worth the money. We are from St. Louis and this is by far one of the best restaurants we have been to in a long time. We were very impressed and my wife and I will definitely be back. Thank you for the great experience.

name: JohnD
review_text: Been to Aurum twice now and both experiences were excellent. As a Summit County local, I've been consistently disappointed by the lack of consistency in the quality of product that it local restaurants deliver, so I was cautious after my first excellent experience at Aurum, but they came through on questions and consistency of food and service. Keep it up, Aurum! We'll continue to come back and recommend you as the best of Summit County!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best happy hour in Breck! Amazing French onion Burger and Bees Knees drink!!

name: MariI
review_text: Love this place, especially during happy hour! Food is delicious and good value too!

name: NannetteH
review_text: We love the happy hour!  We are especially appreciative of the fact they have all wines by the glass on happy hour!

name: KirkD
review_text: Food was very good. It was a bit noisy but restaurant was busy. Excellent food

name: RobynU
review_text: Dinner with my son!

name: GregK
review_text: Richard was phenomenal. And had a great chat with Phil the owner. Will definately be in my dining scene list

name: MarkS
review_text: Great food and wonderful service.  Could not be happy with our experience.

name: Jenn
review_text: Service was great!  Food had lots of flavor and spice!

name: CandaceH
review_text: Happy hour was fabulous!  We had the burger, wedge salad, and melon gauspacho. It was so good we went back the next day.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food and service was great. My wife and I had our 11 and 8 year olds. They both loved the food.

name: WoodyM
review_text: Beat food best service beat Old Fashioned.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Service was excellent, new (to us) best foodie restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: LonghornFan
review_text:
We dined during happy hour so we ordered 4 items off of the happy hour menu. The Korean fried chicken was my favorite, although everything else was really good also.  My husband really liked the corn riblets.  We both enjoyed the Bibb salad & Parmesan fries.  
The food is creative & the service was good. We will be back.

name: LanaT
review_text: Love this new restaurant!!!  I will return!!!  Aurum has the best happy hour in Breckenridge!!!

name: CarolineW
review_text:
