It was a birthday celebration and we were greeted by a card at our table—which was ready when we arrived early—completed and hand signed by the staff. Great personal touch. My husband’s drink was also comp’d for his birthday. Another lovely touch.

Love the decor and style of the restaurant. So on point with the times and Breckenridge!

Food was amazing and drinks were great. No complaints whatsoever.

name: JennaC
review_text: The food was great. I wish there were a couple more vegetarian items but other than that no comments on the food. The atmosphere is hopping- I wish the lights could be dimmed a bit though. The prices are high but it’s a nice place for a special dinner. Love happy hour there.

name: palomita
review_text: We enjoyed every minute and every bite. Husband asked the chef to choose his dinner (the chef sent out a gorgeous elk dish) and the sommelier's wine pairing with my fish had to be a challenge but he nailed it (the greens and veggies with our two dishes pulled them together). Service was fantastic and we got the best seat in the house. Ask for the booth in the back room if you can get it!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Unique menu choices and very attentive staff.

name: LisaR
review_text: 3 sibs and signifies other get together

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Creative menu,excellent quality, excellent service, fair value.

name: Fishydish
review_text: Absolutely delicious as always! Love this wonderful addition to the Breckenridge restaurant scene!

name: RiskMan
review_text: The food is amazing. Service was perfect and the ambiance was very relaxing.    But for a small local mountain town the prices are up there.

name: Pamelama
review_text: My new favorite in Breck!!! I am hoping they'll open another concept here because Aurum is going to get crazy busy.

name: JoM1
review_text: We are repeat customers!  And we will be back!  Toni was our server and we will be requesting her again!  Thanks for keeping my tea glass filled!

name: CaraP
review_text: Aurum is one of my favorite restaurants in Breck. Amazing food, great service and just overall lovely experiences I have had in the past as well. HIGHLY recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing! Complimentary champagne with a “Happy Anniversary!” from our waiter. Really awesome that they took the time to check my Open Table profile and see it was an anniversary. Food was amazing, dessert was great and overall atmosphere was excellent. Definitely will be returning!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: They made my special occasion extra personal with a handwritten card to celebrate. Great food; great attention; love this place!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Dined here on first night in Breck. Delicious food. Great service. The milk and cookies dessert was was terrific!

name: JohnD
review_text: As a Summit Country local, finding good and consistent dining options is a constant frustration. The dining market here caters to tourists, so consistent quality is hard to come by. My first experience with Aurum was excellent. As a pescatarian, there were adequate options and the food was thoughtful prepared and delicious. The happy hour made it a good value, as well. I will be back and really hope they got the mark on consistency.

name: InTheHood
review_text: The restaurant features VASTLY overpriced items. There are any number of restaurants in Breck with better food coupled with reasonable prices. We certainly will NOT be returning. Ember, Hearthstone, Briar Rose, Modis, Relish and Twist are all places we'll be going instead of Aurum. I caution diners to avoid Aurum.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Incredible food and incredible service...as always. Favorite spot in Breck

name: lisasc
review_text: For his birthday, my husband wanted to go to Aurum for its great happy hour appetizers and specially-priced drinks. We invited another local couple to join us. We were planning to just have apps and drinks, then go to our place for dinner, but everything we tasted was so good, we ended up staying there and skipping the dinner at our place! The staff was very attentive and the service was as good as the food and drinks. We were in the back room, where it is quiet and there is a nice ambiance. We highly recommend this place!

name: Denver2XBass
review_text:
This is one of those places that offers a verrrry creative menu. I expect a lot of people will like it a lot, and a few folks will walk away scratching their heads and wondering who the chef is trying to please.
A caveat: we didn't order from the Mains section of the menu; we just weren't hungry enough to do so. 
I started with the smoked old fashioned, which was good but not the best of its breed. (Go to Ambli in Denver for that.)
We ordered the elote "ribs" appetizer -- a clever, fun and tasty twist on corn on the cob -- and a couple of items off the Small Plates menu. Caron had the ceviche, and I had the French onion burger. The ceviche was not at all your traditional Mexican ceviche, and after we'd both tried it, we agreed that it did not represent an improvement. The burger was large and tasty, cooked to order and accompanied by fries. Anywhere but 2019 Breckenridge it would be difficult to justify the $20 price tag.
We split a creme brule for dessert. I thought it was well done (and pleasantly devoid of any quirk for the sake of "creativity") but Caron was less impressed.
The ambience is, evidently, aimed at someone else. The service was outstanding throughout.
I gave four stars overall because, without ordering off the Mains menu, we may not have truly given the place a real opportunity to shine.

name: LisaW
review_text: We went for happy hour and got half price drinks and starters - enough for a meal for all.  There is even a fantastic burger on the starters menu Everything was wonderful.  We especially loved the beef tartar, the fries, and the Caesar salads.  Service was great; she even came around and gave us one more chance to order more before happy hour ended.  Also, one of our group has Celiac, and they had lots of gluten free options, including the fries, cooked in a separate fryer!  It was a real treat for her.

name: SalH
review_text: Service and Ambiance was amazing!!!

name: Pamelama
review_text: Such a hidden gem in Breckenridge!  We loved this restaurant!

name: Mike
review_text: Once again, Aurum doesn’t disappoint!  With new items on the menu this summer, my friend and I really enjoyed our dinner there!  So creative and delicious. And our waiter, Richard, was superb!

name: RuthW
review_text: Thought the food was overpriced for what you got.  And one of our group had the chicken which he did not finish because of the sauce.

name: Marathoner6714
review_text: Everything was delicious and the portions were very large. The dishes were unique and well presented. My husband had the lamb, I had the risotto. We shared the corn ribs and house rolls.  We enjoyed the happy hour drinks and appetizer discounts. The service was fantastic. We will certainly be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great outdoor patio. Friendly efficient service. Overall food was good but a bit salty.

name: annek
review_text: Delicious food on every way

name: JenniferC
review_text: Hit the happy hour if you can - apps and wine are so reasonable! Delicious gourmet food, great wine and cocktails! I'll visit this restaurant again, but will leave my kiddos at home next time. It's a small space, and my 4 and 10 year olds made the visit less than relaxing for us. We'll definitely go back for a date night!

name: BradR
review_text: Terrific food, fresh ingredients and friendly staff. Great place to stop in at while in Brekenridge CO.

name: SusanB
review_text: Delicious food; range of seating options - patio, bar with community table, and dining room; and attentive waiter.  Very nice treat.  We started with wine and appetizers during happy hour, which was a treat as well.

name: Shelly
review_text: We had a great experience at Aurum.  Our friends ordered the pan fried fish and the crispy Brussel sprouts and said they were terrific.  My husband had the mussels and the wedge salad and he was happy.  I had the cauliflower (very good) and the wedge salad.  I would have give the restaurant five stars but our wedge salads were DROWNING in dressing.  The service was outstanding.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Easily the best restaurant in Breckenridge. You have to order the rolls. Literally. There is no choice. Please be a ninja and get in the back, steal the recipe, and send to me. Thanks

name: CarolT
review_text: The food and service were excellent. The value was also excellent as we had the dining passport which gave us 50% off all entrees.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: DerekOmalley
review_text: My wife and I eat at Aurum with some degree of regularity and have never been disappointed. We are mostly Happy Hour people because for us it is the best in Breckenridge. The drinks are 50% off and much of the food is discounted and they don't reduce the portion size. Great vibe with great service as well. Special mention to Ray who has figured out what a great waiter does and does not do. This place is worth a trip for sure. Many of our friends in the culinary business in Breck go there which is good testimony in its own right.

name: EricG
review_text:
They have a limited menu and they were out of the Risotto with asparagus, which of course was the item that 3 of the four of us were going to order. Apparently they were missing artichoke hearts which I thought could've been delivered within minutes from one of the local grocers in the area that offer delivery services. (Everything else was a meat dish on the menu besides appetizers.)

We elected to move our reservation elsewhere because of the menu snafu and they were very apologetic and picked up the tab on our round of cocktails which was a nice gesture. People and service was friendly otherwise, but seemed like they could've been better prepared since they have a limited menu to start with.... or at least could've made an order for grocery delivery to alleviate losing a $200+ tab.

name: AnnB
review_text: Hands down the best meal we have had in Breck, and we visit several times a year! We got the delicious Brussels sprouts as an appetizer. Our entrees were the hangar steak, the pork belly, and the trout. Absolute perfection! Generous portions and unique flavors. The warm cookies and cookie dough dessert was excellent, too. Service was friendly and efficient. Highly recommend!

name: Baka1234
review_text: What a wonderful find to see that Aurum is in Breck!  Everything about both of our evenings there last week was outstanding. The menu is creative and we enjoyed both the starters (Brussels sprouts, wedge salad, cauliflower, and Parker House rolls) as well as the entries (we had the trout and the risotto). This definitely has become our #1 destination for dinner in Breck.

name: AJDB
review_text: Another great dinner at Aurum, best service and happy hour in summit county!!

name: Carol
review_text: The food is outstanding and the wait staff are very friendly.  Highly recommend this restaurant!

name: LisaR
review_text: Best restaurant in Breckenridge...far above all other long established restaurants.  Great value for such high quality food.

name: MichaelB
review_text: First time on a recommendation. As a local, thought the food was a bit bland. Would have expected more for the price.

name: Carolyn
review_text: Outstanding food and service! Their burger with carmelized onion sauce is the best in the county and 50% off during Happy Hour! Had the trout with potatoes green beans and Lima beans - so yummy!

name: KathleenJ
review_text:
This is the finest restaurant in Breckenridge.  The food is complex, inventive and just delicious.  The menu also offers lots of ways to eat appetizers, share plates, entrees and of course dessert.  Everything we had was perfectly prepared. I rarely eat too much but I could not stop myself here.  Finished with the warm chocolate chip cookies with cookie milk and cookie dough. Amazing and the chef took a the time to type up and share the recipe. 
It was Mother’s Day so service was a little off.  I can’t hold that against them, it’s a hard day for a restaurant to be perfect. I will for sure be back this summer and often.

name: PaulR
review_text: Moved to Summit County in August and Aurum will be a staple when we want to celebrate special occasions with fine dining.

name: IsabelleS
review_text: Absolutely love this place. The vibe, the food, the service, everything! We love the Happy Hour also which provides the opportunity for great tasting of snacks (and drinks) at a reasonable price. We live in Denver and make a point to eat there every time we go to Breck. Heck, I think we might even drive for an evening and back given how good this place is!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent service and food!

name: CraigR
review_text: Food and service are exceptional.  Restaurant is very noisy.  You have to almost yell to speak at your table.  They need some noise reduction installed.

name: Kenbro74
review_text: Such interesting and unique cuisine.  Bibb wedge salad superior, asparagus risotto delicious but almost too many vegetables, burrata delicious but may need salt.  Best of all was our server, Sydney.  Pleasant, efficient and a force for good in the world.

name: Kacyann33
review_text: Food was great as was the ambiance, but overpriced.  Great value for the happy hour and off season specials- made for a great night!

name: SueF
review_text: We were seated at a high top just off the bar area.  It was happy hour, busy and super loud. Would have enjoyed a quieter seat. Food was good, although the Caesar salad was unremarkable.

name: ClifH
review_text: Amazing food. We love happy hour... great values and wonderful options for both food and drink!

name: TravelingQueen
review_text: Wonderful service but entrees overpriced and small portions; we are not fans of the decor/design, no ambience

name: JOSEM
review_text:
The food is great, also the service. I believe the price-quality has a very good standard. 
Definitively we will repeat that restaurant in our next trip.

name: KDog
review_text: Super awesome food and service. We will be back when we are visiting the area again.

name: Breckpatty
review_text:
Food Quality excellent, Dish presentation superb with wonderful visual and taste appeal.
Service excellent.  Reservations a must.

name: Gastronomiss
review_text: Great shared plates... great flavors!

name: mayerc
review_text:
for sure this the ONE you need to enjoy at brecken, incredible
there is no expensive restaurant when it becomes an experience

name: TxAggie
review_text: This restaurant is fantastic. We went two nights in a row and we weren’t the only ones. The menu has wonderful options and fair prices. If we lived here, we’d be there probably twice a week don’t miss the seasoned cauliflower, the French onion burger, the meatballs and the foie gras. Two thumbs up!

name: blueacemedia
review_text: After skiing Happy Hour.  Insanely good food and great cocktails.  Saw this on a list of best Happy Hours in Breckenridge and made a reservation.  Everything was spot on.  Great food at great prices during Happy Hour.  Perfect and attentive service and a beautiful space.  Did not know until later this was a rather new place in Breckenridge- which might explain the immaculate condition and beauty of the space. Highly recommended.

name: GregP
review_text: great atmosphere and service, disappointing food. This restaurant was reaching too far with its menu and the execution was very disappointing.

name: janetT
review_text: This is a lovely restaurant. I wish that the menu offered more plant based and fish options and was not so meat heavy.

name: LuvFood
review_text: Second visit to Aurum and it was not as great as the 1st time. Some of the happy hour items were delicious (bread, brussel sprouts) but the soup this go around was disappointing :0( the service is always great as staff is very accommodating. Just was expecting more for the food

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We love Aurum, and have visited it at least a half dozen times since they opened last summer.  This visit was just as good as the previous ones.  Excellent food and cocktails, good prices during Happy Hour, and friendly service.  We’ll be back soon.

name: BetsyA
review_text: Delicious food and drinks. Beautiful ambiance. Terrific service. Helped that we were with beloved family and friends. The mixologist was especially talented. I want to go back for the happy hour. As in many restaurants, I liked the appetizers better than the main courses. Yummy Brussels sprouts, mussels and fries.

name: ChrisM
review_text: We are a frequent dining couple at Aurum...the food is consistently excellent and the staff could not be more friendly.

name: AngelaG
review_text: Simply the best that Breckenridge has.  The food is absolutely supberb.  We altered a couple of dishes and it was no trouble.  The staff were all wonderful and smiley.

name: IwhoHaveNothing
review_text: Critic visit

name: juliez
review_text: Great addition to Breckenridge. Fantastic food. Drinks were mediocre.

name: MikeB
review_text:
What a great way to finish our week in Breckenridge. The Grand Finale dinner night out. Everyone in the family was extremely satisfied with the cuisine and the experience. What a lovely space and a great team!

The owner of our condo gave this his highest recommendation. I checked it out with many around town and everyone said go there!  Mission accomplished.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One of the best dining experiences we have ever had. Food is absolutely spectacular! Even wrote a hand written happy bday card for my husband! Amazing!

name: LisaH
review_text: Great happy hour.  We loved the cauliflower curry the best of the aps.  Each dish was loved, and the spicy margarita was amazing!

name: dadd
review_text: Excellent new restaurant in Breckenridge.  Had the lamb shank dinner-giant portion and outstanding!

name: agirlhasnoname
review_text: One of the best meals we’ve ever had. The hamachi crudo and ahi tartare was the best! The wait staff was amazing and helped pick out a new wine to try that we loved. Will definitely be coming back.

name: Schatzi
review_text:
A beautiful venue, great staff and extremely talented chefs. The building has a fresh feel with modern touches including nakashima style chairs. The wait staff were attentive and friendly. The menu is small but big in flavor. Everything was excellent. The skin on the duck was crispy and the meat fell off the bone. The lamb was tender and so flavorful. We will be back in the future to be sure!

(Note to families... There is a very nice kids menu. You can't color it but the food selection is great.)

name: EvanN
review_text:
Aurum has changed the game.  This place is fire.  And I mean it. 
Such great care put into each dish. 
New favorite spot. 
Everything was on point.

name: Jurate
review_text:
Very good service and food.
Will come back next time we are in town.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing and yummy

name: TerriA
review_text: We had a wonderful dinner, service was great, food was outstanding!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best dinner I have had in years. Everything was absolutely perfect!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We got apps and shareablea and all was great!!

name: MrJJN
review_text:
Excellent food and drink.
Started with the crispy brussel sprout appetizer - good sized portion - excellent
Wife and I split the winter mixed green salad - large excellent
Wife enjoyed the french onion burger and hand cut fries - excellent
I ordered  the 7 oz Angus tenderloin - lean and cooked to perfection - best piece of meat I've had in a long time.

name: TaraJ
review_text: Excellent food, wine and service. We loved our waitress who decanted our wine, and even warmed our veggies when they got cold, which was awesome! Will be back!

name: Mike
review_text: We love Aurum!  The food is so creative and flavorful.  The happy hour is a great deal, too!

name: Charles
review_text: First time at Aurum for wife's Birthday dinner. Service was excellent and food was very good. Strong flavor combinations made dishes complex. Fairly small dining room and high noise level. Great looking bar.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Celebrated my dad’s birthday at Aurum this evening, we were so impressed with the hospitality, drinks, and most importantly, food. The ambiance in the dining area was intimate and cozy.

name: RBrewFood
review_text: Food was exceptional. Best I’ve had in Breck.

name: Alexis
review_text:
Artfully designed, great ambience,  quaint and clean. The food was fantastic and the service very attentive and professional . 
A memorable evening with our family! we found out about the restaurant on OpenTable and were able to make reservations and not wait unlike many of the other restaurants in Breckenridge that do not allow reservations. We will tell all our friends and we will return. 
Thank you Aurum.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Outstanding modern restaurant- felt like Denver in Breck! Be sure to get the crispy curried cauliflower and meatballs to start.

name: foodie5280
review_text: Great food, cocktails and service!

name: JudithS
review_text: We loved our visit to Aurum! We had a very enjoyable evening with excellent food and wine. Dinner was delightful and we highly recommend Aurum. We plan on dining here every time we return to Breckenridge. Excellent menu, well prepared entrees and amazing dessert! Friendly efficient service too.

name: gthh
review_text:
Excellent food and Happy Hour!
Massive snow dump, short of staff and service suffered.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Even the kids menu looks like grownup food! The brussel sprouts were delicious, the duck was great, service was excellent, contemporary decor, attention with details! The best im Breckenridge!

name: catherineb
review_text: Arrived with 30 mins of Happy Hour left. Very good selection of Happy Hour food to choose from and cocktails. The vibe of the restaurant is busy, modern and clean - very tasteful but still casual. Service was great, very friendly and attentive. Loved our dinner choices and I am not easy to please. I highly recommend  this restaurant and are confident you will be pleased

name: Pattih
review_text: We really enjoy Aurum.  The food is outstanding and creative, the atmosphere is very nice and different, also creative, the lighting is a little bright for my taste though.  The wait staff is friendly and the service excellent.  We will be dining there again next week.

name: ChristineW
review_text: Absolutely fantastic.  We came for happy hour and ate the most wonderful food.  We will be back before the end of our vacation.

name: ceksc
review_text: This is a very attractive restaurant.  We did not feel particularly welcomed when we first arrived in spite of the place having a good vibe.   The cocktails were excellent but featured far more ice than booze.  We enjoyed our meal, but found the service to be very cold and a bit aloof.  The place would be outstanding with a warmer wait staff.

name: BreckGirl
review_text: Great appetizers and menu, something for everyone. I love kids menu that actually has tenderloin and salmon instead of the classic chicken tenders with fries. The food was amazing, we all enjoyed.

name: Mevo
review_text: Excellent happy hour selections; terrific brussel sprout and cauliflower dishes and overall terrific service

name: LindsayP
review_text: One of the best happy hours in Breckenridge, in my opinion! We love being able to make a reservation for the bar area high tops and having a fun and casual style happy hour with a fancy food and drink menu. The food has always been top notch and the wine list is fantastic. Definitely not a place to bring your kids but if you're looking for a trendy dinner or happy hour spot, this is top on my list!

name: stacyh
review_text: Unique food beautifully displayed and delicious.   Well worth it highly recommend

name: SkierSam
review_text: Very good food!  Very, very slow service, especially for a small restaurant.  20+ minutes for salads to appear; 20+ minutes for entrees AFTER salad dishes cleared.  Very nice hostess.

name: DainC
review_text: Best dinners I have had in Breckenridge.

name: KerryP
review_text: Outstanding food and service

name: GailO
review_text: Food and service, most notably Nicholas, were outstanding.

name: JerryD
review_text: We had a very enjoyable evening. The food was great and the staff was fantastic.

name: BrentH
review_text: We had a great experience at Aurum Saturday night.  A firm reservation is required and you could see why.  The food was amazing and our Waiter took great care of us.  I'm sure we will be back soon!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and atmosphere !!! It’s was full so a little noisy but great time

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food, creative prep and well-priced.

name: KenC
review_text: Arrived a bit early hoping to have a happy hour drink before our dinner reservation. Hostess told us our table was ready and we could have the HH drink at our table and not have to be move.  This was great.  Our waiter was very friendly and attentive.  Both the appetizers and the entrees were served  as described,  portions were very large.  Will definitely return on our next trip to Breckenridge.

name: CharlesD
review_text: Food and ambiance were great. Service was not the best though as I told them it was for my best friend’s birthday but they did little to make it special for him. But still the food was outstanding and the place was beautiful.

name: DoraL
review_text: Excellent menu! I could have eaten everything from it! We tried at least 8 dishes - and all of them were perfect!

name: ColaK
review_text: We had a fantastic experience at Arum. The design is warm and modern. The service was friendly and professional, but it was the food that really made the night. It was sophisticated while still being comforting. The only negative was having to choose from among so many terrific options.

name: Belly
review_text: Truly amazing food in a great space. Literally everything we ordered, from a delicate sea bass ceviche to a cheese plate with house-made marmalade to an incredible filet mignon, was worthy of a fabulous review. Add to that great cocktails and wine selection and a style that caused our 16-year-old to remark that ‘This is the hippest restaurant I’ve ever been to’ and you have a new favorite in all of Colorado, let alone Breckenridge.

name: chicajill
review_text: We liked the ambiance. The service was excellent. The food was really good but, with the reviews, I expected perfection.

name: RAFFYT
review_text:
Overall lovely!!!!!!

The kids salmon was delicious but wayyy to seasoned with pepper which kids don’t like. Perhaps you can ask!

name: onecaketwoforks
review_text: Waiter Aaron was top notch and took great care of us. Food was delicious. It was a bit tight and noisy in the high top area, but we accepted that with the reservation. Thanks for a lovely evening.

name: Rose
review_text: Celebrating our 50th throughout this year, and our server provided us with glasses of bubbly on the house.  Small space but mighty in every good way.  Can’t wait to return.

name: AC96
review_text: Food was good, but I cannot say that it was memorable. Service was a bit on the slow side. The thing that sticks out the most was the atmosphere - extremely loud and very difficult to have any sort of conversation.  Not a good choice for a date night.

name: MeredithO
review_text: Modern new American cuisine in Breck. Really hip and great HH. You will spend a lot here but food quality is fantastic and service is thorough.

name: Christina
review_text: Wonderful service, delicious and sophisticated dishes, superb drinks and lovely atmosphere.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Lights are too bright but great food

name: MountainGoat
review_text: Cozy foodie-approved spot.  Happy hour from 4-6 pm was nice with half price apps and drink specials.  Nice kids menu as well with some more quality kids meals.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Vacation with family

name: MizzouHoops
review_text: Amazing meal. Simply amazing. Everything was top notch. One of the best restaurants in Breck. Will return for special occasions.

name: RobertG
review_text: We celebrated our daughters birthday there recently.  She's an 11yr old foodie and wanted a memorable dining experience.   Aurum delivered!  Everything was hot, fresh, creative and absolutely delicious.

name: David
review_text: Absolutely fantastic, new favorite restaurant in Breckenridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent as always. We love the food and the vibe of this place

name: CynthiaR
review_text: What can I say....The vension and the tenderloin were both really tender and juicy. Nicholas was attentive but not overbearing. The apple bread pudding was well worth it. Would definitely go back again for something special.

name: Bigtop
review_text: The food was excellent. They were very busy when we were there.

name: JennyR
review_text: Everything was delicious! Will be back! Great service, great atmosphere and not one complain for a party of 5:)

name: WTMc
review_text: Great cocktails. Great ambiance. Great service. Great food.

name: RBurnsdine
review_text:
Excellent food presentation.
Wine prices are high - few to no reasonable priced options under $70
Will return but likely just for happy hour.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great service and food. Highly recommend.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The short ribs and creme brûlée were great!!

name: DainC
review_text: Food was great. Everything very well done. Great staff. Best we have had in Breckenridge.

name: jupe
review_text: We had a great time at Aurum! The food was outstanding! Service was superb! Happy hour is a great deal for the locals! We will definitely come back! We had the cauliflower, french fries, oysters on the half shell, duck and creme brulee! Highly recommend all!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Overall great experience at Aurum! Staff went above and beyond to accommodate our party for my girlfriend’s birthday! We hate to wait a few mins past our reservation to get seated so they brought us out a round of complimentary drinks while we waited! Food and drinks were very good and they even brought out a birthday dessert with a card signed by the staff! Would definitely recommend and some of the best service I’ve ever experienced. Thanks Aurum! 🙌🏽

name: SherryT
review_text: Dinner for 4 cost $300 and it wasn't worth it.  Our service was a "C-" with one server trying to take care of many tables and not doing a great job of it.  All of the food was good but the dining experience was not great.

name: NancyM
review_text: Excellent service. Very well done. Beautiful presentation.

name: Billhoustonabc
review_text: This new gem in Breckenridge has an amazing assortment of culinary delights to please anyone’s pallet. I am not a cauliflower fan, but loved the curried cauliflower. The Brussels sprouts were amazing. Also enjoyed the meatballs and burrata cheese plate. We are coming back. Service was outstanding.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We will return

name: MargaretF
review_text: We had visited Aurum in Steamboat but Aurum in Breckenridge was just outstanding! The food, service and the setting was perfect!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent food everything we got was outstanding I don’t think you could order anything wrong.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The food is amazing!!!! However I was really surprised because the staff was not attentive. Water glasses and wine glasses were empty and we were unable to get more. Oh well. I will try it again because the food was out of this world!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
First time in Breck. 
Wanted a more upscale experience and we found it. 
The service and food were on point. Some of the price points were a little high compared to portion side

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Another excellent meal at Aurum.  We brought a couple of friends and they enjoyed it very much.  great cocktails, reasonably priced (happy hour, especially) and consistently great food.  We have gone there at least a half-dozen times, and will be back again.

name: LuvFood
review_text: The food and wine was delicious

name: Fishydish
review_text: So good every time!

name: ConnieN
review_text: We celebrated my hubby's birthday here and Aurum did not disappoint.  Everything was excellent.  It started with a birthday card waiting at the table, to excellent service and food.

name: DanB
review_text: Always consistently good! We love that the menu changes frequently. And also, keeping favorites!

name: LaurenZ
review_text: Everything about our meal was wonderful! The restaurant is beautiful - lodge-y but modern.  The food was absolutely delicious.  We had the duck and the venison and they were incredible.  Everyone who helped us was really friendly and attentive as well.  Would definitely recommend if you’re in Breckenridge.  We will definitely be coming back on our next visit!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellen in every way.  Minor exception - forgot to add bacon to wedge salad.  Quickly corrected

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful meal. Our waiter Ed was very attentive and personable. Drinks and dessert were fabulous. Try the bread pudding!

name: MapleB
review_text: Fantastic, interesting food.  Really enjoyed the whole experience.

name: Foodling
review_text:
The menu at Aurum reads like an all star game. There is so much creativity in each dish that I am frankly surprised they are able to pull it off. The cauliflower was very good as was the maple snow crab starter. Then there was the main dish: duck confit... 

It is the best single dish I have had in my adult life. 

I have eaten at many more expensive and “star/macaron” decorated restaurants (including those where ladies’ handbags get their own chairs) and have not experienced a dish that I have enjoyed so much. The presentation was nice—on a dark plate no less—but it is the varied flavor profiles that won me over. Depending on the trajectory of the fork you would pick up multiple combinations of duck meat, crispy skin, root vegetables, purée, etc....all bound together with the comforting soy jus.

The dessert was clever: Small chocolate chip cookies made to order with a mini whisk covered in dough to remind you of being a kid and Mom letting you lick the spoon.

Match this with nice ambiance, attentive staff and the cold evenings common in Breckenridge and you have the ultimate comfort food experience in my opinion.

name: ElizabethH
review_text: Food was excellent and the menu offers lots of different options. They have a small plates section of the menu which is ideal for smaller appetites or for sharing.  Our waitress Hailie was excellent. She was very attentive and friendly.

name: PhillipB
review_text: Our last meal of vacation and we definitely saved the best for last.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Food was amazing!! A little bit pricey but if you can get your apps and drinks on happy hour it’s really not bad at all. Best meal I’ve had in breck! The cauliflower was my fave.

name: EricFig
review_text: Loved this place.  I will be going back next time we are in town.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: An amazing dinner from start to finish! Start with an Orange Old Fashioned. Parker Rolls, Korean Fried Chicken, Lamb Shank and Milk Jam and Cookies were all 5 star! Service was impeccable without being over bearing. Atmosphere was fine dining without being over the top. We will be back soon.

name: Debs
review_text: Great service and food!

name: Texasgirl
review_text: Love the service, food & value, wine list is excellent. Happy hour value is great.

name: NitaB
review_text: Great food and service but loud!  Tough to have a conversation!

name: viajero
review_text: Delicious fried Brussel sprouts and curried battered cauliflower. Fish dishes were solid, as was lamb.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely amazing food! Everyone at our table loved every dish. We will be back often.

name: rfgdine
review_text: Nice place and atmosphere. Food very good and service was efficient.

name: Medfordgirl20
review_text: Vibrant Happy Hour with amicable service and discounted food and drinks.  Between the hours of 4:00 and 6:00 pm daily, 2 people can share an appetizer, split a burger and each have a custom, handcrafted cocktail for less than 50 bucks.  A must stop when in Breck.

name: RickR
review_text: We dined there for our 36th wedding anniversary ... everything was wonderful!!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great food and service. Really creative and perfect execution on food and cocktails. Front bar room was a little loud with a big happy hour group and iffy acoustics but still a great experience. Would definitely come back.

name: ChrisC
review_text: Good food, but the choices are somewhat limited. The happy hour menu is a great deal. The service was excellent. It is unfortunate that management has a time limit for how long you can take to eat your meal.

name: stephanieg
review_text: Awesome food and wait staff. Love the ambience!

name: BRmom
review_text: Would I recommend to a friend???  Hell yes!  And as a matter of fact, we were (quietly, in whispers) steered here by the hostess at another Breckenridge restaurant when that place was totally booked for the evening.   Wow, did she ever do us a favor!  Everything single thing we had was over the top outstanding, from the whiskey and wine all the way through dessert.  We had awesome recommendations from staff (not just our own server, who btw was fantastic!), all of which were excellent.  I ordered the ahi special, served over white bean puree and other ingredients I can't even remember, but all of which came together in one tasty dish.  My husband had trout with capers, brown butter, etc., and all but licked the plate clean.  Then, although we don't normally eat dessert, we couldn't resist ordering the sticky cake-something-something...omg delicious!  Seriously, I'd go back to Breck just to eat here : )

name: Brianb
review_text: Had a fantastic Bday dinner with a small group. The server knew the dinner extremely well, great recs on cocktails and specials.

name: Boudin
review_text: Great food. Every one (party of 5) raved.  Service was good, not great. Food made up for it. Lamb shank excellent, chicken fantastic, so we’re the short ribs and salmon. First class chef. Small plates, appertizers, all great. Not inexpensive, but very worth it. One person complained about the prices before the meal. Afterwards he apologized to everyone at the table.

name: Harleyman
review_text: We're Breckenridge residents and visit Aurum regularly.  It never disappoints, menu changes often and always creative.  Bar/Hi-top area can become a little noisy with bar traffic, but still enjoyable if unable to accommodate you in the main restaurant area.  Everyone from Phil, the owner, hostesses, wait staff and kitchen are warm and friendly.

name: DorothyS
review_text: Had a great time and delicious meal. The service was also outstanding. Will definitely go back my next time in Breck.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Bar scene downstairs but second floor is quiet

name: Sandy
review_text: Love their coctails, love their parker house rolls, most of all love the warm chocolate chip cookies.  Salads, soups and other entrees consistently excellent.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing!! So glad we went!! The chicken curry plate is to die for! Then we topped it off with the apple bread pudding. Amazing! My sister got the cookie plate, so good and warm (and plated cute)!

name: LauraR
review_text: Great athmoaphere. Service is nice and good quality food

name: Happytourist
review_text: Happy we tried this new restaurant in Breckenridge!  The food is delicious, especially the Parker rolls, steak tartare, and the burger! Brussel sprouts were good, but a lot of sprouts.  Would love if you could order a half portion for less.  Service was great.  The cookies for dessert were phenomenal.

name: AlanM
review_text:
The  food and service are exceptional!
The Happy Hour prices and selections are the best!!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text:
Muy malo el servicio. Esperamos más de una hora por el plato principal.
Tuve que reiterar el pedido de bebidas ya que se había olvidado.
Y lo peor de todo... La entrada de King crab. 23 dólares por tres, si, tres bocaditos. Una falta de respeto..

name: KSLT
review_text: Great spot.  Based on our first visit, Aurum is now one of our favorite restaurants in Breckenridge.  To compare, we are fans of Modis, Twist, Hearthstone and, when they are open, Le Petit Paris (but not Ember).  While our experience is admittedly limited, we would give Aurum the nod over most if not all of them.   Check them out--great food, service and atmosphere.

name: CarlThompson
review_text: Wonderful addition to Breck. Great food and service.  Kid friendly, without being kid dominant.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful experience from the moment we stepped foot in the restaurant.

name: karmineky
review_text: Everything was excellent. This is now my favorite restaurant in town!

name: Pattih
review_text:
The food at Aurum is the best I’ve had, and there are several outstanding restaurants in Breckenridge.  The only complaint is the atmosphere is fairly cold.  The walls are unique and very appealing, the lighting is much too bright and not romantic at all.  The decor is very modern and could use some “warm touches”.
The staff is friendly and the service is very good.  I will go back many times and enjoy their excellent trout and bring friends.  I would recommend this restaurant without hesitation, especially to the foodies I know.

name: KristineR
review_text: Outstanding dinner! Everyone ordered something different and all loved their meal! We will definitely be returning!

name: RobininNorman
review_text: Three of us dined and all had different menu items, my husband the burger he said hands down the best he has had.  I had the soup; to die for and our friend had steamed crab.  Next time in town it will be first stop.

name: redconniek55
review_text: Vacationing in Breckenridge and found Aurum on a google search.  Great location and food was excellent.  We hit happy hour so that was a plus.  Just off Main St we were able to walk around the area before returning to our car.  A little loud so having a conversation at the table was difficult.  Our server, Ed, was super.  Food was really outstanding!! We'll be back.

name: Margaret
review_text: Awesome food service and space!!!!

name: Micha
review_text: Service was excellent, food has always been better then expectation. We will put it top places to dine in Breckiridge. We definitely will be there again.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic as always! The new chicken item on the menu was one of the best chicken dishes I have ever had. Tavish (spelling?) was our server and he is always fun and attentive

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Unique food, available in shared plates , appetizers, & entrees which were nice options. Great service, very attentive & knowledgeable about menu.

name: newfans
review_text: We enjoyed our dinner at Aurum. It was quite slow, which is why we gave the service a 3 star rating. Our waiter was very good so this is not a reflection on him.

name: MGManus
review_text: Went for dinner with friends..   food and service was excellent

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food and service ! They cater very well to Gluten Free needs as well. I love this restaurant— hands down my favorite in Breckinridge.

name: AMB4S
review_text:
The service was as outstanding as the food. Attentive without being intrusive, helpful in selecting choices appropriate for our appetites. An absolute delight in Breckinridge!
Perfect après ski for two!

And loved the decor!

name: MayaB
review_text:
My husband and I were so excited to come here for our anniversary dinner and a night away from the kids. We are in Breckenridge at least once a month and we were thrilled to have a new restaurant to frequent. 

We were running 15 min late (I did call) and when we arrived rather than a "welcome" or "hello" it was " You have the table for only another hour and a half". Wow- for such a nice restaurant with so many app/ entree choices this was shocking.

It started us off on such a bad note. Why would they book only 1 hour 45 min. time slots on a Sat. night? Why would they tell us this? 

We ended up staying just for a drink and a couple of apps and then went to a restaurant nearby that didn't rush us.

Soooo disappointed.

name: Margers
review_text: Had a reservation- and when we arrived early, was not very welcomed, instead felt like I had inconvenienced them.  For dinner, asked for the only bottle of Sauvignon Blanc that was on their wine list - and they were out.  Expected more from a place that has ‘wine’ as apart of its title.  Only one kind of Sauvignon Blanc, really? Then our appetizer arrived with our meal... but it was comp’d. The chicken dish was very tasty - but would have been even more special with the requested wine and meal timing.  Won’t be back - too many other choices in Breck for a memorable meal that leaves a smile when you leave.

name: JinSTL
review_text: The restaurant is new and cozy. Got a little noisy when the back room was full. The apps were the best part if the meal - Brussels Sprouts, mushroom soup and wedge salad all delicious. The burger was also delicious. The trout was dry/over cooked. I didn’t think the osso bucco had much flavor. The chicken was fine. But at those prices ‘fine’ isn’t good enough. We waited 25 min between apps and main dishes without a visit from our waitress. I think we’ll wait to visit a second time.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: New Years Eve Celebration.  Nice job to the Aurum team.  The whole night was perfect.  Outstanding food with great service.  We were greeted at the door with a glass of Champagne and it just got better as the evening progressed.  Thank you

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: One of the best restaurants we have been to in all of summit county!

name: Tiffani
review_text: Great happy hour, delicious food and wonderful service!

name: Chels
review_text: This was our favorite meal all week! We started with the tartare and the Brussels sprouts. They were both delicious. We had the Colorado hanger steak and the trout. They were both phenomenal. The vegetables were also perfectly prepared. The service was impeccable. Our waiter recommended an Oregon pinot that paired beautifully with both of our entrees. We also had cocktails and were impressed with the old fashioned and the French 75. We will definitely be back.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: The owner made sure we had a very nice time celebrating our 31st wedding anniversary.  The staff was very attentive and friendly.  The food was amazing and the cocktails were delicious.  Our new favorite restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: SecondTry
review_text: Considering the experience we expect in a resort town... they exceeded our expectations and delivered an experience that could compete with any great meal in SF or NYC. The service was spectacular which is usually a crapshoot.. but this was worth every cent.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Excellent food and service, we will go here again.

name: ElizabethP
review_text: Warm cookies, bread pudding, cauliflower app, and kale salad were delicious!

name: PaulL
review_text: Super food, grog, service.  Truly exceptional chef/kitchen!

name: AndyF
review_text:
Good overall but disappointed that I could not have my first choice entree as it had run out at 8pm

Oddly arranged wine list felt gimmicky and made it hard to select wines efficiently

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great service and high Quality food.

name: BrendaM
review_text: Everything was great about my first visit to Aurum. Our waiter Tavish was fantastic, the wine expert great, service great food was OUTSTANDING!!!!

name: MattH
review_text:
Service was impeccable. Went for Christmas Even dinner with my fiancé and we were treated like family from the moment we walked through the door. I can’t remember our servers name but he was outstanding. 

Happy hour pricing, which we luckily caught the tail end of before being seated, is fantastic and all of the food was delicious. Only negatives were the ceviche from the raw bar could have used a couple of crackers and the crab shared plate was a bit overpriced for the small amount of crab that we received (Our server did tell us it was only 6 ozs.). Our favorites were definitely the meatballs and Korean fried chicken. 

This is a new and fantastic add to the Breckenridge community.  You owe it to yourself to check them out.

name: BreckLocal
review_text: Great service from Tavish. Always good to eat here as they're happy to accommodate vegan diners.

name: Lynn
review_text: Very disappointed with the restaurant.  Not early as good as in the past.

name: RalphM
review_text: Excellent food and service

name: AJDB
review_text: Aurum has been our favorite in Breck since they opened.  Consistently delicious, best service in Breck, good wine options!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Best food we have had in a long time in Breckenridge.

name: BarbaraD
review_text: Four of us had dinner & 3 of us had the trout which was spectacular ! Apple bread pudding was unlike any we have ever had-so delicious! Everything was very creative & complimented and enhanced the entrees. Food & service were outstanding!

name: RichardWeight
review_text: Nice restaurant. Good, not great food. Typical overpriced Breckenridge restaurant that falls just a tad short. Service was excellent. Entrees were fine, but nothing to exclaim about. Desert (Sticky Toffee Cake) was not good. Trying to be just too creative. I would recommend, but with reservation. We hoped to find an excellent go-to date night restaurant in Summit County. Vinny's in Frisco remains that place for us. Aurum was disappointing.

name: North360
review_text: The tuna was very good!

name: AmandaN
review_text: Great food and wine

name: Matt
review_text: A great add to the Breck food scene. Already booked up next visit

name: FredW
review_text: High top dining was really goid

name: JB552
review_text: We really enjoyed our dinner at Aurum restaurant. The interior is bright and modern. We sat at a high table which was very comfortable. We shared an appetizer and had our own main course. Every item was beautifully presented and delicious. The Brussels Sprouts are a “must order” as is the Coffee Creme Brûlée. We are so excited to have a new restaurant in Breckenridge and have already made a future reservation.

name: TWDil
review_text: They were so accommodating! And everyone was so happy and helpful. The food was so good.

name: Summ
review_text:
We showed up early for our reservation and they graciously accommodated us. We were sat next to the bar though and the noise level was extremely high. Since I made reservations a month in advance, I would have thought we would have been sat in the main dining room. 
The food was delicious and unique. We did not order any main entrees and ordered a lot of the shared plates. It was nice to be able to sample different dishes. 
While we enjoyed the food, we would not go back due to the noise level.

name: JBH69
review_text: A must when you are in Breckenridge.  Food quality and service are off the charts!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Great service, fantastic food all at a fair price

name: PinballDan
review_text: Great restaurant but the Duck Breast now on the menu did not compare to the Duck Confit they had before. Very loud and lively.

name: laurac
review_text: Excellent food and great service. I will go back here again and highly recommend it. Kudos to the chef!

name: ScottN
review_text: This was our second visit to Aurum. Both times the food has been delicious. The burger was very tasty and cooked perfectly to order. We had crispy cauliflower that was very good as well. They have a nice selection of wines and they are half price at happy hour. Service was top notch as well. We will be back

name: Harleyman
review_text: Our recent visit was our fourth since Aurum opened earlier this year.  We have not been disappointed and this most recent experience was consistent with our prior visits.  On checking in with the hostess, we requested a different table as the one they had assigned was close to the door, a 6F night!  They couldn't have been more accommodating, showing us to a table in the main dining room.  Food as always was tremendous; my wife ordered the Bib Wedge Salad and Roasted Squash Risotto.  I ordered the Hamachi Crudo and Braised Colorado Lamb Shank.  The inventiveness of the dishes and quality are outstanding.  Two days since our visit we're both still discussing what a fantastic experience.  We'll be back...many times!

name: AnikaW
review_text: The food and service was absolutely spectacular! We can’t wait to dine at Aurum again soon! Thank you for a wonderful evening!!

name: FuelsJules
review_text: We went on the Sunday night after Thanksgiving. It wasn't too crowded, which was nice. When we walked-in, they knew who we were right away by the notes in my reservation and were able to accommodate my mother who uses a walker. They put us at an accessible table in the main dining room. We started with the brussel sprouts, which were excellent. I had the salmon special, very good. My mom had the trout and loved it. We had the profiteroles for desert, which were off the mark, sadly. The pastry was like a dry biscuit and there was a hazelnut sugar decoration on top (very beautiful)  which didn't melt and it produced sharp shards in the mouth. The waiters were really attentive, which is rare for this town! Overall, this is my new favorite place in Breckenridge. We've also been for happy hour, which is nice. We love the bar tender and the decor is bright & cheery. I highly recommend!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing food and incredible service! I love this spot. Highly recommend

name: ShelleyH
review_text: Loved everything about this restaurant! I went with my husband and 2 teenagers and the drinks, ambiance, and food was fabulous.

name: Lindzy
review_text: Great food! The curry cauliflower was a hit with everyone! The risotto was also great, had a rustic twist.

name: AnniJ
review_text: Absolutely delicious. Very different flavors in appetizers and entrees. Great pacing by our server.

name: CarolD
review_text: Thanksgiving Dinner

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Fantastic!

name: Lizzie
review_text: Noise level horrible - this for didn't allow me to check unacceptable. Very loud. It became necessary to raise my voice so my husband, seated across the table, could hear me. Everyone yelling. Food interesting, tasty. We had the same opinion about 4 months ago. Will return in 6 months.

name: IsabelleS
review_text: We had a wonderful dinner at Aurum. We had the burrata and kale salad as starters, they were delish! For main courses, risotto and short ribs were wonderful and the warm cookies for dessert were to die for!!! We will definitely come back. Service was great, the Manager was attentive and responsive to our requests. Only thing I found a little odd is that they charged for bread and butter (all very good), which typically is offered at good restaurants.

name: JimM
review_text: Awesome food!  Great atmosphere!  At the top of the food scene in Breck!  Highly recommend!

name: Landon
review_text: Tavish was an excellent server! The entire experience was the best I have had in Breck from food to service  and everything in between. Amazing!

name: DrBud
review_text: We stuck with cocktails, appetizers, and small plates, and had a fantastic experience! Especially notable: the Manhattan and old fashion cocktails, the egg rolls, the cauliflower, the bison sliders, and the Brussels sprouts. The creme brûlée was incredible! All the dishes were savory while remaining light. I’m sure that the entrees are every bit as good.  Can’t wait to come back!

name: MarkS
review_text: This was our first time there and we loved it.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Very great first impression! Can not wait to go back.

name: AnniJ
review_text: Wonderful new Summit County restaurant in Breckenridge.

name: CMun
review_text: One of the best dinners we have ever had! Do not miss a chance to eat here!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: It was a little loud, but otherwise the food was great

name: stlfoodie
review_text: This is our second visit in two trips to Breck since this gem opened and it’s no fluke.  This is far and away the best restaurant in Breck/Summit county!  The space is fantastic and modern, the service impeccable and the food amazing.  We loved all but a few don’t miss items.... the burger “snack” (which is meal sized) with the bacon fat fries, the foie “apple” and the lamb shank.  A much needed addition to Breck - chic, fun and creative!

name: David
review_text: Best new eatery in Breck.  Menu is not large, but there is enough variety for most anyone. Ecclectic mix of meat, fish and veggies.  Friendly and capable staff.

name: StephenC
review_text: They put a tasting menu with wine pairings together for us with a few days notice. Outstanding!!!! And a value at $250

name: StacyW
review_text: We found a new gem here in Breck! The food was fantastic. My husband and I shared the burrata which was outstanding. It was served with toasted bread that was addictive—as good as any bread in France! The butternut squash soup was under the shared plates but really could be a serving for one. I recommend getting it—creamy and full of flavor. For our entrees, I had the risotto and it may have been the best risotto I’ve ever eaten. My husband had the short rib and thought it was perfectly cooked. Dessert didn’t disappoint! Overall a very good meal with excellent service. We will be back!

name: CorinneO
review_text: I don’t usually write reviews, but the food and service was amazing. We ordered and was amazed how quickly the fresh and perfectly prepared food was delivered. Highly recommend.

name: LaurelF
review_text: Outstanding meal in a quaint historic Breckenridge home.

name: ChristineM
review_text: What a gem!  This place was fabulous and had such a great vibe.  Super friendly, knowledgeable staff and amazing food.

name: Jbag
review_text: A new restaurant with a modern look and wonderfully tasting food

name: NIck
review_text: Food and service were great.

name: SandB
review_text: Wonderful shared plates and service from Toni was excellent!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Superb service, excellent & innovative food and wine list.  Best restaurant experience I've had in Breck for a long time.

name: RebeccaR
review_text: A definite 5 star!  Excellent service, amazing food, great ambiance.  Highly recommend.  Got to meet the owner as well, and you can immediately see why his restaurants are so fabulous.  Great guy.  As a bonus you should also check out his Steamboat Springs restaurants Aurum and Table 79.  You will not be disappointed :)

name: KeyVet
review_text: My wife and I thought the food and service was fantastic.  We were seated at a high top in the bar area and the noise level was high because of the high wood ceilings which amplified the noise.  We can’t speak to the noise level in the rear seating area.

name: DanielleE
review_text: While visiting breckenridge, we decided to check this place out. One of the best meals I’ve ever had. Everything was AMAZING and full of flavor. Even the bread rolls, I know so simple, we’re fabulous. I also tried the cauliflower and trout. Amazing amazing

name: Texasfoodie
review_text: Excellent restaurant but too loud for an evening of conversation with friends.

name: ColoradoSkiChick
review_text: Like the 2 sister properties in Steamboat, food quality and interesting flavor combos cant br beat. Brought friends who had never been, and they sent messages for 3 days complimenting the choice. We ordered 4 different dishes and everyone was pleased. The only downside is high noise level. Good for a more festive group, but not ideal for a romantic nite out.

name: DeeLyn
review_text: Just loved this beautiful restaurant - esthetically pleasing and one of the absolute best meals in Breck!

name: AnnaF
review_text: The experience is amazing.  Staff are all incredibly friendly, food is excellent, the setting is like nothing else in Breckenridge.  The architecture and design are beautiful.  Highly recommed!

name: Carolyn
review_text: Creative delicious menu. Great service! Food is incredibly fast. Pricing is reasonable.

name: Lizzie
review_text: The staff said they are working on it, but it was so difficult to hear.  The acoustics are terrible.  Sad, because the staff and food are great.  It's not fun, trying to lean in to hear someone.  I literally could not hear my waiter because there was a lively table of people (kids included) that just made it impossible to hear.

name: LVMike
review_text:
Excellent service, wonderful short ribs and hanger steak.  One major detractor....very, very loud in main dining area.  I had to remove my hearing aids!  Good news plan in place to study remedy noise issues.

Might return after thanksgiving.

name: COKelly
review_text: We had the best meal at Aurum last weekend.  DO NOT MISS HAPPY HOUR - it's amazing.  We had a group of six and were able to order several things to share and try.  Top crowd pleasers - Hamachi, Brussels Sprouts, Cauliflower, Mussels, Short Rib.  Tavish was an amazing server - helpful and knowledgeable about both wine and food.  Bring your appetite and make a reservation - it was very busy even during mud season.

name: Mike
review_text: This was the first time I’ve had dinner at Aurum, though I’ve been to happy hour there multiple times.  It was fantastic!  The kale salad was something unique and delicious !  And the Salmon special was perfectly cooked and seasoned!

name: Wino
review_text: This was my first time at this establishment. The decor is lovely and inviting. You are greeted upon entering. The menu is well laid out. It appears to be farm to table or seasonal ingredients. The food is well made and laid out beautifully. The wine and drink list will satisfy your thirst. It's really well done fine dining. Each course is treated as such. This is a wonderful place if you haven't been. Also, the restrooms are very clean and well laid out. Nice amenities. One complaint is the noise in the area with vaulted ceilings. My friend and I had to yell at each other. That's about the only downfall is the noise and how concentrated it can become. Other than that, please eat here. You won't be disappointed.

name: DeeWubya
review_text:
Our first visit to Aurum. Lively crowd for mid-October.
Food was really wonderful. Mussels shared as appetizer then beef short rib and flat iron beef steak were our entrees. Lovely presentation. 
Noise level got pretty loud numerous times so tough to talk across table.
We'll return again.

name: debbiem
review_text: Excellent food.  Hamachi collar was amazing.  Don't let manners keep you from getting all the goodness from the nooks and crannies. The mussels were delicate and delicious. The hangar steak was tender and flavorful. But the cookie dessert was outstanding! Patrick was our server and what a delight ☺️.

name: Chat
review_text:
Excellent food and service. Best meal in Breckenridge and we tried quite a few places! The fried chicken appetizer was addictive and so was the cauliflower bites.
Cocktails were also superb.

name: Richard
review_text: 2nd visit to Aurum. Tried all different apps and mains and desert. All very good including tuna, spicy chicken, trout , duck confit, and crepe bulee . Nice wine list and good advice from wine steward. Would be 5 stars if the noise level were down a notch. Very upscale with nice decor and service. Difficult to have a conversation with way over the top background noise level. Bar scene awesome for happy hour if you can stand the din. Although great food, may not return due to noise.

name: Pairodocs
review_text: We went to Aurum to celebrate our anniversary and couldn’t have been more impressed. The food was fantastic especially the Korean fried chicken, Parker rolls, lamb shank and trout. The service was attentive without being overbearing. We had 2 waiters who were helpful and knowledgeable in their recommendations. The atmosphere is both sophisticated and friendly, an unusual combination in our opinion. It’s a teeny bit noisy but that’s a small price to pay for an otherwise womderful experience. We will definitely return!

name: BreckLocal
review_text: Best new restaurant in Breck.  This place is amazing, and I highly recommend it to anyone.  Will definitely go back, and will definitely recommend it to everyone as "the place to go" from now on.

name: DavidS
review_text: This was the best restaurant I experienced during a week in Breck.  Interesting cocktails and exceptional dishes.  I started with the crab bisque, then had the duck confit.  Not many restaurants have Sauternes on the wine list, but I had a lovely glass for dessert.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: We LOVED Aurum! Ambiance was great and food was so good! Will definitely go back next time we are in Breckenridge!

name: Darlene
review_text: Food was service was excellent but it felt really cramped.We’re tall and we were placed st a tiny 2 top. More space is definitely preferred.

name: JohnD
review_text: Lively atmosphere with great tasting food. The staff was great and very welcoming. It's definitely a must go to spot for us when we visit Breckenridge.

name: Micha
review_text: Great ambience, new in Breckinridge we're glad your here, good is excellent and a good value

name: MikeJ
review_text: We certainly enjoyed the food experience, it was excellent - what we didn't enjoy was the noise level the night we were there, we had trouble hearing ourselves talk, which actually tarnished our experience  - think there is a need for some form of soundproofing to be included into the new decor

name: DarlaS
review_text: Hot new restaurant with an upbeat concept for food and drink. Be ready to tease your tastebuds and wet your appetite with witty described dishes and drinks!  I am personally allergic to dairy and they accomodated me without issue nicely.

name: CastlePinesgal
review_text: Loved it! We can’t wait to go back.

name: Dieting11701
review_text: We had a delicious meal at Autumn, but were frustrated by a very slow kitchen.  It took more than 30 minutes after our salad course was completed to get them main course.  Staff were very apologetic about the delay, stating the kitchen was overwhelmed and the restaurant seemed full of diners-but should expect to be busy on a Saturday night in a resort town!  The menu was innovative and tasty, so would try again perhaps at a quieter time and day.

name: Abruzzo
review_text: Food was very good, great selection, amazing lemon parm fries... and service was great.

name: MaryANN
review_text: Food was creative and tasty. Tavish  was our waiter and did a really nice job with our crew. Nice crafted cocktails. We will be back.

name: KippF
review_text: A great addition to Breckenridge dining, my new favorite.

name: DanielS
review_text: Nice place, food was overall very good. The Korean fried chicken and fried Brussels sprout appetizers were great. We had a fish entree that was very enjoyable. Where things went wrong was with the hanger steak. It was ordered medium and cooked that way, but it was brought out cold. When I brought this up the took it back and put it back on the grill. It was then over-cooked, dry and only marginally warm. The manager then offered to remake it, which should have been done in the first place, but I declined as it was already getting late. They were apologetic but this was handled poorly from the start.

name: SQlovesgoodfood
review_text: Wedge salad, octopus, crudo, pear/burrata and mussels all very good. Bisque had very little crab, a bit disappointing. Risotto was good but a little too oily. Chicken looked very good and big portion. Bread pudding was disappointing...crust burnt (showed to server who alerted you manager..who came to our table and apologized..very nice). Loved the atmosphere (although a bit noisy for old folks, still festive and fun). All in all I’d say it was good, not great...but would go back if can’t get into relish (sister restaurant)

name: Teds
review_text: Very noice and hard to hear each other. Food was average at best, very salty vegetable and oily fish.

name: DanaP
review_text: My colleagues and I had a business dinner here and the food and service were excellent. The appetizers/starters were on trend and well prepared. We enjoyed the entrees and shared desserts. I recommend making a reservation in advance if possible; they are a very popular dining spot.

name: murphygirl074
review_text: We spent a delightful evening at Aurum in Breckenridge and were very well taken care of. Our server and the chef accommodated our dietary restrictions and helped us come up with a combination of dishes that was incredible. Will definitely be back and will bring our friends.

name: Dodie
review_text: The food is incredibly well prepared and our server, Tavish was very knowledgeable and attentive! We loved everything about this restaurant!

name: Richard
review_text: A rising star in Breck. Cocktails, Apps, small plates, entres, they have it all. Think my hanger steak was prime , best ever and the boneless short ribs were melt. Apps of PEI mussels and tuna were perfect especially the grilled ciabatta to soak up the sauce. Nice unusual semi-small wine list with mid-high priced selections. Will try again with different selections to try more.

name: Mary
review_text: A fun new restaurant with an attractive and lively ambiance, nice wines by the glass and good food

name: macsmak
review_text: Aurum delivers on food, drinks, and service again and again!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing as usual! My favorites are the cauliflower, Brussels sprouts, and beef tartar!

name: DianaD
review_text: The attention to all details of our meal was remarkable.  We enjoyed the opportunity to speak with the owner, Phillips Armstrong.  Clearly he is determined to make the dining experience of his patrons a positive one.  Bravo!

name: COFoodie
review_text: Very impressive! The menu covered pretty much all of my favorite things; the cocktails were classic, yet creative; service was attentive, but not over the top and the food was perfectly seasoned and creative. I would recommend this place to anyone who enjoys well made food, an atmosphere that isn’t stuffy and delicious drinks!

name: RalphM
review_text: Our first time at aurum.  Now one of our favorite Breck eateries. Outstanding food and service.  Dessert unbelievable- try the milk and cookies and peanut butter s’mores cake!!!

name: Harleyman
review_text:
First visit since opening.  Met the owner Phil, very friendly and helpful.  Food was exceptional, fine dining in Breckenridge!  It was an exceptionally hot evening, so a little stuffy in the dining room although windows were opened which helped.  Noise level was high, but there was also a large table in the center of the dining  room that were contributing greatly to the overall noise levels.  Phil shared that acoustic tiles will be installed by the end of September which should help.

Overall and awesome first experience.  My wife had the Risotto and I had the Hanger Steak.  Both were excellent!  As locals, we'll definitely be back!

name: HopeL
review_text: I was so excited to try this restaurant for my 22nd wedding anniversary.  It was a bit disappointing.  I had made reservations but still ended up having to wait 20 minutes for our table.  Service was painful, waiter seemed stressed and rarely checked in with us.  Food was great but unfortunately that is the only good thing we can say.  ☹️Would not go back.

name: Okie
review_text: Outstanding.  Tried a variety of dishes and every single one was a great experience

name: CJB1
review_text:
I made a reservation not knowing the restaurant was only 6-weeks-old, and I can honestly say our experience well-surpassed that of an established restaurant. The wine selection is a little pricey, but well worth it. We really enjoyed the Precadent Zin! From appy’s to entrees to dessert - our selections were absolutely delicious! 
We were seated in the backroom area which was housing a couple of large table celebrations at the time - this made for a very loud dining experience, but the staff did a great job at managing the situation and ensuring that the surrounding tables were well taken care of. 
Our meal at Aurum definitely made it into our Top 10 Meals ever ( so far!). Enjoy!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Amazing experience!!  We came to Aurum on Friday and came back every night of our trip!  We had the best experience each and every time!  Service was amazing and so were the food and cocktails!!  Love love love, will be back and recommend to everyone we know!!!

name: Cari
review_text: Great new place! Happy hour is a great deal. Dinner has unique options.

name: Sarahx
review_text:
Finally an upbeat progresssive  design and great food to match. 
Ate here 2 nights in a row to try more options. Very unique recipes that are delicious. Fresh ingredients and new flavors. 
Very friendly staff. Can’t wait to go back again.

name: dianeC
review_text: The cauliflower was outstanding..I would go back just for that.

name: ScottN
review_text: Waitress didn’t introduce herself or inform us of the specials. We heard the specials and happy hour deals from the really good waitress(tall blonde lady) that took care of the table beside us. The food was great though. The duck confit was probably the best I have ever eaten.

name: JackW
review_text: Great ambiance, design, service.  It is a bit noisy.

name: Debbie
review_text:
We had a great first visit recently.  The atmosphere, food, drinks, and service were all excellent.  We enjoyed all of the selections including the duck breast, french onion burger, bone marrow appetizer, and pear and burrata appetizer.  We will definitely return and hope to get to their Happy Hour soon.
Excellent new find in Breckenridge!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Wonderful service & food! We’ll definitely return!

name: annek
review_text: Excellent food and service. Would recommend highly.

name: BFoodie
review_text: Beautiful space with creative food and wonderful craft cocktails. We went early expecting less noise and hassle with our family. Server seemed bothered by our party and of that of the table next to us who also inquired about the Happy Hour specials that were prominently listed on the website. Wish service was better because we loved the drinks, food and surroundings!

name: MeganS
review_text: The appetizers we got were amazing. I could eat those seasoned fries everyday. Everyone enjoyed their entrees especially the steaks which were perfectly cooked. Our server brought us glasses of champagne to celebrate our anniversary after noting it was a special occasion on the reservation. We will definitely be back on our next trip to Breck.

name: streat
review_text: What a great new find in Breckenridge!  We enjoyed our meal from the moment we were warmly greeted at the door and learned we could have happy hour at our reserved table.  The drinks and snacks were excellent, especially the cauliflower, and a good bargain at half price.  My husband has several allergies and our waitress could not have done more to find a number of great options that would work for him.  Several people stopped by to see how we were doing, not enough to be a bother, and it was nice to meet their manager.  We had such a lovely time that we went back two days later before leaving town.  The only complaint we had was the noise level when the place filled up but we understand they are working to resolve that.  By the way, their décor is fresh and relaxing.  We'll definitely return.

name: BrittneyC
review_text: We were greeted by the owner. She was so nice and showed us to our table. Food was great. Cocktail list was diverse. This place was busy by 6PM. So make your reservations ASAP.  I'll be back for sure!

name: Mike
review_text: We did happy hour and everything was amazing!

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: Absolutely best meal we’ve had in Breckenridge

name: DDown
review_text: Second visit. The first was better. The by the bottle wine list is crazy. They need to add a few moderately priced wines. There is a very small entree selection. On the positive side, the appetizers were good and the decor is great. The staff are very friendly.

name: ElsaK
review_text: Thanks to our concierge at GWL for tipping us on this new place, it did not disappoint.  People were friendly and food was interesting and delicious, as were the cocktails.  Half off appetizers during happy hour.

name: Foodie
review_text: Aurum is quickly becoming my favorite place in Breckenridge. Food is consistently outstanding.  The cauliflower, kale salad, hamburger, king crab, peach cake and chocolate cake were among our favorites this visit. Very friendly staff and impressively organized for a new restaurant. I look forward to returning there soon.

name: OpenTable Diner
review_text: This was our second visit and we brought friends along.  Everyone enjoyed their meals very much.  Our waitress was attentive and fun, and made us feel unrushed, relaxed and comfortable.  A great addition to the Breckenridge dining scene.

name: RicheleH
review_text: very different for Breck  - modern and bright. which i typically love.  it was very loud in the dining area. Food is ok. Nothing special really. Id prefer oldies but goodies over this new one

name: ColleenG
review_text: As advertised, one of the best happy hours in town by far!! Great options for all types of eaters, diets and drinkers.  Can't wait to go back!

name: KellyS
review_text: I can’t say enough about Aurum! I had the Korean fried chicken and the Brussels sprouts. Amazing—especially since I have celiac, so it’s rare that I can order fried food. The chicken was absolutely delicious, as were the Brussels.  Hubby raved over the French onion burger, but fries cooked in bacon fat were truly the best fries we’ve ever had!! They were cooked to perfection—crispy outside and fluffy inside. We capped off the meal with the upside down peach cake—again, it’s rare I can find gluten free cake on a menu and this was yummy, served with vanilla Ice cream & warm milk with the occasional tiny surprise of brittle and candied ginger. We will be back!

name: BuonAppetito
review_text: As soon as we were seated, they brought us glasses of Prosecco, which was a nice way to start our anniversary celebration. We had two small plates, the octopus special and the Hamachi - both excellent, and the Caesar; then split the Colorado Trout which was delicious. The service was prompt and attentive. The only negatives were the banquette seating was very uncomfortable (they need to add some lumbar pillows!) and the noise level was extreme. The remodeled house interior is fresh and contemporary, but the space needs some sound     engineering.

name: JadeS
